1b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ak+Sho b+h+ya s+ya/ ta thA ga ta su
1b2(dkon brtsegs): byA ha nA ma ma hA na sU tra/ bod ni/ skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin
1b3(dkon brtsegs): g shegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'ibakod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
2a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i mdo// bam po dang po// // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem
2a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
2a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga
2a4(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra
2b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu
2b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/
2b3(dkon brtsegs): srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad
2b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun
2b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po
3a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag las gzhan pa gzi brjid che ba gzi brdzi che ba'i lha dang / klu
3a2(dkon brtsegs): dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa
3a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu stan
3a4(dkon brtsegs): las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
3a5(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi 'jug pa dang / spyod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa
3b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / go
3b2(dkon brtsegs): cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa legs par bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis las dang / sems
3b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lha dang bcas
3b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu de dag gi spyod pa dang / yon tan yongs su dag pa
3b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brjod pa dag kyang bshad du gsol/ de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang /
3b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur la/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la'ang 'di ltar chos kyi sgron ma'i snang
3b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi snang bas snang ba bgyis par 'gyur zhing spro ba stsal bar 'gyur ro// de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis
4a1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi 'jug pa dang / spyod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su
4a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa dag thos na/ de bzhin du slob cing de bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro// de dag de ltar bslabs shing de ltar bsgrubs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
4a3(dkon brtsegs): ldog par 'gyur zhing / yon tan de lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur nas kyang slar zhing gong nas gong du yon tan shin tu khyad par can dag kyang thob par 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang
4a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
4a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jug pa dang / spyod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / ge cha dang /
4a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung zhig dang / 'di lta ste/ 'das pa
4a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te bshad par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
4b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
4b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing gzhes te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brtsams te chos ston to// de nas tshe dang
4b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bgyi ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman
4b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhes bgyi ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brtsams te/ chos ston pa de phyogs gang na bzhugs shes don de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
4b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par zhu'o snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
4b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong tham pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan
4b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing gzhes te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin
5a1(dkon brtsegs): pa drug las brtsams te chos ston to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong zhig stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo
5a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
5a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar
5a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa 'di la slob par 'tshal lo/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ dge slong de la
5a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la ding sang bslab par shin tu dka' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
5a6(dkon brtsegs): cad la mi 'khrugs par bya ba dang / gnod sems kyi sems mi bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po de la
5a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag dang slan chad 'di ltar g.yo ma mchis pa dang / sgyu ma mchis par med pa'i tshig dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i tshig gis bla na med pa
5b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems gdud par bgyi/ yongs su bsngo bar yang bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de
5b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la 'di nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
5b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te sems can 'ga' tsam la khro ba 'am/ gnod sems sam/ 'khrugs pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu
5b4(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/
5b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'o sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di
5b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la 'di nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma
5b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te gom pa 'dor ba re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral bar gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam
6a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas
6a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
6a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
6a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
6a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
6a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma
6a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi
6b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsdus par gyur
6b2(dkon brtsegs): cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos
6b3(dkon brtsegs): la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'dod chags dang ldan pa 'am/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa 'am/ gti mug dang ldan pa 'am/
6b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'tshe ba dang ldan pa 'am/ gnyid dang ldan pa 'am/ rmugs pa dang ldan pa 'am/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa 'am/ rgod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi
6b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ zhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
6b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de
6b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te the tsom
7a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa
7a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
7a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te srog gcod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis
7a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
7a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
7a7(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te ma byin par len pa dang ldan pa 'am/ mi tshangs par spyod pa
7b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'am/ brdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ phra ma dang ldan pa 'am/ ngag rtsub po dang ldan pa 'am/ tshig bkyal par smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ brnab sems dang ldan pa 'am/ gnod sems dang
7b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'am/ log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal
7b3(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig ces
7b4(dkon brtsegs): byas so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa nyid nas/
7b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la sems mi 'khrug cing / kun tu mi 'khrug pa ni shin tu ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma dge slong 'di ni mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te legs so snyam mo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta/
7b6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de'i ming mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des dge slong legs so legs so// dge
7b7(dkon brtsegs): slong khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na'ang ming de nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na'ang mtshan 'di lta/
8a1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro zhes de'i ming de la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi
8a2(dkon brtsegs): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang / dge slong legs so legs so// dge slong khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na'ang ming de nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong khyod bla na med pa yang dag
8a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na'ang mtshan 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro zhes de'i ming de la rjes su yi rang ba byas so//
8a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa mngon du gyur
8a5(dkon brtsegs): pa des 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
8a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma bgyis na/ bdag gis
8a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs
8b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di
8b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/
8b3(dkon brtsegs): gal te tha na gom pa 'dor ba re re tsam dag la sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems ma bskyed na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma
8b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ga zhes la chos kyang ston pa'i
8b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag
8b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tshe rabs tshe rabs su khyim nas
8b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim ma mchis par yang dag par rab tu ma byung na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa
9a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/
9a2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na
9a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tshe rabs tshe rabs su mngon par rab tu byung nas kyang dgon pa par ma gyur tam/ bsod snyoms par
9a4(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur tam/ phyag dar khrod par ma gyur tam/ stan gcig par ma gyur tam/ zas phyis mi len par ma gyur tam/ zas rnyed rnyed len par ma gyur tam/ dur khrod par ma gyur tam/ bla gab med par
9a5(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur tam/ shing drung par ma gyur tam/ cog pu par ma gyur tam/ gzhi ji bzhin par ma gyur tam/ chos gos gsum par ma gyur tam/ phying ba bar ma gyur tam/ 'dod pa chung bar ma
9a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ cho ga shes par ma gyur tam/ chos 'dod par ma gyur tam/ chos la dga' bar ma gyur tam/ chos la gus par ma gyur tam/ chos la rton par ma gyur tam/ chos ston
9a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa nas/ bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa'i yi dam yang dag par blangs pa dag blangs te gnas par ma gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi
9b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ zhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho
9b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/
9b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te/
9b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs tshe rabs su rab tu byung nas kyang chos ston par ma gyur tam/ spobs pa chags pa med pa dang ldan par ma gyur tam/ spobs pa tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par ma gyur na/ bdag gis
9b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar
9b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa
9b7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi
10a1(dkon brtsegs): bar du/ 'di ltar 'greng ba dang / mchis pa dang / 'chag pa'i spyod lam gsum ma gtogs par gal te nyal bar gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten
10a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
10a3(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med
10a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te sems can 'ga' tsam
10a5(dkon brtsegs): la rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung ba dang ldan pa 'am/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed dam/ bud med dang ldan pa 'am/ brdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ de las gzhan du smra ba brjod pa dang
10a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'am/ gzhan la gnod cing spa bkong ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis bsam
10a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
10b1(dkon brtsegs): bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs
10b2(dkon brtsegs): su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te bud med la 'di ltar mi rtag pa'i rnam pa 'am/ sdug bsngal ba dang / stong
10b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa 'am/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis chos ston pa na/ yan lag las skyes pa'i rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan la bzang ba'i mtshan mar bzung nas/ so yi 'phreng
10b4(dkon brtsegs): bston tam/ dgod par bgyid dam/ lag pa g.yob par bgyid na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/
10b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/
10b6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/
10b7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ chos ston pa na gal te lag pa bsgyur zhing chos ston par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi
11a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
11a2(dkon brtsegs): da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
11a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
11a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skra dang kha spu bregs pa snod du gyur pa 'am/ snod du ma gyur pa'ang mi bsngo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
11a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan chos gos ngur smrig 'tshal ba dag mthong na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi 'du shes ma bskyed na/ bdag gis phyogs
11a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar
11a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
11b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
11b2(dkon brtsegs): ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mthong na/ de dag la ston pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mtsha
11b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs
11b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag
11b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ chos 'chad pa na chos ston pa dag
11b6(dkon brtsegs): gal te mchis te chos mnyan par ma gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis
11b7(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsdus par gyur cig/
12a1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs
12a2(dkon brtsegs): su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
12a3(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par 'di las phyi rol du gyur pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha gzhan dag la phyag bgyis par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/
12a4(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs
12a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par
12a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'di la ni sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi'o//
12a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni stsal bar mi bgyi'o zhes sems can la tha dad du bgyi ba'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis
12b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
12b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
12b3(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'di la ni yon dbul bar bgyi'o// 'di la
12b4(dkon brtsegs): ni yon dbul bar mi bgyi'o zhes de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi
12b5(dkon brtsegs): khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus
12b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing
12b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'di la ni dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi/ 'di la ni stsal
13a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyi'o zhes de lta bu'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab
13a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/
13a3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/
13a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te bkum par 'os pa'i sems can la la zhig khrid de mchis pa mthong na/ de yongs su thar par bgyi ba'i slar
13a5(dkon brtsegs): du bdag gi lus yongs su gtang ba ma bgyis na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams
13a6(dkon brtsegs): cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang
13a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des gal te bkum par 'os pa'i sems can la la zhig khring de mchis pa mthong na/ de yongs su thar pa ma bgyis kyi bar du/
13b1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes smras so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas yang dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa'
13b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'dis/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'jog
13b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa de ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
13b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'gyur ro snyam mo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des dge slong de'i
13b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis yongs su rtog pa de thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong de de bzhin no// ji ltar khyod rnam par rtog pa de bzhin te/ dge slong gang gis de
13b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag dpang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa de'ang ring por mi thogs par lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
13b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'gyur ro// dge slong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag go cha chen po de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
14a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
14a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des 'di skad ces gsol to//
14a3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la
14a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ltung ba'i nongs pa byung
14a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dag mthong na/ khyod la ltung ba'i nyes pa 'di byung ngo zhes ltung ba glengs par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam
14a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
14a7(dkon brtsegs): bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na thams cad kyi
14b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du nyan thos kyi ltung ba'i sgra tsam dag kyang mi grag cing mi 'byung ba de ltar bdag gis brtsal zhing bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag
14b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dar bar 'gyur ba dang / yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa ji lta ba snyed pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtsal
14b3(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su
14b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tha na g.yar lam tsam du khu ba byung bar gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi
14b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te
14b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
14b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag khyim gyi
15a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas nges par byung zhing rab tu byung bar gyur pa dag tha na g.yar lam na'ang khu ba mi 'byin pa de ltar bdag gis brtsal zhing bsgrub par bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan
15a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang
15a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
15a4(dkon brtsegs): du da ltar gyi bud med dang / bud med kyi skyon gang lags pa'i bud med dang / bud med kyi skyon de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
15a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing / bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal
15a6(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur
15a7(dkon brtsegs): cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing
15b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te gang smras pa de bzhin du ma brgyas / bdas pas phyogs
15b2(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar
15b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ sa bon gyi chos 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni ji lta ji ltar
15b4(dkon brtsegs): sems mngon par bsgrubs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon par 'grub cing / de lta de ltar chos ston par yang 'gyur ro zhes gsol to// shA ra dwa
15b5(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu de nas dge slong zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dam bcas pa 'di gal te yang dag
15b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i smon lam yin zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur yang dag pa yin na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos
15b7(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po 'di g.yo ba dang / rab tu g.yo ba dang / kun tu rab tu g.yo ba dang / 'gul ba dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / kun
16a1(dkon brtsegs): tu rab tu 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun tu rab tu ldeg par byos shig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
16a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi bden pa'i dam bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa des/ rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos stong gsum gyi stong
16a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byas te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul
16a4(dkon brtsegs): ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par byas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed par gyur
16a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ byang
16a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su bsgrub par bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i
16a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de 'dra ba kho na'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
16b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa
16b2(dkon brtsegs): de dang po sems bskyed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa na lha'i ris ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad
16b3(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de dang po sems bskyed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
16b4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / bdud sdig can dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i
16b5(dkon brtsegs): bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'dus nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kye ma sngon ma thos pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs
16b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dis bsgrags pa las thos so zhes smras so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas lha'i bu de dag dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ kha mthun par 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// btsun pa bcom
16b7(dkon brtsegs): l dan 'das sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
17a1(dkon brtsegs): der skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so// sems can gang dag gis seng ge'i sgra chen po dang / khyu mchog gi mi 'jigs
17a2(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po dang / smon lam chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so zhes gsol to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
17a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i go cha chen po ci 'dra ba
17a4(dkon brtsegs): gang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su brjod pa'i go cha chen po de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la mchis par bdag gis sngan chad ma thos lags so/ / de skad
17a5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te// ji skad smras pa
17a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des go cha chen po gang bgos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par
17a7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i smon lam chen po de dang go cha chen po de bgos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'
17b1(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag gi nang na'ang
17b2(dkon brtsegs): nyung ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de yon tan gang dag dang ldan pa'i yon tan de dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang
17b3(dkon brtsegs): med do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs
17b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
17b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na de
17b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur bar lung bstan pa bzhin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
17b7(dkon brtsegs): papar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong
18a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing / sa chen po 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar g.yos/ rab tu
18a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na
18a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad
18a4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing / sa chen po 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun
18a5(dkon brtsegs): du rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
18a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
18a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams de na shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs
18b1(dkon brtsegs): pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logs su btud/ rab tu bdud/ mngon par rab tu bdud par gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
18b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang
18b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis nga ga la ba de logs su btud/ rab tu btud/ mngon par rab tu btud par gyur pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
18b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
18b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
18b6(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logs
18b7(dkon brtsegs): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te
19a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
19a2(dkon brtsegs): dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis ngage la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
19a3(dkon brtsegs): nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur pa bzhin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang
19a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na bud med sbrum
19a5(dkon brtsegs): mar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tshe bde zhing bkra shis par btsas par gyur to/ / sems can gang dag long bar gyur pa de dag kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to// sems can
19a6(dkon brtsegs): 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/ / sems can smos pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur to// sems can dbang po thams cad ma tshang ba rnams kyang dbang po thams cad dang ldan
19a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi
19b1(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bud med sbrum mar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tshe bde zhing bkra shis par btsas par gyur/ sems can long ba rnams kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar
19b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ sems can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur/ sems can smos pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur/ sems can dbang po thams cad ma tshang ba rnams kyang dbang po thams cad
19b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur pa bzhin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa'
19b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na de'i tshe sems can 'ga' tsam
19b5(dkon brtsegs): yang gshis ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa med de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen
19b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na de'i tshe sems can 'ga' tsam yang gshis ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa med pa bzhin no//
19b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na
20a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der lha'i dri ba sung yid du 'ong ba dag kyang byung bar gyur te/
20a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
20a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'dir lha'i dri bsung yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur pa bzhin no/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
20a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni de ltar lung bstan pa nyid na/ yon tan de lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur pa las na/ byang chub sems
20a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa lags so/ / de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad
20a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi
20a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/ yon tan brjod pa de dag nyi tser yang ma zad de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni yon tan mtha' yas pa gzhan dag gi pha rol
20b1(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin par gyur pa'ang yin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
20b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
20b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad sems dga' ba dang / sems nyams bde bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
20b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad
20b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dga' ba dang / sems kyi nyams bde bar gyur pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan
20b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
20b7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
21a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod
21a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad nga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur pa bzhin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/
21a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang /
21a4(dkon brtsegs): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
21a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su gtor/
21a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
21a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
21b1(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis ngal mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa bdag gis ngag la ba de logs su gtor/ rab tu gtor
21b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur pa bzhin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub
21b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi bye ba phrag nyi shu dang
21b4(dkon brtsegs): lha bye ba phrag sum cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
21b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
21b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
21b7(dkon brtsegs): / 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis kun tu khebs par gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par
22a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes ban/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar ba
22a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis byang chub kyi snying po kun tu khebs par gyur pa bzhin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/
22a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas
22a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i gos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung
22a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ga la ba de logs su bor nas/ tshig 'di skad ces kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'di myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
22a6(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas par gyur cig ces smras so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
22a7(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pa na/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i gos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag nga ga la ba de logs su bor
22b1(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs
22b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa
22b3(dkon brtsegs): tsam du pha ma dag bu la dga' ba ma yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa
22b4(dkon brtsegs): nastong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa tsam du pha ma dag bu la dga' ba ma yin pa bzhin no//
22b5(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gnyis pa// / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub
22b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
22b7(dkon brtsegs): den lha dang mi gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa thos par gyur to// de la lung bstan pa thos nas kyang 'dod pa/
23a1(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod rnams dag kyang byed de/ 'di lta ste/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag sbyin
23a2(dkon brtsegs): pa byin par gyur to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba bzhi po ston zla tha chungs kyi zla ba nya la ku mu nga'i 'du ston gyi tshe na/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can rnams sbyin pa dag sbyin
23a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing bsod nams dag byed de/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi sbyin pa gtong bar byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
23a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong
23a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can rnams kyang sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba
23a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs ngag gi sbyin pa byed par gyur to/ / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams kyis kyang / lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag mngon par rab tu dkrol nas/ a la la
23a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra dag kyang byung bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/ de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang ldan
23b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
23b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa zhib mos 'di ltar legs par gsungs pa de dag ni ngo mtshar te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
23b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab lags so/ / bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ klu rnams kyi klu'i yul
23b4(dkon brtsegs): yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
23b5(dkon brtsegs): po mi 'khrugs pa des dang po sems bskyed pa nyid nas yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu dag yongs su zin cing / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi
23b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de'i lung bstan pa de'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
23b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi'i khrugs
24a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i lung bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// bcu
24a2(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig
24a3(dkon brtsegs): mdor bsdus te gsungs par zad kyi/ rgya cher bstan pa ni ma yin no// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces
24a4(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan
24a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brjod pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig bstan pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de'i phyir rna ba lhogs te nyon cig dang / bcom
24a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis rgya cher ston par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom
24b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan dang phan yon mdor bsdus te bka' stsal lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
24b2(dkon brtsegs): da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems
24b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag shin tu legs par bstan cing rgya cher bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang
24b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed
24b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab mod kyi/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'on kyang phyogs tsam zhig bstan par byas/ de legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung zhig dang
24b6(dkon brtsegs): bshad par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di
24b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des 'di snyam du nam mkha'i khams ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/ bdag gis dam bcas pa
25a1(dkon brtsegs): ni gzhan du mi 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sems bskyed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni go cha chen po de lta bu'i go cha bgos par
25a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pas go cha chen po bgos par gyur pa de lta bu'i go cha chen po dag bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ngas bskal
25a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang na gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog gi spyod pa gang
25a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i spyod pa'i char nye bar mi 'gro ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des go cha
25a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po gang bgos par gyur pa'i go cha chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang
25a6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag la'ang med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des/ de ltar brtan
25a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus chen po yang dag par blangs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
25b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba na da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ngas
25b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gang gis lag pa
25b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ rkang pa 'am/ mgo 'am/ mig gam/ yan lag dang / nying lag gang yang rung ba dag bslangs pa na ma byin pa gang yang med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
25b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
25b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang klad pa na bar ma gyur/ rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis thebs par ma gyur
25b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ngo mtshar dang rmad
25b7(dkon brtsegs): du byung ba'i chos 'di'ang byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
26a1(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod pa na/ des tshe rabs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so// thams cad du'ang tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing
26a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du'ang 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
26a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba khang bzangs kyi steng nas khang
26a4(dkon brtsegs): bzangs kyi steng du 'gro'ang / rkang mthil gyis sa chen po la 'gro bar mi byed do// de khang bzang mchog de dag gi steng du 'dug nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod
26a5(dkon brtsegs): cing tshe zad par 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
26a6(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod pa na'ang / des tshe rabs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so// thams cad du'ang tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing / thams cad
26a7(dkon brtsegs): du'ang 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag mngon sum du bzhugs
26b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dang der skyes par gyur kyang rkang mthil gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mi byed do/ / de chos gang dang gang ston pa de thams cad kyang pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston gyi/ nyan thos
26b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston pa ni nyung ngo / / gal te nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston na'ang / de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// gal te rang sangs
26b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston na'ang / de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// des pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te chos bstan pas sems can rnams byang
26b4(dkon brtsegs): chub la btul cing btsud de/ rab tu bkod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams nas de dag la yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par
26b5(dkon brtsegs): gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang
26b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to// de chos kyi sbyin pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
26b7(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs su bsngos te/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i
27a1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos bstan pa 'di nyan par gyur cig/ thos nas kyang
27a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed par gyur zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par gyur cig/ tshe rabs brjes nas kyang chos de dag mi brjed
27a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig/ ji ltar bdag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba bzhin du/ der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
27a4(dkon brtsegs): dang gang du smon par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
27a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ gang dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
27a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni chos nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa rnams ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas/ lus thams ma'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal du skye bar
27a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa dag skye ba na sa chen po'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
27b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po srid pa tha ma pa'i rnam pa ni 'di dag yin/ rtags ni 'di dag yin/ mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa ni ma'i mngal du zhugs
27b2(dkon brtsegs): pa na mi gtsang ba dring bas gos par mi 'gyur/ der yid du mi 'thang pa'i dri dag kyang tshor bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mngal na 'dug pa na'ang nam mkha' la gnas so// shA ra dwa
27b3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa brgyud mor zhugs nas/ bar snang gi nam mkha' la mngon par
27b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags shing spyod lam gyis gnas par byed kyang / khang pa brtsegs pa de la reg pa med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ma'i mngal na gnas pa na/
27b5(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas gnas te/ mngal gyi dri ma dang mi gtsang ba dri nga bas mi gos par gnas shing / der yid la mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor bar mi 'gyur ro// shA
27b6(dkon brtsegs): ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar
27b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdud thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
28a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byung ba de dag kyang byang
28a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nas/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thams cad kyi thams cad
28a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du glags mi rnyed par gyur cig/ ji srid du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su zin par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag kyang byang
28a4(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi phyir spyod par gyur cig snyam mo/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems
28a5(dkon brtsegs): dba'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ chos ston pa 'am/ chos nyan pa'i tshe lan 'ga' yang de'i lus la ngal ba 'am/ sems ngal bar gyur pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin
28a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa des dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos kyi sku rab tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
28a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing chos nyan pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bdag da ltar chos 'dod pa de bzhin
28b1(dkon brtsegs): du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sems can rnams kyis chos mi 'dod par mi 'gyur zhing / chos 'dod par gyur
28b2(dkon brtsegs): cig snyam mo/ / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po rdzogs so//
28b3(dkon brtsegs): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
28b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag ni legs par bka' stsal
28b5(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i da ltar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
28b6(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod pa mchis pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
28b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i yon tan bkod pa thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la'ang blta ba
29a1(dkon brtsegs): dang phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mnyes par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dun pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs
29a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs pa dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa thos na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
29a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs po de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mnyes par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dun pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i skad du'o// de
29a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dA ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs
29a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs
29a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa
29a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa bshad par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan
29b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyis
29b2(dkon brtsegs): deng nas zhag bdun na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
29b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar shes nas/ sems can de dag thams cad kha zas kyi 'du shes kun tu byung bar ma gyur to// bkres pa'i 'du shes ma byung / skom pa'i 'du shes ma byung / mal du nyal
29b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes ma byung / lus dang sems ngal ba'i 'du shes ma byung gi/ gzhan du na sems can de dag thams cad bde ba'i 'du shes dang ldan par gyur te/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i 'du
29b5(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems kyi nyams bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
29b6(dkon brtsegs): p ar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis de dag thams cad kyis kyang de lta bu'i yon tan dag yongs su zin par gyur pa'i
29b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi gang dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis deng nas zhag bdun na/ bcom ldan
30a1(dkon brtsegs): ' das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
30a2(dkon brtsegs): shes nas/ de dag 'khrig pa spyod pa'i 'du shes kun tu mi 'byung bar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
