80a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i
80a4(dkon brtsegs): bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de ltar lhag pa'i bsam pas sems skyed par 'gyur ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
80a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba ngas lung bstan to/ / // bam po lnga pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das
80a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di skad du kye ma sems can gang dag bdag
80a7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
80b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar nas de dag gi drung du gnas par 'gyur la/ de dag gis kyang bdag mthong nas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
80b2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / sems g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam chen po btab pas na/ shA ra dwa ti'i
80b3(dkon brtsegs): bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan thos pa dang /
80b4(dkon brtsegs): thos nas kyang yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sku glang po che'i khri la pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i bkod pa stong byed du 'jug na/ gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu
80b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos
80b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun du bdar te gshegs par 'gyur zhing / des kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
80b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de mdun na bzhugs pa de mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / mthong nas kyang sems dga' bar 'gyur zhing / mi brjed pa dang /
81a1(dkon brtsegs): sems mi g.yeng bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ 'chi ba'i dus nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
81a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i sbyin pa'i chos byed
81a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de mthong zhing / mthong nas kyang sdig pa thams cad
81a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bsal nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa
81a5(dkon brtsegs): de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag
81a6(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'dod pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas pa dang bcas par de
81a7(dkon brtsegs): dag gi mdun na 'dug par gyur la/ de dag gis bdag mthong nas sems dad par gyur te/ mi brjed cing / sems mi g.yeng bas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi
81b1(dkon brtsegs): ning du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam de lta bu btab par gyur to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na grong khyer kun dga'i ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal med cing / 'bab chu dang / mtsho zan
81b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / klung dang / rdzing bu'i longs spyod dang / rta dang glang po che dag kyang med la/ bye ma dang / gseg ma dang / rdo ba dang / gyo mo dag yod cing / tsher ma stug pos gang ste/ bgrod
81b3(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba zhig yod la/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu grong khyer de na rgyal po mthu che zhing dpung dang ldan pa zhig gnas par gyur kyang / shA ra dwa ti'i bu grong khyer de grong khyer gyi yon tan de dag dang bral bas mi
81b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzes te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar rgyal po de mthu che zhing dpung dang ldan yang rung ste/ grong khyer de grong khyer gyi yon tan dag dang bral bas na mi mdzes so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji ltar rgyal
81b5(dkon brtsegs): po mthu che zhing dpung dang ldan par gyur pa de ltar ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po dpung dang ldan pa yin no//
81b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'on kyang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de lta bu dag med pas mi mdzes so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te nga
81b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar gyur na ni/ ji ltar da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
82a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mdzes pa bzhin du nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'ang mdzes par 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang
82a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su spyod par 'dod pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
82a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyangs shing yongs
82a4(dkon brtsegs): su bzung ba de ltar yongs su sbyang zhing de ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang ngas da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
82a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa
82a6(dkon brtsegs): dang dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la bkod pa dang / shA ra dwa ti'i bu nga'i nyan thos gang yin pa de dag gis kyang sems can gzhan gang dag btul ba'i nyan thos de
82a7(dkon brtsegs): ngadag thams cad mngon par bsdus kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi gan na
82b1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de dag ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ / stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba
82b2(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod ngo do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad med pa dang / grangs med pa'i phyir dang / rnam par grol
82b3(dkon brtsegs): bas ni ma yin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu nga'i nyan thos rnams lta zhog gi/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang ma 'ongs dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
82b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i nyan thos gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag dang / gang yang nyan thos de dag gis sems can gzhan dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i nyan thos de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus
82b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang / de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha
82b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang /
82b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyar yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des chos bshad pa lan /
83a1(dkon brtsegs): res sems can gang dag btul bar gyur pa de dag gi tshad kyang sus kyang gzung bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu nga'i nyan thos rnams kyang lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan//
83a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i nyan thos rnams lta'ang zhog gi/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa bzang por sangs
83a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi nyan thos gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang yang nyan thos de dag gis nyan thos gzhan dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i nyan thos de dag thams
83a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mngon par bsdus kyang / de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i nyan thos kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// /
83a5(dkon brtsegs): stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bzang ba dang /
83a6(dkon brtsegs): dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des chos bshad
83a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la na re res sems can gang dag btul bar gyur pa de dag gi tshad kyang gzung bar mi nus pa'i phyir te/ rnam par grol bas ni ma yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
83b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
83b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni so so'i skye bo'i zhing ma lags kyi/ dgra bcom pa'i zhing lags par blta ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de na zag pa zad pa'i dgra
83b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa dag mang ba'i slad du'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//
83b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de na zag pa zad pa'i dgra bcom pa dag mang ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i skar ma'i gzugs rnams
83b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshad ni gzung bar nus kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sems can gang dag de bzhin
83b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de'i chos bshad pa la na re res dgra bcom pa thob par gyur pa de dag gi tshad ni gzung bar mi nus te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'dus pa chen po lan re re la'ang sems can tshad med grangs
83b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag gis dgra bcom pa thob par gyur par rig par bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i skar ma'i gzugs rnams kyi tshad ni gzung bar nus kyi/
84a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ 'dus pa chen po 'dus pa de dag gi
84a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa chen po'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang lha dang mi de rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa na brel ba med par 'gyur zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi
84a3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa de dag kyang nyin mtshan du brel ba med par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag yon tan
84a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang // gzhan
84a5(dkon brtsegs): d ag kha'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang
84a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa mthong ba dang thos par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par 'gyur zhing / thos
84a7(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang thos ma thag tu dad pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
84b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ / gsung ngo //
84b2(dkon brtsegs): gsung bar 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'khong pa de dag kyang yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam
84b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur te/
84b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
84b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba rnams ma gtogs pa/ gang dag de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu/
84b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phal cher smon lam gyi dbang gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs
84b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa 'am/ skye 'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
85a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na bzhugs shing / phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang
85a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba yin no// shU ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rin po che sna bdun po dag gyur
85a3(dkon brtsegs): pan/ de rin po che sna bdun po de dag gis gling chen po bzhi kun tu gnon par byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
85a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'ang yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag kun tu gnon cing /
85a5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang kun tu gnon par mdzad do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dgra bcom ldan 'das
85a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
85a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam yang 'debs pa de dag 'chi ba
85b1(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug gi bar du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
85b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems can rnams kyis de dag gi smon lam zlog par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/
85b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba las
85b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir ldog pa'i 'jigs pa med par shes par bya'o/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lus la gang dag de las gzhan pa srog gi bar chad byed pa la brtson pa dang
85b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon la sogs pa dag gis kyang phog par mi 'gyur ro// de dag gi lus la gang dag de las gzhan
85b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lag pa'i reg pa dang / bong ba dang / dbyig pa la sogs pa de dag gis kyang phog par mi 'gyur ro// de dag la mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa'ang med par shes par bya ste/
85b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar na de dag ni kun nas bsrungs pa dang / bskyabs pa dang / sbas pa yin par shes par bya'o// gang gi tshe de dag 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na'ang / bcom ldan
86a1(dkon brtsegs): ' das de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba sa
86a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni zag ring pon 'dug kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la sdang bar byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i rtsa
86a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'ang thag ring po na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
86a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ye shes kyi snang ba mdzad do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong
86a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i tshig dang ldan pa ni thag ring pon gnas kyang gzugs kyi kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dag mthong ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
86a6(dkon brtsegs): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'ang thag ring po na 'azhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
86a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyi kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs dag gzigs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa sems kyi dbang ngam
86b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu son pa ni/ thag ring po na gnas kyang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi sems yang dag par shes so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
86b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'ang thag ring po na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
86b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi sems yang dag par mkhyen to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni thag ring po na gnas kyang rna ba'i sgra dag thos so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
86b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'ang thag ring po na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas
86b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba der skye bar bya'o zhes smra ba dag gsan cing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom
86b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi ming dang rus ci yin pa'ang mkhyen
86b7(dkon brtsegs): to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher
87a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des gzigs so/ /
87a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des mkhyen to// de dag ni rnam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'i bar du'ang / bcom
87a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des dgongs par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/
87a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
87a5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongs su gzung ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
87a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dA ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ra dA ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
87a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shin tu yongs su bzung
87b1(dkon brtsegs): bas/ sems can thams cad kyang shin tu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhig la
87b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ 'bras sA lu 'am/ 'bru 'am/ nas sam/ gro 'am/ til lam/ mon sran gre'u 'am/ sran chung ngam/ 'bru'i rnam pa gzhan gang yang rung bas gang
87b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bang ba gcig ga ma/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ brgya 'am/
87b4(dkon brtsegs): stong ngam/ 'bum mam/ shin tu mang po dag cig bdog par gyur na/ de 'di snyam du 'di dag ni mu ge byung ba 'am/ 'phongs par gyur pa na 'di dag gis lo legs par 'gyur ro snyam nas
87b5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu ge byung bar gyur pa na/ sems can rnams kyi gsos su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin
87b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'das pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
87b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / dam pa'i chos kyi mu ger gyur pa'i sems can thams cad la ngas
88a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos bshad pas/ dam pa'i chos kyi lo legs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi lo legs par 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
88a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag bcom ldan 'das de
88a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang
88a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang
88a5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god
88a6(dkon brtsegs): la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir smon lam yang 'debs par byed pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
88a7(dkon brtsegs): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i
88b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la
88b2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam
88b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir smon lam ma btab kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
88b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya ste/ de dag ni rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu bla na med pa yang dag
88b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag bcom ldan
88b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ /
88b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston la/ bzung zhing bcangs la bklags shing kun chub par byas te/
89a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan nas/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag
89a2(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god la/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag
89a3(dkon brtsegs): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed la/ de dag ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de lta de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i
89a4(dkon brtsegs): b u de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi
89a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya ste/ bzung zhing bcangs la bklags shing kun chub par byas nas/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /
89a6(dkon brtsegs): srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag la yang dag par bshad par bya/ yang dag par rab tu
89a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa de lta de ltar shes rab chen por 'gyur
89b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las nye bar sogs par 'gyur te/ de dag shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des lus de nyid kyis zag pa zad pa rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i
89b2(dkon brtsegs): bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan
89b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag
89b4(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu ston par byed la/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya
89b5(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de/ rab tu 'god pa de dag thams cad kyang lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed
89b6(dkon brtsegs): par yang 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par mi 'gyur na'ang / de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las
89b7(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar ni mi 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa de dag
90a1(dkon brtsegs): gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
90a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyan par bya zhing / thos nas kyang gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya zhing / srog
90a3(dkon brtsegs): chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs
90a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ gzud par bya/ rab tu dgod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i rigs kyi bu/
90a5(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams ni lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ngag yon tam
90a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzhan dag la dus dus su yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung
90a7(dkon brtsegs): ba gnyis pa las 'da' bar ni mi 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
90b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta ji ltar 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
90b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de lta de ltar shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las byed par 'gyur zhing sogs par 'gyur ro// de dag shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i
90b3(dkon brtsegs): las byas shing bsags pa des lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par yang 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed
90b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur na'ang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las 'da' bar ni mi 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams

90b6(dkon brtsegs): mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su
90b7(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i
91a1(dkon brtsegs): bu yang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi/
91a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya

91a5(dkon brtsegs): dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni srid pa tha ma la gnas pa 'am/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 'am/ skye ba gnyis kyis thogs pa 'am/ skye ba
91a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyis thogs pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
91a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis thos par mi nus te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs
91b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthus rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung ba zhig gi rna lam du grag par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des kyang myur ba myur bar gzung bar bya
91b2(dkon brtsegs): bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la
91b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis sems can 'ga' zhig gi don gyi phyir/ kye ma sems can 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i
91b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur cig ces 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dbyig dang gser gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin la yongs su btang bar gyur kyang / shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis ni/
91b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan

91b7(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
92a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams kyi lag na gnas par mi 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu
92a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mkhas pa shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa rnams kyi lag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi lag tu chos
92a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa dang / lus la gnas pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che rin thang med par rin che ba gang yang rung ba zhig/
92a4(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas khyer te 'ongs par gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che de dang po kho nar su'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
92a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das rin po che de ni dang po kho nar rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu rnams sam/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po rnams kyi sug par mchi bar 'gyur lags so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de
92a6(dkon brtsegs): b zhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i
92a7(dkon brtsegs): lag tu gnas par 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
92b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya
92b2(dkon brtsegs): cher yang dag par rab tu ston la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag pa nyid du rnal 'byor du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka'
92b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
92b4(dkon brtsegs): mo phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'tshal ba rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod
92b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so//
92b6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i
92b7(dkon brtsegs): slad du'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no//
93a1(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
93a2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par
93a3(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun po dag ni las kyi rnam par
93a4(dkon brtsegs): smin pa las byung ba yin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du ngas 'khor bzhi po rnams la yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yang /
93a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i
93a6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam gyis bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang nyan
93a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/
93b1(dkon brtsegs): papa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas thos shing nyan par 'gyur ba yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu
93b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa drug gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang / dper na ngas da ltar 'khor bzhi po dag la bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa bzhin du
93b3(dkon brtsegs): lhag chad med par 'khor bzhi po dag la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi
93b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
93b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan
93b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ / bcang bar bya// bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par
93b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba la la zhig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
94a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag
94a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par byar mi rnyed par gyur la/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim
94a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba de la gal te la la zhig gis 'di skad du/ gal te rigs kyi bu khyod khyim gyi gnas na gnas shing / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te spyod par byed na/
94a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta na ngas khyod la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sbyin par
94a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes zer na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya ba'i phyir/ gal te chos kyi rnam grangs
94a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di mnyan pa 'am/ gzung 'am/ bcang ba 'am/ bklag pa 'am/ kun chub par bya ba 'am/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par byar rnyed na khyim gyi gnas su song ste/
94a7(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhing kun chub par byas te/ yang phyir mngon par byung yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon
94b1(dkon brtsegs): par byung ba/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba de la ltung ba med par ngas rjes su gnang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de 'das na'ang
94b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /
94b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ thag ring por gyur pa gang zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
94b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des der yang bgrod par bya zhing der phyin nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das
94b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ / bcang bar bya// bklag par bya/
94b6(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das de
94b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ / bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun
95a1(dkon brtsegs): chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o zhes sems bskyed la/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan
95a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod par ni mi nus kyi
95a3(dkon brtsegs): glegs bam du byas pa zhig lag na bsrel bar gyur na/ des glegs bam de brnyas te phyir log nas bdag gi glegs bam bri bar bya'o// gal te glegs bam bskur du mi ster na'ang de nyid du bri bar
95a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de 'di skad du gal te rigs kyi bu khyod zar bcad de 'dri bod na de lta na ngas khyod la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
95a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes zer na'ang / des zan bcad de 'dug la bri bar bya'o// gal te yang
95a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du 'chag cing ris shig ces zer na'ang des 'chag cing bri bar bya'o/ / gal te yang 'di skad du 'greng ste ris shig ces zer na'ang des 'greng ste bri bar bya'o// gal te yang 'di skad du 'dug ste/
95a7(dkon brtsegs): ris shig ces zer na'ang des 'dus ste bri bar bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
95b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i don gyi phyir/ grong ngam/ grong khyer du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
95b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma rnyed par gyur na/ de nas rgyal khams gzhan nam/ yul gzhan dag tu'ang bgrod cing / gang du
95b3(dkon brtsegs): thos par 'gyur ba der 'gro bar bya'o/ / der phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi
95b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya// bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar gang du thos
95b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba der phyin nas/ gal te ma rnyed na'ang des 'di snyam du/ gang gi phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan
95b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'i ming thos par gyur pas na/ bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i 'jigs pa'ang med la/ gang gis da ltar bcom ldan 'das de
95b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'i ming bstan pa de'ang bdag la phan par 'dod pa/ bde bar 'dod pa/
96a1(dkon brtsegs): don du 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin no snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
96a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid
96a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis ngas bshad de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis thos pa dang / gang dag gis thos par 'gyur ba de'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang rang gi dge
96a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tsha dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de
96a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
96a6(dkon brtsegs): su'i mthus thos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu nga 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
96a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid kyi mthus thos
96b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhing / ji ltar dam pa'i chos smra ba dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam
96b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di smra bar 'gyur ba de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang spro ba skye bar 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de
96b3(dkon brtsegs): dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pas kyang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin spro ba skye bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan
96b4(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan
96b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces
96b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
96b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag 'jigs pa 'am/ skrag
97a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan nas brjod na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/
97a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dag med par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te phyogs la la zhig tu 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba bab par 'gyur na/ de 'bab pa na rigs kyi
97a3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan nas brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das de
97a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis klu brgya phrag mang po dang /
97a5(dkon brtsegs): klu stong phrag mang po dang / klu brgya stong phrag mang po dang / klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag thar par mdzad cing / thar par mdzad nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di
97a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar yongs su bsngos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu klu
97a7(dkon brtsegs): khro bo dag gis 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba 'bebs par byed pas/ de na sems can gang dag 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa de dag bdag gi mtshan nas brjod par 'gyur zhing / der yang bdag
97b1(dkon brtsegs): gis mthus 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba de dag nye bar zhi bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngos pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag la 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba 'bab pa 'di
97b2(dkon brtsegs): dag nye bar zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam gyis na/ klu rnams kyi 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba de dag nye bar zhi bar 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag gi sngoran gyi las kyi rnam par
97b3(dkon brtsegs): smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag 'jigs pa 'am/ skrag pa 'am/ yams kyi nang dam/ gnod pa byung bar gyur pa
97b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de rjes su dran par bya zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
97b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis dam bcas pa dang / tshig brjod pa gang yin pa'i
97b6(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa dang / tshig brjod pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ dam bcas pa dang tshig brjod pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
97b7(dkon brtsegs): des/ 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa 'di dag nub par gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa de dag dang / skrag pa de dag dang / yams kyi
98a1(dkon brtsegs): nad de dag dang / gnod pa de dag nub par 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// de skad ces bka' stsal
98a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

98a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
98a5(dkon brtsegs): p a yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
98a6(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa
98a7(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
98b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
98b2(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
98b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba de ltar gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba
98b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyung ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad bla na med pa
98b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas pa nyid kyang mtshungs/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtshungs
98b6(dkon brtsegs): kha dog kyang mtshungs/ rtags kyang mtshungs/ rigs kyang mtshungs/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par yang mtshungs/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'dus pa'ang mtshungs/ de dag
98b7(dkon brtsegs): gi rnam par grol ba'ang mtshungs mod kyi/ gzhan du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa tha dad par 'gyur ba dang / seng ge'i khri tha dad pa dang / padz+ra
99a1(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor tha dad par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do/ / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams shar phyogs su bcom
99a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de
99a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
99a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dir bshad pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
99a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag
99a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ / phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dang /
99a7(dkon brtsegs): man+da ra ba chen po dang / lha'i spos ngag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu
99b1(dkon brtsegs): gtor ro/ / mngon par gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog de dag dang / spos de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la me tog gi gdugs chen por gnas par gyur to// gzhan
99b2(dkon brtsegs): yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya/
99b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su me tog dag gis gtor bar gyur to//
99b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po 'di dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha 'di dag dang / tshangs ris kyi lha 'di dag gis
99b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de mthong bar 'gyur bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
99b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/
99b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags
100a1(dkon brtsegs): nas bar snang la 'khod par gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'dod par spyod pa'i lha de dag dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags
100a2(dkon brtsegs): nas bar snang la 'khod par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
100a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pas 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
100a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
100a5(dkon brtsegs): de'ang mthong bar gyur to/ / mthong nas kyang de dag thams cad pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga steng gi bar snang la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
100a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
100a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ / de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
100b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mi rnams mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha'i kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs dang ldan pa 'di dag ci/ sum cu
100b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la blta ba dang / phyag
100b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa'i lha rnams yin nam/ 'on te 'di dag mi yin snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te
100b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni lha yin te/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi'i cha lugs dang rtags 'dzin cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
100b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis sngon chad mi rnams la 'di lta bu'i mdzes pa dang / dpal dang / skal ba bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dag lan
100b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang ma mthong ma thos pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag slar bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
100b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag the tshom dang bcas/ yid gnyis dang bcas par thugs su chud nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka'
101a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
101a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i mi 'di dag ni lha'i nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa dag dang ldan pa yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ mi gang dag gis
101a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyang mthong la lha'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang ldan pa'i mi de dag ni lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'dod par bya ba yin no// gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams
101a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i
101a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba'i mi de dag kyang 'dod par bya ba yin no snyam mo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus// lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras
101a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ / ko'u shi ka gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mthong zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
101a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'ang mthong bas na/ ko'u shi ka gal te de tsam gyis kyang khyod kyi lus kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/ ko'u shi ka
101b1(dkon brtsegs): gang khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba'i rnyed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag gi rna ba'i lam du yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i
101b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
101b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni rnyed pa
101b4(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnyed pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka srog chags gang dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing
101b5(dkon brtsegs): der skye bar sems bskyed na/ de dag ni de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ji lta ba de ltar gzung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
101b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga stong tsam ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong brgya stong gis ni sangs
101b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/ / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong ma lnga stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
102a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge snyen brgyad stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/ / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bsnyen ma khris kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
102a2(dkon brtsegs): der skye bar smon lam btab bo/ / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab te/ de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin
102a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan to/ / /
102a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de las gzhan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
102a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar lung ston par 'gyur te/ lung bstan nas kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
102a6(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu
102a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu
102b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem zhing / 'jig rten du snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
102b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag
102b3(dkon brtsegs): po tshangs pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
102b4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug pa
102b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs so/ / sh+loka stong lnga brgya bzhi bcu ste/ bam po lnga'o// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur
102b6(dkon brtsegs): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/
102b7(dkon brtsegs): cha'i bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
103a1(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas 'od ma'i tshal na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
103a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa shA stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing gus pas
103a3(dkon brtsegs): rim gro dang bkur sti byas par gyur to/ / de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur pa de 'dug pa'i
103a4(dkon brtsegs): stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ spyi bo btud de phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
103a5(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tshom cung zad cig mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'tshal na/ thugs rjes gnang bar mdzad cing bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces
103a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dpa' chen skyes bu chen po ste/ 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis//
103a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sems can dag gi slad/ the tshom cung zad zhu ba lags/ seng ge'i gdan la ma bzhengs par/ sku ni phyogs bcu kun tu khyab/ tha dad smra ba thams cad kyis/ gang yang bskul bar mi 'gyur
103b1(dkon brtsegs): bar/ mkhyen pa'i gter ni mtha' mi mnga'/ stobs rnams kyang ni tshad ma mchis/ bcom ldan stobs ni re res kyang / 'jig rten ma lus sgrol bar mdzad/ thams cad mkhyen la rab gnas shing //
103b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu la ni gang gnas pa/ mi 'jigs seng ge chen po ste/ rgyal ba bla na med pa'i gtso// ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyad dag/ de bzhin gshegs la mnga' bas na/ 'jig rten rnams ni gsal
103b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad cing / mu stegs rnams ni pham par mdzad// chos rnams thams cad rab mkhyen pas/ de slad mtha' med mchog ces bgyi/ nyams mi mnga' ba'i 'dren pa la/ bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags//
103b4(dkon brtsegs): dri med mkhyen pa mtha' med pa// mkhyen pa mi g.yo rgya mtsho bzhin// mkhyen pa yul la thogs mi mnga'// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// bcom ldan legs par bsgoms pas na// lam la the
103b5(dkon brtsegs): tsom yod mi mnga'/ / bder gnas 'dren pa chen po la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// chu bo dag ni rab brgal cing // mtshams sbyor 'ching ba yongs bcad pa// gdug pa'i zug rngu 'byin pa la//
103b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs bcom zhing // nyon mongs gdung ba nyer zhi ba// shin tu bsil la rab gnas la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// 'jigs med ye
103b7(dkon brtsegs): shes bla med dang / / ye shes chags dang thogs med pa// chos kyi rgya mtsho'i mkhyen pa rnams// de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum brnyes// sangs rgyas yon tan tshad med pas// mngon sum
104a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs/ / zag bcas thams cad zad gyur cing // nyon mongs lta ba rab bcom pa// bcom ldan yon tan tshad med pa// mang po dag ni rab tu
104a2(dkon brtsegs): bsags/ / bsam gyis mi khyab chos rje la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// bcom ldan mchog gi mkhyen pa yis// 'jig rten kun ni gsal bar mdzad// chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad/
104a3(dkon brtsegs): pas/ yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' mi mnga'// 'dren pa'i chos kyi 'od zer gyis// 'jig rten kun tu gsal bar mdzad// de slad 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi// chos kyi 'od zer snang ba
104a4(dkon brtsegs): lags/ / chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyen// spobs pa dag ni bla na med// brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab cing // rnam dag lta ba rab spangs pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni mtha' med
104a5(dkon brtsegs): pas/ / mkhyen pa'i yul yang mtha' mi mngal// 'jig rten mtshungs med gtso bo la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// chos rgyal thub pa chen po yis// sems can the tshom gcod par
104a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ / 'dren pa la ni bdag zhun// mos pa ji bzhin bkrus bshad gsol// lha dang mi yi 'jig rten kun// thams cad bdag gis rab brtags na// de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs
104a7(dkon brtsegs): med pas/ / thams cad ma lus gsal bar mdzad// yon tan rnams la rab gnas shing // rgyan dang ldan pa'i skyes chen lags// bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal// drang srong nang na
104b1(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba po/ / dper na gangs ri chen po ni// rin chen kun gyis bkod pa'i gnas// bcom ldan chos gdan bzhugs pa yi// bkod pa dag kyang de bzhin no// rab dbyangs brtson 'grus
104b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po yis/ / yid 'ong sgra ni ston mdzad pas// sems can gang dag thos gyur na// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam dag gyur// bcom ldan mi yi mchog lags pas// chos kyi snang ba ston par
104b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ / des na sems can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin blo ni bde bar 'gyur// dus dang 'khor ni rab mkhyen cing // gang zag mkhyen pa 'dren pa yis// chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad pas//
104b4(dkon brtsegs): dus mkhyen pa yi blo ldan lags// tshangs skad brtson 'grus chen po yis// rnam dag gsung ni bkas bshad gsol// char chen sa la babs pa ltar// chos kyi rlan gyis khyab par mdzod//
104b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'khor 'dus nang bzhugs te// kun tu chos kyi char phab nas// chos 'di la ni gang re ba// sems can rnams ni tshim par mdzod// mchog tu bde la rab gnas pas/
104b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ri rab ji lta bzhin// sems can rnams la sbyin mdzad cing // mang po rnams ni dga' bar mdzod// dpa' chen rkang gnyis gtso dag gi/ spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas//
104b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni thams cad kyis// gang yang 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes bu chen po tshad ma mchis// 'khor 'dus 'thun par gyur pa dag/ thub pa che la brten nas ni// sangs rgyas
105a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul tshol ba lags/ / bdag ni sangs rgyas spyod yul la// gzhol ba'i slad du 'dir mchis na// 'dren pa mkhyen pa thogs mi mnga'// ji ltar myur du dbye mi
105a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ / bdag ni de yis mos pa bzhin// zhal du bltas nas zhu lags na// bcom ldan thugs rje rab phye nas// the tsom rnams ni gcad du gsol// bla med chos ni thos gyur na// sems
105a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ / lus ni dga' bas khyab gyur nas// the tshom dra ba chad par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po bla med gtso// thams cad mkhyen pa 'jigs mi mnga'// thams cad
105a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen cing gzigs pa la/ / bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// sangs rgyas chos ni thams cad la// the tshom cung zad yongs mi mnga'// rab brtson 'dren pa chen po la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba
105a5(dkon brtsegs): lags/ / bla med the tshom chad papo// chos la the tshom mi mnga' ba// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// snang ba chen po dpag med dang // yon tan chen po
105a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag med dang / / rnam dag mkhyen pa dpag med la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// brtson 'grus mkhyen pa dpag med dang // spyod yul mkhyen pa dpag med dang // phan 'dogs
105a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa dpag med la/ / bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// bcom ldan mkhyen pa mtha' med kyang // mtha' dang mtha' med rab tu spangs// the tshom thams cad gcod pa la// bdag ni the
105b1(dkon brtsegs): chotshom zhu ba lags/ / bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal// thugs rjes zhu ba gsan du gsol// gnang bar mdzad na bdag zhun// thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol// thams cad
105b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa shAkya'i gtso/ / grags chen la ni zhu ba lags// gal te thugs rjes gnang 'gyur na// the tshom dra ba gcad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
105b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros mtha' yas/ deng khyed kyis nga'i zhal du bltas nas sems rtse gcig tu gsol ba 'debs pa 'dis/
105b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba du zhig zhu bar sems/ gal te zhu ba yod na ngas bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de
105b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ blo gros mtha' yas khyod kyis ni// nga la ci zhig 'dri bar sems// de bzhin du ni zhus shig dang // ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya// khyod kyis ji skad dris pa bzhin//
105b6(dkon brtsegs): rere nas ni gsal phye nas// ji ltar mos dang 'dun pa bzhin// myur du phye ste rab bshad do// ngas ni khyod la rab bshad kyis// thams cad the tshom med par byos// ji ltar khyod kyis
105b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa bzhin/ / khyod kyi nus dang 'tsham par bshad// deng khyod dus bzhin zhu bar gyis// dus dang don ni ji lta bzhin// dus bzhin du ni zhus pa'i phyir// ngas ni nges par rab bshad
106a1(dkon brtsegs): do/ / ji ltar khyod kyis mos pa bzhin// zhu ba dag ni zhus shig dang // ngas ni thams cad rjes 'thun par// khyod la rab tu bshad par bya// deng khyod dus
106a2(dkon brtsegs): su zhus shig dang / / ngas kyang dus bzhin bshad par bya// the tshom dra ba gcad pas na// the tshom med pa 'thob par 'gyur// nga ni chos kyi rjer gyur pas// don ni mthar phyin thugs
106a3(dkon brtsegs): su chud/ / chos rnams thams cad dag la yang // the tshom med pa brnyes pa yin// nga ni chos rnams thams cad las// mngon sangs rgyas pas bsam dka' yin// sems can
106a4(dkon brtsegs): mos pa ji bzhin du/ / zhus pa dag ni ston par mdzad// nga ni chos rnams thams cad la// thogs pa dag ni mi mnga' bas// dus bzhin du ni zhus pa la// myur du bshad pa mdzad
106a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ / ngas ni dus bzhin rab bshad cing // the tshom dag ni mi mnga' bas// de yis mos pa ji lta bar// de yi the tshom gcod par mdzad// nga ni rtag tu dus rnams dang //
106a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dus pa yi bsam pa dang // sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// bsam pa tha dad mkhyen pa yin// rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// 'dod pa dang ni 'dod med pa// so sor rab
106a7(dkon brtsegs): tu brtags nas ni/ / de dag gsal bar gzigs pa yin// gal te blo dang ldan pa rnams// legs pa nyid du bsgrubs byas na// nga yi dus dang sbyar nas ni// yang dag chos ston go bar
106b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ / blo dang mi ldan de dag ni// gti mug dag gis rmongs dkrugs shing // de dag shes rab snang med pas// yang dag chos la gus mi 'gyur// gal te gus pa med gyur na/
106b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag chos ni tshol mi byed// chos 'di thob par gyur kyang ni// snang ba chen po'i shes mi skye// gang zhig chos la mkhas 'gyur ba// chos la mos shing tshol bar byed// gal te
106b3(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di thos 'gyur na/ / rang snang ye shes thob par 'gyur// theg chen dag la mos pa ni// mi yi gtso bo tshol byed pas// rang snang ye shes thob par 'gyur// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer
106b4(dkon brtsegs): bapa dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes la// gzhol ba gang yin de dag ni// thos pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// thogs med ye shes la mos dang // bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer ba
106b5(dkon brtsegs): dag/ des ni chos 'di thos gyur na// bla med ye shes thob par 'gyur// sems can dag nI la la zhig/ byang chub snying po tshol ba dang // bla med 'khor lo bskor 'dod pa// chos 'di
106b6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas dga' bar 'gyur/ / mos shing rab tu brtson pa dang // chos la gtso bor gang 'dzin pa// dri med chos ni thos gyur na// mos shing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// gal te sems
106b7(dkon brtsegs): can la la dag/ legs par bsgrubs par mos gyur pa// chos kyi 'od zer snang ba yi// bla med chos 'di bstan par bya// khur lci rnams ni khyer ba dang // nan tan bsgrub la gang mos pa/
107a1(dkon brtsegs): des ni chos 'di thos gyur na// dga' bas kun tu khyab par 'gyur// gang zhig rab tu mos pa yis// dge ba'i chos ni sems byed na// de la snying brtse bsam
107a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhag nas/ / rab tu phye nas bstan par bya// khyod la sogs la thugs brtse'i phyir// khyod kyis ji skad zhus pa bzhin// ngas kyang yang dag nges par ni// khyod kyi the tshom gcad par
107a3(dkon brtsegs): bya/ / ngas ni lo mang stong phrag tu// thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms shing // the tshom dag ni bsal bas na// khyod kyi mos pa rab tu mkhyen// gal te the tshom yod gyur na// ji//
107a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis// khyod la rab tu bsnun pas na// the tshom rnams ni chad par bya// gal te the tshom yod gyur na// ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis// ji ltar mos pa bzhin
107a5(dkon brtsegs): du ni/ / ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya// gal te the tshom yod gyur na// ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis// nga ni chos la rab gnas pas// g.yo ba med pa brnyes pa yi//
107a6(dkon brtsegs): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
107a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa las the tshom cung zad cig mchis pa deng zhu ba lags na/ / ji ltar na skyes bu dam pa 'jig pa spangs nas/ yang
107b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par sems rtse gcig tu sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha chen po bgos nas/ go cha chen pos rab tu brgyan pa dang / mos pa chen po bskyed nas gus par bgyid pa dang / bag yod pa
107b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pas theg pa chen po 'di la 'tshal nas/ shin tu rnam par dag pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi shul mtho dman dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / mi gtsang ba rnam pasnga
107b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi lta ba'i thibs po rnams ma mchis pa/ zug rngu gdug pa'i sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa'i g.yang sa ma mchis pa/ 'ching ba dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang
107b4(dkon brtsegs): bar chad ma mchis pa/ drang zhing gya gyu ma mchis pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi shul dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shul du zhugs nas/ lta ba'i thibs po
107b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams gcad pa dang / dra ba thams cad dral ba dang / mun nag rnams bsal ba dang / sred pa'i mngon par zhen pa rnams spang ba dang / 'du 'phro rnams spang ba'i slad
107b6(dkon brtsegs): du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
107b7(dkon brtsegs): la bdag don 'di'i slad du zhu ba gsol ba lags so/ / skyes bu dam pa ji lta bus go cha chen po ji lta bu bgos na/ go cha chen po bgos pa 'dis theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas/
108a1(dkon brtsegs): lam chen po 'dis gzhol zhing yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha'i bkod
108a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gang lags pa dang / lam la gnas pa dang / chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa la gnas pa gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/ chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa la rab tu gnas pas ni/
108a3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i snang ba bskyed par 'gyur la/ chos kyi snang ba'i dbang gis ni go cha mi spong bar theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas/ nur ba ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs
108a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / brjed ngas pa ma mchis pa'i dbang po dang / rgyun chad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis myur du chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la gsal bar mkhas pa mngon par bsgrubs nas/
108a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams la yang dag par chos ston pa'i slad du sems can thams cad ji ltar mos pa dang / ji ltar gzhol
108a6(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du 'khor ba las rnam par grol bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'dis sems can rnams la sman pa dang bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa
108a7(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di zhu lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa lags na//
108b1(dkon brtsegs): chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi brgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i dbang gis byang chub
