193b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la/ / mnyam pa nyid du ston byed pa// mnyam pa nyid la rtag gnas pa// 'di ni so sor rtog pa yin// tshig gis bstan pa'i chos rnams la// tshul bzhin du ni shes
193b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba/ / rjes 'thun rab tu thob pas ni// 'di ni thabs dang ldan zhes bya// rtsod pa'i smra ba mi skyed cing // rtsod pa'i rgyu rkyen mi byed pa// thams cad 'gal bar mi byed pas//
193b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rjes 'thun zhes bya'o// rtag tu rtsod pa med skyed cing // rtsod pa med dang mtshungs ldan pa// mnyam zhing 'gal ba mi byed pas// 'di ni blo ldan zhes bya'o// chos rnams kun gyi tshul
194a1(dkon brtsegs): dag la/ / rtsod par smra ba nyer zhi zhing // go bgos tshul bzhin gang sgrub pa// 'di ni dpa' bo zhes bya'o// de ltar so sor rab brtags nas// gcig tu rtsod pa
194a2(dkon brtsegs): med gyur pa/ / 'khor 'dus mang po rnams su ni// bla med chos ni bsngags par 'gyur// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyi// phyag rgya ting 'dzin
194a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon sgrub pa/ / 'di ni yang dag dran ldan yin// 'di ltar gcig tu rtsod pa med// nan tan gyis ni sgrub byed cing // rtsod smra nyer zhi mtshungs ldan pa// ting 'dzin 'di ni rdzogs par byed//
194a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin du ni rab gnas shing // gsang ste gsungs pa gang shes pa// bdag dang nga rgyal shes pas ni// nga rgyal sems mtho spong bar byed// nges par gsungs pa'i gsung ra ba las/
194a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas yongs su rdzogs byed cing // bye brag ming ni gang shes pa// 'di ni blo ldan zhes bya'o// chos rnams kun gyi tshul la ni// tshul bzhin nan tan gang sgrub pa// chos rnams kun gyi sgo//
194a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong bas// 'di ni chos mthong zhes bya'o// de ltar nan tan gang sgrub pa// chos gang mtshungs par ldan pa dang // chos gang mtshungs par mi ldan pa// chos de thams cad shes par 'gyur//
194a7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad kun la ni// las ni dag par gang dran pa// nges par gsungs pa'i don dag la// thabs mkhas pa ni thob par 'gyur// chos rnams thams cad kun la ni// brtson
194b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus bskyed nas gang sems pa/ / chos rnams thams cad rtogs pas na// ting 'dzin 'di ni 'thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
194b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams chos 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par byed na/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gyis chos yongs su sdud par 'gyur gyis/ legs par nyon la/ yid la zung zhig dang ngas yang dag par bshad par bya'o//
194b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
194b4(dkon brtsegs): to/ / blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos kyi sdang ba'i sgo yod de/ chos kyi tshul la thabs mkhas pa 'byung bar byed do// chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya rab tu 'byung
194b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ / chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi bya ba rnams khong du chud cing rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ro// chos kyi snang ba 'thob par nus shing yang dag par rab
194b6(dkon brtsegs): tu ston par byed do/ / chos kyi snang ba'i dbang gis chos kyi tshig gi sgo rnams la rjes su gzhol bar byed do// thabs mkhas pa'i snang ba yang dag par 'byung bar byed pa'i chos kyi snang ba'i sgo de'ang gang zhe na/
194b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ ming tha dad pa bstan pa'i sgo dang // gsang ba bsdams pa'i sgo dang / ming tha dad pa'i dngos po'i sgo dang / dngos po yongs su bsdu ba'i sgo dang / bye brag rnams kyi sgo rab tu rtogs pa gang yin
195a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / ji ltar de dag khong du chud nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yang dag par skye bar 'gyur zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi sgo thams cad ni don gcig tu 'jug par 'gyur
195a2(dkon brtsegs): bas/ chos kyi snang ba rnams rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro// blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos zab mo'i tshul la thabs mkhas pa 'di sgrub par byed pa dang /
195a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su tshol ba dang / yongs su tshol bar 'gyur ba de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob par gyur na/ sbyor ba chung ngus snang ba chen po thob nas/ chos kyi sgor rab tu 'jug par
195a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi sgo 'di las kyang yang snang ba byung nas/ snang ba des kyang chos kyi sgo ji lta bu dang / spyod pa ji lta bu bzhin du rjes su 'jug cing rjes su spyod par 'gyur bas/ tshul ji lta ba bzhin
195a5(dkon brtsegs): du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis chos kyi sgo rnams la so sor rab tu rtogs par byed de/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas shes rab skyes pas kyang de kho na nyid kyi tshul gang yin pa dag rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te/
195a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu'i phyir dang / chos kyi sgo la so sor rab tu rtogs par byed pa'i phyir dang / shes rab skyed par byed pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas chos kyi dbyings rtogs shing thabs mkhas pa
195a7(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par 'gyur bas/ chos kyi sgo'i snang ba thams cad rab tu bskyed pa dang / chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// blo gros
195b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas chos kyi sgo zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge a zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas/ ma rig pas mngon par 'dus byas pas 'du byed yongs su
195b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa/ yi ge a zhes bya ba sngon du 'gro bas/ ma rig pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ gnas par bya ba ci'ang med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ / yi ge i zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang /
195b4(dkon brtsegs): las kyi bya ba dang / las dang / las kyi 'bras bu dang / tshogs pa rnams 'grub par byed pa dang / las dang / 'bras bu dang / tshogs pa dang / rkyen rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/
195b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las med pa dang / 'bras bu med pa dang / tshogs pa med pa dang // rkyen med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// 'di ltar 'du byed rnams
195b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas/ las rnam pa sna tshogs dang / las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dag las chos kyi ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad rab tu skyed par byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub/
195b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'du byed thams cad la thabs mkhas pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// 'di ltar yi ge d+ha zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas
196a1(dkon brtsegs): yi ge ma zhes bya bas ming dang tshig tu gdags pa'i grogs byas pas/ chos sna tshogs dang mtshungs par ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge d+ha dang mas grogs byas par rab tu
196a2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pa med pa dang / grogs med pa dang / ming med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// 'di ltar phyag rgya dpag/
196a3(dkon brtsegs): tu med pas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi dmigs shing / rnam par rtog pa yongs su spong bar byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
196a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ / 'di ltar mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas/ mtha' 'dus pa med cing mtha' yongs su zad par byed pa'i
196a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa dang / tshig med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// 'di ltar rang bzhin sna tshogs med pa'i phyag rgyas chos
196a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas/ / rang bzhin gcig gis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i mtshan ma dang / rang bzhin sna tshogs kyis 'du shes rab tu sel bar byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
196a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ / 'od ltar 'dun pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas/ 'dus byas kyi spyod pa'i mngon du byung
196b1(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'dod pa spangs nas rab tu dben par gyur pa dang / tshogs pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dod pa zad par byed
196b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / tshogs pa med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya ste/ blo gros mtha' yas 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgos chos thams cad byas
196b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas btab pa yin te/ phyag rgya'i sgo 'dis chos thams cad la rab tu 'jug par byed do// blo gros mtha' yas gzhan yang thogs pa med pa'i sgo dang / rjes su 'thun pa med pa'i sgo zhes
196b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis khong du chud par byas nas rjes su 'jug par bya'o// de la thogs pa med pa'i sgo dang / tshogs pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba gang yin zhe na/
196b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par zhen pa med pas phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// 'di ltar
196b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dben pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// 'di ltar rab tu zhi ba'i
196b7(dkon brtsegs): phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu zhi ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// 'di ltar rnam par phye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas
197a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams g.yo ba med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// 'di ltar
197a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o//
197a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thob pa med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// mtshan
197a4(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas sgom pa'i phyag rgyas sgor 'jug par bya'o//
197a5(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu zhi ba'i smon lam gyi snang ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par
197a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / 'dod chags med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rnam par rtog pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin
197a7(dkon brtsegs): du yongs su shes pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ / skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
197b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i shes pa dang / mthong ba skye ba dang / skye ba med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/
197b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams phung po yongs su spong ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// mtshan ma zad par byed pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin
197b3(dkon brtsegs): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba zad par byed pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin
197b4(dkon brtsegs): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs pa la mkhas pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// rjes su dran pa med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams
197b5(dkon brtsegs): cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag par rnam par rtog pa med cing / mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// ngo
197b6(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin thams cad yongs su shes pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o//
197b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhi ba dang / 'gog
198a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya ste/ blo gros mtha' yas 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la
198a2(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa'i sgo dang / rjes su 'thun pa'i sgo dang / rtag pa dang chad par lta ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sgo dang / mtha' med pa'i sgo dang / sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' med pa'i
198a3(dkon brtsegs): sgo yin te/ 'di ltar yongs su skyo bar gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'gog par byed pa'i phyir dang / zhi bar byed pa'i phyir dang / bsil bar byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
198a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i sgo 'di'i rjes su bslab par bya/ rjes su 'jug par bya/ legs par bsgom par bya'o// chos kyi sgo 'di rnams kyis ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting
198a5(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin thams cad rab tu thob par byed do/ / ting nge 'dzin 'di dang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'thun par gyur na/ chos rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i shes pa yongs su sdud par byed do//
198a6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis phyag rgya'i sgo 'di legs par bsgoms nas/ chos kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gnas te/ chos thams cad la
198a7(dkon brtsegs): so sor rab tu rtogs par byed na/ chos kyi snang ba chen po tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa skye zhing rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// blo gros mtha' yas 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho
198b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i chu ni tshad med pas/ de'i tshad gang gis kyang dpag par mi nus so// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang tshad med pas/ gang gis kyang de'i tshang dpag par mi nus so// gzhan yang 'di lta
198b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na chu klung thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen por 'bab cing 'jug par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang chos kyi phyag rgyar 'jug par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ste/
198b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas/ chos rnams kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar zhugs par gyur na/ phyag rgya 'dis chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgya dang mtshungs par mthong bas so// gzhan yang 'di lta
198b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na klu chen po dang / klu'i 'khor lus chen po dang ldan pa rnams ni rgya mtsho dang ldan zhing rgya mtshor 'jug par nus pas/ rgya mtsho chen po de dag la gnas su byed do// byang chub sems
198b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du theg pa rnams legs par bsgoms pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i sgo 'dir 'jug par nus shing / phyag
198b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya'i sgo 'di nyid la gnas su byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon du bya ba'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa legs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ chos rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgo
198b7(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu dag mngon par sgrub par byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi sgo 'di nan tan gyis sgrub par byed na/ chos thams cad kyi sgo la yang dag par slob par
199a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi sgo rnams chos kyi sgo 'dir 'du bar mthong ba'i phyir/ chos kyi snang ba rnams bskyed nas/ chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur
199a2(dkon brtsegs): bas/ de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po che chen po rnams 'du
199a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no/ / ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang de bzhin du chos thams cad dang chos la thabs mkhas pa rnams 'du ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no// blo gros mtha' yas sems cad gang
199a4(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa bla na med pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su tshol bar gyur pa dang / yongs su tshol bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su tshol
199a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa de dag ni chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa'i shes rab thams cad yongs su tshol bar byed pa yin pas/ don de'i phyir ngas chos kyi phyag rgya 'di khyod la gtad pa yin gyis/ khyod kyis kyang ma 'ongs
199a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la yang dag pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis sems can rnams la yongs su gdab par bya'o// chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis gang la btab par gyur na/ de dag thams cad
199a7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ myur du byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor
199b1(dkon brtsegs): lo bskor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gdung bsab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la rjes su 'thun par gnas pa dang / bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
199b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang mi rnams kyang yang dag pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la gzud par byed do// blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu yongs su sdud
199b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa des chos zab mo 'di la nan tan gyis bslab par bya zhing bag yod pa dang ldan par bya'o/ / gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon 'das pa'i bskal
199b4(dkon brtsegs): pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
199b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi 'od las yang dag par 'das pa'i rgyal po zhes bya/
199b6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bskal pa'i ming ni dge ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ni yid dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o// bskal pa de'i sems can rnams
199b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe ring zhing tshe'i tshad med pa dang / rab tu bde zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos la rab tu gnas pas de'i phyir bskal pa de'i ming dge ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o// sangs
200a1(dkon brtsegs): @#rgyas kyi zhing de yangs shing rgya che ba dang / shin tu mdzes pas mthong ba rnams yid bde zhing dga' bar byed pa dang / spos kyi ngad ldang bas kun tu khyab par byed pas/ de'i
200a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de yi dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ / de'i tshe gling bzhi las gling gsum gyis tshad mnyam pa ste/ dpag tshad brgyad khri brgyad khri yod do// gling re re na'ang grong khyer nyi khri nyi khri yod
200a3(dkon brtsegs): de/ grong khyer re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad bcu bcu yod do// 'dzam bu gling gi tshad ni dpag tshad bye ba yod do// de na grong khyer brgyad khri yod de/ grong khyer de re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu nyi shu yod do//
200a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang gzhal med khang brtsegs ma dang / ra bas 'khor bar bskor ba/ gos sna tshogs 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang / ro sna tshogs 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi shing ljon
200a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rin po che'i shing ta la dag gis rab tu brgyan pa/ yul bde zhing mis rab tu gang bar gyur to// de na grong khyer mchog tu che ba dpag tshad brgyas 'khor ba yod de/ de'ang skyed mos tshal
200a6(dkon brtsegs): nyi khris 'khor bar bskor ba/ skyed mos tshal de kun tu 'anga' bab chu dag rab tu 'bab cing / me tog dang 'bras bu dag rab tu rgyas pa/ spos mchog dam pa'i ngad ldang bas yid dga' bar byed pa
200a7(dkon brtsegs): bya dang ri dgas rnams sgra snyan pa 'byin pas rab tu gang bar gyur to/ / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de skyed mos tshal de gcig tu bzhugs nas 'khor rnams la chos bstan par gyur to//
200b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi 'od las yang dag par 'das pa'i rgyal po'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa chung ngu bcu thub par gyur to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang dam pa'i chos
200b2(dkon brtsegs): ni bskal pa chung ngu gcig gi bar du 'jig rten du gnas par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa des 'khor 'dus pa la lan bzhir chos bstan te/ 'khor 'dus pa re re la'ang nyan thos slob pa'i sa la gnas
200b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga lnga yod do/ / dgra bcom pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga bcu lnga bcu yod do// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis yod de//
200b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig gi ming ni dpa' bo'i sde zhes bya'o// gcig gi ming ni dpa' bo'i stobs shes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yin pas/
200b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos ji lta bu zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyi rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su
200b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des tshig gi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' stong
200b7(dkon brtsegs): phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos kyis bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par
201a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ / chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu
201a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang / 'od zer chen po bkye ba dang / tshangs pa'i sgra shin tu gya nom pa bsgrags nas/ sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i chos bstan cing yongs su smin par byas pas/
201a3(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad du khyed bskal pa rgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na
201a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa de re re la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga brgya la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / de bzhin
201a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de dag gis dus par mar gsungs pa'i chos yang dag pa gang yin pa dang / dus tha mar gsungs pa'i chos yang dag pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par yongs su bzung nas/
201a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la phan pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// bskal pa re re la'ang sems rtse gcig tu gyur cing / rnam par g.yeng ba med pas skye ba thams cad du'ang rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//
201a7(dkon brtsegs): skye ba thams cad du'ang ting nge 'dzin las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / rdzu 'phrul gyi chos ston pas sems can mang po rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlos par 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya 'das nas gzhan yang
201b1(dkon brtsegs): / de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba la mchod pa dang rim gro byas pas/ ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa tshad med pa rnams la rnam par rtsen par 'gyur ro zhes
201b2(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan to/ / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe/ gcig gi ming ni mya ngan med pa zhes bya'o// gcig gi ming ni rab tu gnas pa
201b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams btul te/ theg pa gsum po dag la rab tu bkod pas/ de'i tshe de bzhin
201b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa des kyang 'di skad du/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu mya ngan med pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin
201b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa spobs pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rab tu gnas pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
201b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa re re thub par 'gyur
201b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang yon tan tshad med pa bsags pa las mngon par grub pa yin no zhes lung bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lung bstan pa
202a1(dkon brtsegs): thob pas/ rims kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po gang chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'a thob par 'dod pas rab tu dga' ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas/ lus dang srog la 'phangs pa med pa dang / bag yod pas
202a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ / de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur pa de 'dug pa'i stan las langs
202a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad kyi ye shes la thabs mkhas pa 'thob par
202a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom
202a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob par gyur na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar chos rnams kyi tshul la thabs mkhas pa thob nas/ myur du byang chub kyi snying por mchis par 'gyur/
202a7(dkon brtsegs): bas/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu ma mchis pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhol bar bgyid pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams mthong zhing nan tan gyis chos yang dag par
202b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrub pa dang / dge 'dun dang spyod pa mtshungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa chen po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rurlung rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur
202b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
202b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du don gyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur na yon tan khyad par du
202b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa tshad med pa rnams rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par gyur na/ chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la
202b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pas gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ / don gyi blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri reb ni rin po che sna tshogs las
202b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par grub pas rgya mtsho chen po las dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gis gyen du 'phags shing mchog tu gsal bar gnas so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du ting nge
202b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin 'dis legs par gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi gter gyi rgya mtsho chen po thams cad mngon par 'phags nas/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon cing
203a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i gnas pas mchog tu gsal bar gnas so/ / gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni skar ma'i tshogs mang pos yongs su bskor ba
203a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu gsal bar gnas so// don gyi blo
203a3(dkon brtsegs): gros khyod kyis chos 'di thos par gyur na/ 'di la su'ang mi dga' zhing mos pa mi skye ba 'am/ brtson 'grus mi bskyed pa 'am/ bag yod pa dang bcas par mi gyur pa gang yang med par blta bar bya ste/
203a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can bsod nams chung zhing / dman pa la mos pa ni ma gtogs so// sems can gang shes rab chen po dang ldan pa dag gis chos rgya chen po 'di mngon par sgrub par byed la/ chos rgya chen po
203a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ ngas ji skad du gang gis chos kyi nor rgya chen po 'di yongs su 'dzin par
203a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams kyis yongs su srung zhing rim gro byed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rjes su dgongs par 'gyur ro zhes lung
203a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa lta bu'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros mtha' yas
203b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub cing slob par byed pa de dag ni/ sems can rnams la phan pa chen po byed cing / the tshom thams cad rab tu sel/
203b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mdud pa thams cad rab tu dgrol ba dang / bag chags rnams spong ba dang / bag la nyal ba rnams gcod pa dang / sred pa'i dga' ba rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang / srid pa'i
203b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho las yang dag par rgal ba dang / mun nag rnams gtan du bsal ba dang / skrag cing 'jigs pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyis sems rab tu shes
203b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'od zer chen po bkye bas/ 'od zer des 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gsal bar mdzad cing /
203b5(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zer thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan to// 'od zer bkye nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros
203b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po rab tu ston cing / 'od zer chen po
203b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags nas chos 'di yang dag par ston par byed pas/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das shing / snang ba chen po byed par 'gyur te/ de dang ji lta
204a1(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin pas bye brag tu gyur pa ci'ang med do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas
204a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnams grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs nas slad ba'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam
204a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang / yon tan dpag tu ma mchis par 'thob par 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab
204a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ yang 'od zer chen po rab tu bkye'o// gzhan yang phyag sor gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rab tu g.yo bar mdzad pas/ sems can
204a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams bde ba chen po thob par gyur to/ / de'i tshe 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
204a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams lha'i me tog dam pa dang / lha'i gos dam pa dag gis mngon par gtor nas/ dus gcig tu lha'i rol mo rnams
204a7(dkon brtsegs): byas so/ / lha tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i gos rgyang nas mngon par gtor nas/ nam mkha' kun tu gang bar gyur to// skad 'thun par 'di skad du/ kye ma sangs
204b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / gang gis chos zab mo 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyis gus par mchod cing phyag bya ba'i
204b2(dkon brtsegs): 'os su gyur par rig par bya'o zhes smras so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad
204b3(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to/ / blo gros mtha' yas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can de dag gis ni go cha'i bkod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pa
204b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos par mi 'gyur gyi/ sems can gang dag thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / tshogs chen po yongs su sdud pa gang yin pa de dag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos 'di thos
204b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / chos 'di la gang gis nan tan du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// blo gros mtha'
204b6(dkon brtsegs): yas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/ nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyed la sogs pa la yongs su gtad do// ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa nas//
204b7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i chos kyi gter rab tu bsags pas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i bde ba thob pa gang yin pa de dag khyod kyis kyang 'thob par 'gyur gyis/ sdug
205a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi phung po thams cad khyod kyis rab tu spangs te/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab
205a2(dkon brtsegs): tu gzhol bar bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang / khyim dag ma
205a3(dkon brtsegs): smad pa dang / tshong dpon bzang skyong la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
205a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams mthu ci mchis pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub chen po'i chos yongs su bzung nas slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can rnams la phan gdags par bgyi'o zhes gsol
205a5(dkon brtsegs): to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dug pa'i stan las langs te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas lus
205a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi gos mchog dam pa phud de/ mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo ste/ sems
205a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / slad ma'i
205b1(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar smon lam 'debs lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang // de nas
205b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad kun la ni// phan
205b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po bya ba'i phyir/ / nga yis byang chub chos bzung nas// chos rgyal seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing // ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// gang zhig chos 'di yongs tshol ba// rgya chen chos 'di thos gyur na// /
205b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bde ba thob par 'gyur// ngas ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin// gang gis theg pa 'di mthong zhing // mdo sde chos 'di thos gyur na// ji ltar mos pa'i bde ba thob// blo dang ldan pa gang zhig/
205b5(dkon brtsegs): gis/ thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms te// chos mchog 'di ni thos gyur na// lus dang sems ni rab bder 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor 'dir 'dus gyur pa// nga yis mngon sum bshad
205b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong dang / / chos 'di thos par gyur nas ni// rab tu dga' ba gang bskyed pa// ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// khyod kyis bsod nams tshad med pa'i// phung po dag ni rab skyed cing // 'khor ba mtha'
205b7(dkon brtsegs): med sgrol bar 'gyur/ / ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// chos rjes rab tu gsungs pa yi// chos 'di gang zhig 'dzin byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur// ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe// /
206a1(dkon brtsegs): nga yi byang chub chos 'dzin pa// de ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i// tha ma'i dus kyi chos 'dzin 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'di bstan pa na// byang chub sems/
206a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' tshad med pa snyed mi skye ba'i chos kyis bzod pa thob par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa snyed ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
206a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
206a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las
206a5(dkon brtsegs): go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa bdun pa rdzogs so// // lo tsa ba mgos chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur ba'o// /
206a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harma d+hA tu pra kri ti a sam b+he da ni de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya ba
206a7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
206b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna
206b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs tha dad pa nas 'dus pa khri nyis stong dang / lha'i bu thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sum khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
206b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya ba'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di snya du
206b4(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos bstan par bskul ba mdzad de/ bskul nas kyang bshad la ci nas kyang bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkod
206b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can yi chad par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcad par 'gyur ba dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can thams cad nga rgyal med cing shes pa brda sprod
206b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dag 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'bras bu thob pa dag kyang khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung
206b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ skye bo mang po dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di'ang yun ring du
207a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs sam/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ chos bstan pa de gang dag gis thos par
207a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag theg pa gang la mos pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston na ci ma rung snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu rin chen
207a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'khor 'di khyod las chos mnyan pa thos par 'dod kyis/
207a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di dag la gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom
207a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las rtsoms la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyang chos kyi
207a6(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi rang bzhin lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni brjod pa 'am/ mnyan par cung zad kyang rngo mi thogs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
207a7(dkon brtsegs): las brtsams te bstan par bgyi lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa 'di thos na/ gang zag mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni skrag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis
207b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag skrag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can lags pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni skrag par mi 'gyur lags so//
207b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin na/ chos kyi dbyings
207b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'ang med la/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang med na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba ci las 'byung bar 'gyur//
207b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i phyin ci log gis bslad cing / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa rnams la ni/ bdag dang
207b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi 'du shes 'byung ngo / / bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa la gnas pa de dag la ni/ dge ba'i dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag 'byung ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos de
207b6(dkon brtsegs): dag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon par 'du byed cing / de dag la rgyu de dang rkyen de dag ngo bo nyid de'i rnam par smin pa nyid mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// btsun pa shA ra
207b7(dkon brtsegs): dA ti'i bu de dag gis ji tsam du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba yongs su bzung ba de tsam du kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa de'ang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
208a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba zhes bya ste/ don dam par ni de la kun nas
208a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ci'ang med do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/
208a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di
208a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol te/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings
208a5(dkon brtsegs): ni khyod las phyed par 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sngon bcings par gyur la dgrol ba zhig yin snyam mam/ smras pa/ 'jam
208a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni sngon bcings par gyur pa'ang ma yin la/ dgrol ba'ang ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'o na dge slong de dag gi sems ci zhig las rnam
208a7(dkon brtsegs): par grol/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos mang po btul te/ de dag gi sems ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// 'jam dpal gyis smras
208b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra
208b2(dkon brtsegs): dwa ti'i bu ci khyod kyi sems len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam par grol lo// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod kyi sems 'das pa
208b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol lam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par grol/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems 'das pa ni zad pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ sems ma 'ongs pa ni ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid
208b4(dkon brtsegs): yin/ sems da ltar byung ba ni mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
208b5(dkon brtsegs): sems 'das pa'ang rnam par grol ba ma yin la/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin/
208b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas sems rnam par grol bar bstan par zad kyi/ don dam par ni 'di la gang btsongs pa 'am/ grol ba'i sems dmigs su med do// 'jam dpal
208b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin kun rdzob dang don dam pa yod par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa
209a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med do/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na ji ltar kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas sems rnam par grol bar ston/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam
209a2(dkon brtsegs): yang sems rnam par grol ba ci'ang med dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te sems shig nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis ka'i bar na dmigs su yod na ni sems rnam par grol
209a3(dkon brtsegs): bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems ni nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis ka med par dmigs su med pas/ de la bcings pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba ci'ang med do//
209a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'khor de las dge slong nyis brgyas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos pa dang / stan las langs te dong nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ gal te 'di la su'ang rnam par grol
209a5(dkon brtsegs): ba med cing / su'ang rnam par mi 'grol na 'o bu cag gi rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po la don ci yod/ gal te nges par 'byung ba ci'ang med na lam sgom pa la don ci yod ces de ltar
209a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag smod cing yi chad nas 'khor de nas dong ngo / / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag gdul ba'i dbang du rig nas/ lam gang nas dge slong de dag dong ba'i lam de'i mdun du sprul
209a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge slong zhig sprul to/ / de nas dge slong de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sprul pa'i dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa khyod ga las 'ongs/ de nas sprul
209b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge slong des/ dge slong dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la ma zhugs/ ma shes/ ma mos// yid ma ches nas kho bo
209b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de nas dong ngo / / de nas dge slong nyis brgya po de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo cag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la ma zhugs/ ma shes/ ma mos/
209b3(dkon brtsegs): yid ma ches nas kho bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des/ dge slong nyis brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
209b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos bstan pa la mi mthun pa ci zhig thos na khyed cag 'khor de nas dong / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni 'di la su la'ang thob pa med/ mngon par
209b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba med par ston pas/ kho bo cag 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di la su la'ang thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba med na/ 'o bu cag
209b6(dkon brtsegs): gi rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po la don ci yod/ 'o bu cag gi tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa la don ci yod/ gal te 'di la nges par 'byung ba ci'ang med na/ lam
209b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa la don ci yod snyam du bsams nas/ kho bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag ma
210a1(dkon brtsegs): mos nas dong bar zad dam/ 'on te spangs shing mi snyan par brjod nas dong / de dag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni ma mos nas dong bar zad kyi/ kho bo cag gis spangs
210a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med la/ mi snyan par brjod pa'ang med do// de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag rtsod pa
210a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi mchog yin pas/ mi snyan par brjod par mi bya/ brtsad par mi bya'i/ re zhig je bgro bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci sems 'di sngon po zhes bya ba zhig gam//
210a4(dkon brtsegs): ser po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dmar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dkar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ btsod ka zhes bya ba zhig gam/ shel gyi kha dog lta bu zhes bya ba zhig gam/ yang dag pa zhes bya
210a5(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig gam/ yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ mi rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ gzugs can zhes bya ba zhig gam/ gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya ba
210a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig gam zhes rtogs shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sems ni gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ rnam par
210a7(dkon brtsegs): rig byed ma yin pa'o/ / de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med pa
210b1(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i sems de nang na gnas so zhes bya ba 'am/ phyi rol na gnas so zhes bya ba 'am/ gnyis ka'i bar na gnas so zhes bya bar
210b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te sems de gzugs can ma yin/ bstan du med/ snang ba med pa/ thogs pa med pa
210b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa/ rnam par rig byed ma yin pa/ nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka na med par yang dmigs su med na/ ci de la yang dag par yongs su grub pa yod snyam mam/
210b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gang yang dag pa ma yin zhing yongs su grub pa ma yin pa de la ci rnam par grol ba yod snyam mam/ de dag gis smras
210b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de las bsams nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad du/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang zhin la ni kun nas nyon mongs par
210b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'ang med la/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang med do zhes bstan to// tshe dang ldan pa dag yang byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log gis bsdad pa rnams la ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /
210b7(dkon brtsegs): yir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa 'byung ngo // ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas te/ rtag tu yul rnams la spyod cing // gnas pa de dag ni dmigs pa las byung ba'i sems 'bru/
211a1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dmigs pa zad na zad par 'gyur la/ byung nas zhig cing zhu ste gnas pa med do// sems kyi dmigs pa gang gis rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge
211a2(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba dang / lam sgom par byed pa'i sems de ni/ rang bzhin gyis med pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba ma yin pa'o// med pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin
211a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byung ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de la ni skye ba'ang med/ 'jig pa'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med do// gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa de la ni bcings
211a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med/ rnam par grol ba'ang med do// de la ni thog pa'ang med/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de las bsams nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'disad
211a5(dkon brtsegs): dun chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni/ / kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'ang med/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang med de/ 'di la ni su la'ang thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam
211a6(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba med do zhes smras so/ / de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de
211a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sems rnam par grol nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gur pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkab nas/ tshig 'di skad ces
211b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang smras so/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyis ni kho bo cag yongs su bskyabs so// 'di ltar kho bo cag kyang dam pa'i chos spong bar ma zhugs pas/ nga phyin chad chos 'dul ba zab mo la 'jug pa las
211b2(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol tu gyur pa ma yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig mngon par rtogs
211b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkab/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo cag gis ni ci yang thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pas/ de'i
211b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir kho bo cag gis rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkab bo/ / btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe kho bo cag la thob pa'i 'du shes yod par gyur pa de'i tshe ni kho bo cag stan
211b5(dkon brtsegs): las langs te 'khor de nas dong ngo / / gang gi tshe kho bo cag thob pa'i 'du shes de dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe slar lhags so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed ci las bsams
211b6(dkon brtsegs): te de skad smra/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba yin no// de ni rlom sems yin te/ gang la g.yo ba yod pa dang / rlob sems yod pa de la ni/ thob pa med
211b7(dkon brtsegs): cing mngon par rtogs pa med do/ / btsun pa rab 'byor gang la thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pa de ni rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
212a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag sus btul/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang / gang skye ba med pa dang / yongs
212a2(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa dang / gang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs po med pa des btul to// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag btul ba yin nam//
212a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
212a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag sus btul/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang la phung po rnams med pa dang / khams rnams med pa dang / skye mched rnams med pa
212a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang so so'i skye bo ma yin pa dang / slob pa ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa ma yin pa dang / nyan thos ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa
212a6(dkon brtsegs): dang gang lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / ngag dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / mtshungs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang bral ba ma yin pa des btul to// smras pa/ 'jam
212a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal de ston pa de su zhig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de mtshungs par ldan pa yin snyam mam
212b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni chos gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kur dga' bo ci chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no//
212b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo dge slong 'di dag ni sprul pas btul ba yin te/ sprul pa'i 'dul ba ci 'dra bar nyan thos thams cad kyi 'dul
212b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang de dang 'dra'o/ / btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag de ltar btul ba de dag ni/ yang dag par btul ba yin no// gang dag chos 'dul ba 'di la mos par mi byed pa de dag ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du
212b4(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du
212b5(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di la dge slong tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par rlom sems su byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes
212b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par rlom sems su byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal
212b7(dkon brtsegs): can du shes par bya'o/ / bdag gis thob bo// bdag gis mngon sum du byas so snyam du sems shing rlom sems su byed pa dang / yongs su rtogs par byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes
213a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / 'jig tshogs la lta bas skrag cing bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyi ro myang bar byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
213a2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid gang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba stong pa'i stong pa nyid des bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam yang stong pa'i phyir te/ stong pa de lta bu la stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par mi 'jug pa ni/ lhag pa'i
213a3(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o/ / btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyi stong pa nyid gang
213a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i stong pa nyid de la stong pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ 'jig tshogs
213a5(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba nyid stong pa nyid yin pa dang / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ lam yang gzhan ma yin te/ lam nyid stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong gang ma rig
213a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / srid pa'i sred pas 'jigs shing ma rig pa las rnam par grol ba'i ro myang bar byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnyis su 'du shes 'jug pa
213a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni/ rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis skrag cing rnam par thar pa'i
213b1(dkon brtsegs): sgo gsum po dag gi ro myang bar byed pa dang / phyin ci log bzhis skrag cing 'du shes bzhi'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / sgrib pa lngas skrag cing dbang po lnga'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / skye mched drug gis
213b2(dkon brtsegs): skrag cing mngon par shes pa drug gi ro myang bar byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun gyis skrag cing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ro myang bar byed pa dang / log pa nyid brgyad kyis skrag cing
213b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi dngos po dgus skrag cing mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i
213b4(dkon brtsegs): las kyi lam gyis skrag cing mi slob pa'i chos bcu'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyis skrag cing 'dus ma byas kyi khams dag gi ro myong bar byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du
213b5(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / spros pa yin te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo ji tsam du g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang /
213b6(dkon brtsegs): spros pa dang / sems mtho ba dang / dma' ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / spong ba dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / rten pa dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa yod pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa dang ldan
213b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo de lta bu'i dge slong ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'dus byas kyi khams kyi stong pa
214a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa dang / stong pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid du mi 'jug pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes
214a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal
214a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang gi tshe dge slong nang nye bar zhi bas yul thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar mthong zhing / mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes
214a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba 'am/ rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/ dmigs shes bya ba 'am/ mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes bya bar rlom sems su mi
214a5(dkon brtsegs): byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ gnyis su 'byed par mi byed/ gcig tu sdud par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ 'dor bar mi byed/ 'phro bar mi byed/ mngon par zhen
214a6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed cing / chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong la/ mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pas mnyam par bya ba 'am/
214a7(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam par bya ba'i chos gang yang med de/ mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / rlom sems su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/
214b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen par yang mi byed/ thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ mngon sum du bya bas rlom sems su byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni gnas med do// btsun pa kun
214b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing / gnyen po med pa dang / phyogs med pa dang / rang gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dang bral ba dang / tshor ba thams cad rgyur
214b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dang / tshor ba dang tshor ba med pa thams cad dang / dmigs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / 'ching ba med pa dang / nye bar len pa
214b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin te/ de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral bas chos gang la'ang spang ba 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/
214b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du bya ba yod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar zhugs pa'i dge slong ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// des ni nam mkha'i khams mnyam pa nyid kyis
214b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas na/ chos gang la'ang dge ba zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dge ba zhes bya ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa
214b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas shes bya ba
215a1(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes bya bar sgro 'dog par mi byed do// de ni sgro 'dogs pa med pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed// rtog par mi byed/ rnam par
215a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog par mi byed de/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des ni chos thams cad sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no//
215a3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa kun dga' bo gang de ltar mos pa'i dge slong ni yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// de las dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das
215a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad du/ ji ltar nam mkha' lag mthil la mi chags pa ltar dge sbyong gi chos kyang de bzhin no zhes gsungs so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par
215a5(dkon brtsegs): zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na
215a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod par byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa
215a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi sems/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang
215b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'das pa'i sems de nang na gnas par yang mi mthong / phyi rol na'ang ma yin/ gnyis ka med pa'i bar na'ang ma yin/ phyi rol gyi yul la rgyu zhing gnas par yang mi mthong la/
215b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir yang rgyu zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de'ang sems
215b3(dkon brtsegs): can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la rjod par byed la/ sems de'ang yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid du rtogs par gyur te/ dris na sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can thams
215b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs la/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs
215b5(dkon brtsegs): shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'o ngo bo nyid brda spong bar byed pa de ni/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod par byed pa yin no//
215b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa sbyin pa na gang gtong bar byed pa dang / gang gis gtong bar byed pa dang / gang la gtong bar byed pa dang / gang
215b7(dkon brtsegs): du gtong bar byed pa dang / gang du yongs su sngo bar byed pa de dag shin tu gtong bas/ gtong bar byed cing rten par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed/ re bar mi byed//
216a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs par mi byed la/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/ dris na shin tu gtong ba nyid dang / shin du dmigs pa nyid dang / shin tu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag
216a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid gtong ba'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs shing / gtong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid rtogs la/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs te/
216a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu den
216a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa sbyin pas yongs su dag pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas lus nye bar zhi bas tshul khrims nye bar ni
216a5(dkon brtsegs): bar rtogs te/ ngag nye bar zhi ba dang sems nye bar zhi bas tshul khrims nye bar zhi bar rtogs shing / lus dang / ngag dang / sems nye bar zhi bas byang chub nye bar zhi bar rtogs la/ byang
216a6(dkon brtsegs): chub nye bar zhi bas sems can nye bar zhi bar rtogs te/ sems can nye bar zhi bas chos thams cad nye bar zhi bar rtogs shing / chos thams cad nye bar zhi bas yang dag pa'i mtha' nye bar zhi ba
216a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar rtogs la/ de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar gyur pas/ dris na chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba nyid du brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de na
216b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa tshul khrims kyis yongs su dag pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas shin tu nub pa'i chos
216b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu ya ma brla'i chos nyid du rig nas/ sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa'ang bzod cing / gang gis phyi nang gi sems kun
216b3(dkon brtsegs): nas mi slong bar bzod pa dang / gang gis khong khro bar 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa phyi rol tu mi gtong zhing sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa bzod pa dang / sems can de dag gi ngo bo nyid
216b4(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa dang / bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin
216b5(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs shing / chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid du gtogs te/ dris na shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu ya ma brla'i chos
216b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rtogs pas rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis bzod pa brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa bzod pas yongs su dag pa yin no//
216b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas yid la byed pa thams cad kyis dben pa'i chos rtogs shing sgro 'dogs pa med la/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas brtsam pa
217a1(dkon brtsegs): gang rtsom pa de dben pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / de nang dben pas phyi rol tu rgyu ba med par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rgyu zhing / brtson
217a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dben pas sems can dben par rtogs pa dang / sems can dben pas byang chub dben par rtogs pa dang / byang chub dben pas chos thams cad dben par rtogs pa dang / chos thams
217a3(dkon brtsegs): cad dben pas yang dag pa'i mtha' dben par rtogs pas/ dris na brtson 'grus de dag nyid kyi rang bzhin dben pa ji lta ba bzhin du dben par brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub
217a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa brtson 'grus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mnyam zhing
217a5(dkon brtsegs): bye brag med par 'gyur bar bsam gtan byed de/ bsam gtan de la sems gnas par 'jug cing / gnas de la'ang rnam par shes pa gnas par mi byed pa dang / des rnam par shes pa
217a6(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas shing sems mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis
217a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / sems thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rjes su rtogs pas/ de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa zhes bya
217b1(dkon brtsegs): bar rig la/ dris na rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprong ba bsam
217b2(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyis yongs su dag pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi mig gis rnam par sbyang ba'i ye shes kyi chos thams cad mthong ste/
217b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar mthong zhing / gang gi tshe chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe ci'ang ma yin par 'gyur ro// de ci'ang
217b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i shes pa thob pas mi rgyu/ rab tu mi rgyu/ rnam par mi rgyu'o// des rgyu ba dang / rab tu rgyu ba dang / rnam par rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par rgyun bcad pas mi
217b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ro/ / rnam par mi 'khor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des gang gis 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i rab tu rgyu ba de 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang / chags pa dang / smon pa'i rgyun
217b6(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa'i phyir te/ de 'dod pa don du gnyer ba thams cad med par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba dang / dam pa'i
217b7(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ bsams bzhin du skye ba rnams su rgyu bar byed de/ de ni rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis rgyu bar byed cing /
218a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed de/ de ni de'i shes rab yin pas de shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub rab
218a2(dkon brtsegs): tu shes pa dang / byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi rang bzhin dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs shing / chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i
218a3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin du rab tu shes te/ dris na chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa de nyid brda sprong bar byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda spong ba shes rab kyi mig
218a4(dkon brtsegs): gis yongs su dag pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas pa na/ de sngon gyi
218a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i lus ni ma skyes par rab tu shes so/ / phyi ma'i mtha'i lus ni 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so// da ltar byung ba'i lus la ni rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / bong ba
218a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ga sbyor gyi ngo bo nyid lta zur mo sor rtog par byed de/ de de ltar lus la sum kyi rjes su lha'ing gnas pa si lus kyi rang bzhin skye ba med par rig nas/ lus kyi rnam par rig
218a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa kun nas slong bar mi byed do/ / yid la byed pa kun nas slong bar mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni lhag par byed pa la mi gnas pa yin te/ de lhag par byed pa dang bral zhing
218b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom yang chos gang la'ang sgom par mi byed/ rnam par 'jig par mi byed do// de chos thams cad
218b2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med par rig nas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ sems gang gis de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i sems de'ang sgyu ma'i chos nyid dang brag ca'o ches
218b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bur rab tu shes so/ / de ltar rab tu shes pas bde ba'i tshor ba la'ang rjes su chags pa med la/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la'ang khong khro ba med cing / sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba'ang
218b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i tshor ba la'ang rmongs pa med pas/ ma rig pa bag la nyan par mi 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa de ni/ de'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa
218b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gzhag pa yin no/ / de de ltar tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ chos thams cad la tshor ba'i rgyu ba dag gi sems mi rgyu bas de chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
218b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang spong bar mi byed/ 'dor bar mi byed/ yongs su gtong bar mi byed de/ de ni de'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no// de chos shes pa mngon sum du
218b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pas chos nyid la 'jug par byed cing / lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos rnams la
219a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa dang / blta ba dang / kun nas dkris pa dag gis gnas par mi byed de/ de ni de'i chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i drang pa nye bar gzhag pa/
219a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no// des chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma byung zhing dngos po med pa dang / nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur rtogs pas/ dris na dran pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dran
219a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar gzhag pa brda sprod bar byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su dag pa yin no// lnga'i
219a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa ni/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de la kun shes par byed/ rnam par rig par byed/ gnas par byed/ mi spong bar byed/
219a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi g.yeng bar byed/ mi brjed par byed pa dang / dang por dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis thog mar 'gro ba dang / ser sna'i sems la mi 'jug pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong
219a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems spong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rtsod pa med pa dang /
219a7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rma mi 'byin pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / theg pa chen po'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams yid la
219b1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed cing mi dran pa dang / bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mi gnas par sgom pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad la mi rgyu ba dang / chos thams cad la 'phro bar mi byed pa dang /
219b2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la rnam pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa dang / yul rnams la mi rgyu ba dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa
219b3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las ma sman pa dang / bag yod pa lhur len cing / sangs rgyas kyi ros yongs su tshol
219b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bstang mi dgos par dgos pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs pas rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims la ston
219b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / log par zhugs pa rnams dang ma 'brel ba dang / nang shin tu dag pas tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pas kha gsag
219b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rang gi rnyed pas chog shes pas tshol ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba ngan pa rnam par spangs pas thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pas rnam par g.yo ba med pa
219b7(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum la 'dun pa dang bral bas 'dod pa chung ba dang / sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral bas chog shes pa dang / chos thams cad dben par mos pas dben pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i spyod
220a1(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs pas don chung ba dang / spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcad pas spros pa med pa dang / 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang
220a2(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang bral bas 'gro ba med pa dang / nga rgyal nges par bcom pas chos la dga' ba dang / sems shin tu dul bas cang shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po kun tu srung ba
220a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems gnas pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi phung pos sems rnam par grol ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs mi 'dor ba dang / byang chub kyi sems
220a4(dkon brtsegs): la dam bcas pa ma nyams pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad don du mi gnyer ba dang / sems can pha rol dag gi ngor byed pa med pa dang / gzhan kun tu srung ba'i phyir bdag rjes su
220a5(dkon brtsegs): srung ba dang / rang gi sems la nges par sems pa dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams mi tshol ba dang / tshul khrims legs par bsdams pas 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang
220a6(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas chos kyi bgo bsha' byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams rjes su srung ba dang / dang por dge ba'i chos thams cad la thog
220a7(dkon brtsegs): mar 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pas spyod pa tha dad pa med pa dang / rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pas rlom sems med pa dang / skye ba med par yang dag par so so
220b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba'ang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas spong ba nyid du'ang so sor rtog la/ lta ba thams
220b2(dkon brtsegs): cad gdul ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par yang byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par yang byed la/ mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la'ang lta ba dang / smon
220b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa'ang med la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir smon lam thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang so sor rtog la/ dge
220b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya bas kyang ngoms mi myong ba dang / dngos po ni dngos po med par snang bas dngos po dang dngos po med pa la rtogs pa dang / lhag par byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir yid la byed
220b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang / sems can bdag med pa la sbyor bas bdag la bdag med pa dang / nyon mongs pa yongs su btang ba dang / sems can yongs su ma btang bas btang ba dang / ma btang ba dang /
220b6(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang / shes rab bsgoms pas ma zhi zhing zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ma 'dres pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang / bdud kyi lam las yang
220b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'das pas lam ma yin pa'i lam dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang ma 'dres pas spyod pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa dang / chos thams cad la rtog pas gdegs pa med cing
221a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhan la lhag par sems su mi byed pas bdag mi sgrog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas
221a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags par bzod pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no//
