221a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mi skye ba dang mi 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba'i 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su
221a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rig par bya ba la dga' zhing mchog tu
221a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ / mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi skye bar mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
221a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yin no/ / yongs su gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
221a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe 'gras pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa bas ngoms mi myong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// khams gsum du mtshams sbyor bar mi byed pa ni/
221b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// rang gi nyon
221b2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa spong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// bdag gi phyir byed
221b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// yal bar 'dor ba ni byang
221b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang /
221b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa ni byang chub sems
221b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa yin no/ / 'gog pa'i chos mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'gog pa yongs su 'dris par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin//
221b7(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa bas zag pa 'bri bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// rnam par thar pa
222a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa gsum la yongs su 'dris par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa
222a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / phung po lnga'i khur 'dor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi khur 'bor bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// dbang
222a3(dkon brtsegs): po drug 'gog par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no//
222a4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba'i mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i/
222a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi snying por rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bus sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa ni byang chub sems
222a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa yin no/ / yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod ba'i le'u bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
222a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis byang chub sems
222b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi shes pa brda sprod pa de legs par smras so/ / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes pa brda sprod pa 'di thos na mos par 'gyur zhing / mi skrag mi dngang la dang
222b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod par 'gyur ro//
222b3(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
222b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ci khyod shes pa brda sprod par byed dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te kho bos chos 'ga' zhig thob bam/ spangs par gyur na ni kho bos shes pa brda
222b5(dkon brtsegs): sprod par yang 'gyur ba zhig/ lha'i bu kho bos ni chos 'ga' yang thob pa med cing spangs pa med pas na/ kho bos ci zhig shes pa brda sprod par bya/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
222b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag las thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa med dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bus sangs rgyas
222b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar chos
223a1(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhir dbyer med pa nyid kyis chos ston par/
223a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gdog pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang // sems can med pa dang /
223a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dang bral ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir chos ston par ni mi mdzad de/ lha'i bu
223a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar chos ston par mdzad do/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
223a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos ston par mi mdzad na/ 'o na gang gi don du sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo
223a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo / / lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs
223a7(dkon brtsegs): / rgyas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni phyin ci log gi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du
223b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo / / lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang /
223b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te/ gang
223b3(dkon brtsegs): la chos gang yang skye ba med pa de la ni 'khor ba'ang med la/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang med do// lha'i bus smras/ 'jam dpal de lta na sems can gang dag gis bla na med pa yang
223b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni bgos pa med pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan pa med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal
223b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ phan pa gang gis rab tu phye ba yin snyam mam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal phan pa ni mngon par 'du byed pas rab tu phye ba yin no//
223b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par 'du mdzad pa yod par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
223b7(dkon brtsegs): ni mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba yin pas/ de ni 'dus ma byas pa brnyes pa dang / 'dus ma byas shing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras
224a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lha'i bu khyod kyi sa dam bcas pa de nyid kyis na mngon par 'dus ma byas la ni phan pa dang gnod pa dmigs su myed do/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
224a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal chos bstan pa 'di ni las dang po pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thos na skrag par 'gyur zhing skrag nas kyang phyir ldog par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir
224a3(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa dang phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas pa yin
224a4(dkon brtsegs): no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos dang rang
224a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sas skrag cing / ser sna dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang / le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dag las byir
224a6(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar gnas na yang dag par gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu mnyam par gnas shing mi mnyam
224a7(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa ma yin na/ de'i phyir yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe las dang po
224b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa de lta bu ni/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa yin no// smras pa/
224b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid nas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
224b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos la mos pa de'i phyir las dang po pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas spyad pa yin/ smras
224b4(dkon brtsegs): pa lha'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni yun ring po nas spyad pa yin te/ de dag gi 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
224b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyad bsrung ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags kyi spyad pa la spyod kyang / 'dod chags
224b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa srung ba yin no// zhe sdang la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ zhe sdang gi spyad pa la spyod kyang / zhe sdang gi
224b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gti mug gi spyad pa la spyod kyang / gti mug gi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / ma mnyam pa
225a1(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ cha mnyam pa'i spyad pa la spyod kyang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
225a2(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa srung ba yin no/ / lho'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'jug kyang / chos
225a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyang rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa srung ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
225a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gang yang 'jig par mi byed 'chags par mi byed la/ chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin
225a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'jig pa med cing / chags pa med par rtogs pa de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa dang 'jug par byed
225a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams su'ang ldog la/ bsam gtan rnams la 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i
225a7(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas ma rtogs pa rtogs shing mi rtsod pa lhur len pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sems can gyi
225b1(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / bdag gi khams ma rtogs pa de mngon sum du gyur pas/ chos thams cad la'ang phyir ldog pa med pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ste/
225b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi gzhog cing / nem nur med la the tsom med cing som nyid dang bral ba'i phyir gzod ma nas dag cing dri ma med la nyon mongs pa med cing / shes
225b3(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi snang ba gsal bar gyur pas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pas de'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam
225b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thog sa pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad skye ba med par shes
225b5(dkon brtsegs): shing / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'ang rab tu shes la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ skye ba thams cad du skye ba ston cing len pa med par skye ba yongs su
225b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par byed pa dang / skye ba dang tshe rabs thams cad du len pa dang bral bas 'chi ba dang skye ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' zhing yang dag
225b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'da' ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa'i don rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad dang lus mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang sems mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad
226a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang yul mnyam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul rtogs pa dang /
226a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i bya ba shes pa dang / dus la lta ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa de ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa
226a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di
226a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med cing / thams cad du dpyas med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
226a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed pa dang / nga rgyal gyis byas pa dag mi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med cing thams cad du dpyas med pa yin no//
226a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no//
226a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang ser sna dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / bslab pa dang / tshul khrims dang / yi dam thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bu
226b1(dkon brtsegs): ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ / gang yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa
226b2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ / gang yang brnab sems dang / gnod sems kyi bag la nyal dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba
226b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yang dag par rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus la yang dag par snang ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ / gang yang le lo dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no//
226b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myang bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa
226b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / gang gi tshe shes rab kyi rtsa ba thos pa yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'chal pa'i shes rab dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med
226b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe rma phyung yang rma mi 'byin pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang rma phyung yang rma mi phyin pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe ji lta ba bzhin du smra ba
226b7(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ / gang yang de bzhin du byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe nang nye bar zhi ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang phyi rol gyi
227a1(dkon brtsegs): yul rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la bsam pa tha dad pa med pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin
227a2(dkon brtsegs): no/ / gang yang theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe bdud kyi las rnams rtogs pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bdud kyi las
227a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams bzlog pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe 'jig rten na snang ba thob pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni
227a4(dkon brtsegs): dpyas med pa yin no/ / gong gi tshe bya ba dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bya ba ma yin par mi ltung ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe
227a5(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / snyems pa thams cad dang bral ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang ye shes dang rnam par shes pa phun sum tshogs shing 'phags pa'i bden pa
227a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe dam bcas pa brtan pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med
227a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang 'thun par byed pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams la mngon par
227b1(dkon brtsegs): zher pa med pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe shes rab dang ye shes kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par rab tu shes pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang
227b2(dkon brtsegs): thabs shes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no/ / gang yang rtsom pa thams cad la snying rje chen pos 'jug pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin
227b3(dkon brtsegs): no/ / gang yang chos thams cad la rnam par thar par gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang yang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang
227b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dmigs pa'i lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no/ / gang yang tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor zhing chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de lta bu ni kha na ma
227b5(dkon brtsegs): tho ba med pa yin no/ / gang yang 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du mi byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe chos kyi dbyings stong pa zhes bya bar so sor rtog pa de lta bu ni kha na mthe
227b6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa yin no/ / gang yang sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe khams gsum dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med
227b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / gang yang sems can thams cad la lta ba'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang ji tsam du tshig 'jug pa dang / tshig gis
228a1(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshig gis rtog par byed pa dang / tshig la mngon par zhen par byed pa de tsam du skyon yin no// lha'i bu ji tsam du chos thams cad la
228a2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyad du med pa nyid dang / 'jug pa med pa nyid dang / rlob sems med pa nyid dang / rtog pa med pa nyid dang / 'phro ba med pa nyid dang / brjod du med pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su
228a3(dkon brtsegs): mi gtang ba'i phyir gtan du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba nyid yin pa de tsam du kha na ma tho ba med cing dpyas med pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gang la kha na ma tho ba med cing dpyas med pa de ni yi ge med
228a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / gang la yi ge med pa de ni brjod du med pa yin te/ brjod du med pa'i don la ni kha na ma tho ba med cing dpyas med do// lha'i bu de lta bas na brjod du med pa'i don la rton pa'i byang chub
228a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni rang gi sems gtso bor byed pas kha na ma tho ba med cing / 'phags pa rnams kyis dpyas byar med pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na bcom ldan 'das kyis
228a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / dpyas
228a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa de legs par smras so/ / 'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de ltar kha na ma tho ba med cing dpyas med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
228b1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ / bstan pa 'di thos nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag
228b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang / gzhan dag tu ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag tu 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
228b3(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan to/ / de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
228b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub thob pa'i ming ni ji skad ces bya bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas
228b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa
228b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub thob pa'i ming ni ji skad ces bgyi bar
228b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo lha'i r
229a1(dkon brtsegs): in chen mchog 'di bskal pa 'bum 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa rin chen 'byung gnas shes bya ba la/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bkod pa zhes
229a2(dkon brtsegs): bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
229a3(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya ba de'ang 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang /
229a4(dkon brtsegs): lo legs pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis kun tu gang ba dang / mi khom pa dang ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rdo ba dang // gseg/
229a5(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / gyo mo med cing lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ rin po che sna gsum 'di lta ste/ bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyis spras shing blta na sdug pa/
229a6(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi dra bas kun nas bkab par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du/ mi de dag gi longs spyod
229a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / nye bar spyod pa'ang de 'dra bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der ni bza' ba dang btung ba dag kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams der
229b1(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gi ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos kyi dga' ba sna tshogs dang / chos kyi rnam par grol ba sna tshogs dang / bsam
229b2(dkon brtsegs): tan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa sna tshogs dag gis dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur te/ chos kyi rab tu dga'
229b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dag gis dga' bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par tshor ba gzhan dag myong bar mi 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dga' ba bkod
229b4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cur 'gyur ro// de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni byang chub
229b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cur 'gyur ro/ / de'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod pa de gang gi tshe/ byang chub
229b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ steng gi bar snang la ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams skyil mo
229b7(dkon brtsegs): krung gcig gis khyab par byas nas/ 'od zer brgya stong dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snang bas khyab par byas shing / lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / phye ma'i char dag mngon
230a1(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu phab nas/ lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs brgya stong dag gi sgra phyung ste/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sgras
230a2(dkon brtsegs): go bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di lta ste/ mi zad pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// de la mi zad pa'i sgo'i gzungs kyi sgo gang zhe na/ 'di
230a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ lus dang sems dben pa nyid du ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi nges par rtog pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad la so sor
230a4(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa ston par byed pa/ chos
230a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i nan tan gyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi snang ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi bye brag med pa nyid ston par byed pa/
230a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi zhi gnas kyi sgo dang / chos thams cad kyi 'gal ba med
230a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi lhag mthong gi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi 'khrul pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi nges par sems pa'i sgo dang / chos
230b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mi brjed pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi dran pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi don rtogs pa ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi rtog pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams
230b2(dkon brtsegs): yid rnam par dag pa ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi blo gros kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi
230b3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi zhi ba nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par gcod pa ston par byed
230b4(dkon brtsegs): pa chos thams cad kyi smon pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi mngon par 'du byed pa dang bral ba ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos
230b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mngon par 'grub pa med pa ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid ston par byeng ba/ chos thams cad kyi 'byung
230b6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi rtog pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi mngon sum gyis shes pa nyid ston par
230b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gnyis dang bral ba ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi g.yos
231a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi rten pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi sems can mnyam pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi
231a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can med pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi 'gyur ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi byed pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi spyod pa med pa nyid ston par
231a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gzung ba med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gzhi yang dag par 'joms pa ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gzhi med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams
231a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi lhag par byed pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i sgo dang / chos thams cad kyi 'bras bu 'grub pa ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi rgyu'i sgo dang /
231a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi mi brjed pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi mngon par brtson pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi kun nas ldang ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams
231a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi dbyer med pa nyid ston
231a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi ro gcig pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo dang / chos rnams
231b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi sgra dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam gyis rjod pa thams cad la
231b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i don gyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi bsam gtan gyi
231b3(dkon brtsegs): sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gang zag med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa ston par byed pa/ chos thams
231b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi byang chub kyi sgo ste/ kun dga' bo de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod pa des/ nam mkha'i dkyil de nyid las ma bzhengs par byang chub sems dpa' de dag la mi zad pa'i sgo'i
231b5(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi sgo de dag rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur te/ der yang byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag gis bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de
231b6(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lhun gyis grub cing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi
231b7(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bas/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
232a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lhun gyis grub cing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos
232a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa de ni ma 'dres pa yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ lha'i bu rin chen mchog la 'di skad ces smras
232a3(dkon brtsegs): so/ / lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di la
232a4(dkon brtsegs): ni gang lung bstan pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ gzugs kyang lung bstan du med la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
232a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ rnam par shes pa'ang lung bstan du med pa dang / sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas// sa'i
232a6(dkon brtsegs): khams kyang lung bstan du med pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ rlung gi khams kyang lung bstan du med pa dang / mig byang chub
232a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ma yin pas/ mig kyang lung bstan du med pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ yid kyang lung bstan du med pa dang /
232b1(dkon brtsegs): ming dang gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ ming dang gzugs kyang lung bstan du med pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/
232b2(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum yang lung bstan du med pa dang / rgyu dang lta ba byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ rgyu dang lta ba'ang lung bstan du med pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa byang chub sems dpa'
232b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pas/ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'ang lung bstan du med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni brda'i gzhi'i tshig bla dgas yin no// de ni nye bar
232b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i gzhi yin te/ chos gang shin tu nye bar zhi ba de la ni lung bstan pa gang yang med do// btsun pa kun dga' bo lung bstan pa zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i tshig bla
232b5(dkon brtsegs): dgas yin te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang
232b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin par mi byed na/ de'i 'og tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad yongs su
232b7(dkon brtsegs): gzung du med par lung bstan pa yin no/ / lung bstan pa ni chos thams cad rjes su gzung du med par lung bstan pa yin no// lung bstan pa ni chos thams cad gnas med par lung
233a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yin no/ / lung bstan pa ni chos thams cad skye ba med par lung bstan pa yin no// lung bstan pa ni chos thams cad rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par
233a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa med par lung bstan pa yin te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ni de lta bu yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i
233a3(dkon brtsegs): bu rin chen mchog la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha'i bu legs so legs so// de lta bu'i chos rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa
233a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ / gtam 'di brjod par gyur pa na/ bdud sdig can dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan
233a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la/ bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
233a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' lung ston par mdzad cing / nyan thos lung ston par mi mdzad lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
233a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sdig can byang chub sems dpa' ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang mi rnams kyis legs par rtogs
233b1(dkon brtsegs): shing rig pa yin pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' lung ston par mdzad kyi/ nyan thos ni lha dang mi rnams kyis rig pa ma yin pas de'i phyir nyan thos lung ston par mi mdzad do// sdig
233b2(dkon brtsegs): can byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan na ni/ sems can mang po dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed kyi/ nyan thos lung bstan pas ni de lta ma yin
233b3(dkon brtsegs): la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' lung ston par mdzad do// nyan thos lung ston
233b4(dkon brtsegs): par ni mi mdzad do/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod ci'i phyir 'khor 'dir 'ongs/ de
233b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras pa dang / bdud sdig can gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rin chen
233b6(dkon brtsegs): m chog 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
233b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe/ de ltar lung bstan pa'i sgras bdag gi gnas dag dang / gzhal med khang thams cad dang / skar khung dang / rta babs thams cad dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa dang
234a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing rtse ba'i longs spyod kyi gnas thams cad las 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di bla na med
234a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan zin to/ / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang lung bstan du 'ong gis/ sdig can khyed song zhig ces sgra byung ngo // 'jam dpal gyis
234a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ sdig can khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstan pas yi ma rangs par gyur tam/ bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te 'dzam bu gling na sems can
234a4(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa rnams dgra bcom pa nyid du lung bstan na ni bdag kyang yi rangs par 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
234a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de lta ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi gnas thams
234a6(dkon brtsegs): cad spa bkong ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis khams gsum nas nges par 'byin par 'gyur bas
234a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de ltar na bdag gi yid la gcag pa chen por gyur to/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can khyod 'ongs kyang rung / ma 'ongs kyang rung ste/ sdig can khyod kyis ni lhag
234b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs shing thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad bya bar mi nus so// de
234b2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud
234b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bdud sdig can gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
234b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung ba yin//
234b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba'i spyod pa thams cad la lhag par mi spyod pa de lta bu ni lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//
234b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / bdud kyi las thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phan par gyur par mthong ba de lta bu ni thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
234b7(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung ba yin no// sdig can gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
235a1(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa de lta bu ni lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe bsdu
235a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams sdud pa de lta bu ni thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la shin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid du so sor rtog pa de
235a3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung ba yin no/ / sdig can gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nang dang phyi'i dngos po rnams la mi lta bar gyur cing / byang chub
235a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bas mo pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de lta bu ni lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la
235a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gnas su 'du shes skyed par byed pa de lta bu ni thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe sbyin pa po dang len pa po yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa nyid du mos pa de lta bu ni
235a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung ba yin no/ / sdig can gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge ba brtsams pa dag las phyir mi ldog pa de lta bu ni lhag
235a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe gzhan gyi don gyis zin cing rang gi don las ldog par byed pa de lta bu ni thabs la mkhas pa yin no// gang gi
235b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe don la rton pa yin gyi/ tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin pa de lta bu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung ba yin no// sdig can gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas/
235b2(dkon brtsegs): slong ba po mthong na khong khro ba med cing yi rangs par byed pa de lta bu ni lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud cing thams cad
235b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed pa lta bu ni thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / gang gi tshe chos thams cad byang chub kyi rang bzhin du rab tu shes pa de lta bu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
235b4(dkon brtsegs): pas nges par 'byung ba yin no/ / de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal te bdud sdig
235b5(dkon brtsegs): can dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ gnas dang bcas pa 'di lto ba'i nang du bcug na ni/ 'di theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu
235b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag la bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can lto ba'i nang du bzhug pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i cha ma yin pas/
235b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu kho bos ci nas kyang bdud sdig can 'di sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan gyis legs par brgyan cing / bde ba mchog dang ldan pas seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ sangs
236a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi spobs pas chos ston par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de thos nas mi snang bar bya bar 'dod cing 'bros
236a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor de nas mi snang bar bya ba dang 'bros par yang ma nus so// de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon
236a3(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pas bsam pa 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing seng ge'i khri la 'dug par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis mthong
236a4(dkon brtsegs): bar ba sems nas/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub thob
236a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing seng ge'i khri la 'dug go// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis 'di
236a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang byang chub ma brnyes na/ kho bos lta 'thob par 'gyur re skan/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni thob pa'i
236a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni 'thob pa'ang med/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med de/ byang chub ni 'dus ma byas pa thob pa yin la/
236b1(dkon brtsegs): de'ang 'thob pa med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pa dang / byang chub ni stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas na/ stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang /
236b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas na/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / byang chub ni smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas na/
236b3(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pas smon pa med pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pas na/ rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin mngon par rdzogs par
236b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / byang chub ni de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas na/ de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / byang chub ni yang
236b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa yin pas na/ yang dag pa'i mthas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu ba dang / byang chub ni bdag med pa dang / sems can med
236b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / skyes bu med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na/ de la ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro//
236b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis byang chub kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa 'di thos nas/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed pa de ni
237a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nyid yin par brjod par bya'o/ / bdud kyis bstan pa 'di bshad pan/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mA smra bam chos la bzod pa thob par gyu
237a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyi byini rlabs kyis bdud sdig can de bzhin
237a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i kha dog dang gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas/ zab mo'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag ston pa ni ngo mtshar to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
237a4(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bos ni sems med pa'i dngos po shing dang / rtswa dang / nags tshal 'di dag la de lta de ltar byin gyis brlabs na'ang / 'di dag kyang de lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan zhing / sangs
237a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi spobs pas chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / kho bos gnas brtan shA ra dra ti'i bu nyid la de lta de ltar byin gyis brlabs na'ang / gnas brtan shA ra dwa tI'i bu'ang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
237a6(dkon brtsegs): dang sku'i mtshan dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pas chos ston par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyang 'jam
237a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku'i mtshan dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs na/ nyan thos ston pa'i gzugs su gnas pa ni mi mthun pa yin pas/ bdag 'khor
237b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas mi sdang bar bya'o snyam du bsams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nges mi snang bar byed ma nus so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
237b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyis yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku'i mtshan dang ldan zhing / seng ge'i
237b3(dkon brtsegs): khri la 'dug par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mthong bar byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces
237b4(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdud sdig can dang lhan cig tu ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs
237b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku'i mtshan dang ldan pas/ bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku'i mtshan dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa
237b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi byang chub ci zhig gis rab tu phye ba yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas
237b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye ba yin no/ / chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis su med par rtogs pas rab tu phye ba yin no// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas rab tu phye ba yin no// sems
238a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rtogs pas rab tu phye ba yin no/ / dngos po dang dngos po med pa thams cad rtogs pas rab tu phye ba yin gyi/ dngos po rnam
238a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ / bsgom pa dang dngos po med pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ rab tu phye ba'ang ma yin/ rab tu ma phye ba'ang ma yin/ rgyu ba med pa/ rgyu ba dang
238a3(dkon brtsegs): bral ba/ rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par chad pa ste/ 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa yin no// de nas bdud sdig can gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//
238a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'khor ba mnyam pa nyid la gnas
238a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / mya ngan las 'das pa rlom sems med pa la gnas pa yin no// lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa yin no// nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnas
238a6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa yin no/ / chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas la gnas pa yin no// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gnyis su med pa'i gnas la gnas pa yin no// gnas
238a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mi gnas pa la gnas pa yin te/ sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu la gnas pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus kyang / bdud sdig can la 'di skad
238b1(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ / sdig can byang chub ga las btsal bar bya/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa dang / ma rig pa dang /
238b2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i sred pa kun tu sbyor ba dang / phyin ci log gis kun nas dkris pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa dag las btsal bar bya'o// smras pa/ sdig can khyod ci las bsams te de/
238b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ston/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong
238b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu la dad pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / bdud kyi ris la dad pa'i lha'i bu rnams las srog chags sum tshwa
238b5(dkon brtsegs): nyis stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can dang /
238b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu gnyis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku'i mtshan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyis brlabs de phyir
238b7(dkon brtsegs): bsdus so/ / de nas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / bdud sdig can yang rang rang gi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas
239a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag lhag shing 'dus te/ de dag nam mkha' las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa
239a2(dkon brtsegs): la ba der dong ste/ phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to//
239a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
239a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyer ma mchis par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du 'dir mchis lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam
239a5(dkon brtsegs): grongs 'di gzung bar gyi/ btsang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi zhing / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par
239a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di
239a7(dkon brtsegs): dag gang nas 'dir mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas 'dus pa ste/
239b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas shing / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid kyis yongs su smin par byas pa
239b2(dkon brtsegs): dag yin pas/ 'di dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
239b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la'ang rjes su yi rang bar bya ba'i phyir 'dir lhags so// kun dga' bo byang chub sems
239b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'di dag gis ni/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par byed par
239b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po dag gi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la mngon par brtson pa yin no//
239b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'khor de na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba gang ji snyed pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
239b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag cag gis kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo 'di dag dang / gzhan dag la'ang rim gro dang bsnyen
240a1(dkon brtsegs): bkur bgyi zhing kun tu bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
240a2(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag khyed cag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kun tu
240a3(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba la brtson par zhugs pa ni legs so legs so/ / gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par byed pa de dag gis ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da
240a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang mchod pa byas pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
240a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling na rgya cher spyod par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis rlobs shig/ 'jam
240a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na sreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar gyur pa na/ nam mkha'i khams mi tshig par bgyi ba'i slad du byin gyis brlab
240a7(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin lags pas/ de dag la ni skye ba'ang mi mngon/ 'gag pa'ang mi mngon
240b1(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ gang la skye ba ma mchis shing 'gag pa ma mchis pa de la ni byin gyi rlabs kyi rang bzhin ci'ang ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni byin gyi rlabs ma mchis
240b2(dkon brtsegs): pa lags pas/ de dag gi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de nyid byin gyis rlabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'on du lags kyis kyang / gang dag chos la gus shing chos las nges
240b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung la/ mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di nod par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag gi slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis chos kyi rnam
240b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di byin gyis rlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom zhing bar chad ma mchis pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling na
240b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di byin gyis rlab tu gsol/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
240b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od gser gyi kha dog lta bus snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od dag sku las rab tu phyung ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon
240b7(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 'di thams cad rjes su song ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi
241a1(dkon brtsegs): chos la shes pa dang / bsam pa nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
241a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan
241a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig dang / de lta na khyod kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang mchod par byas par
241a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
241a5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis zhus pa zhes
241a6(dkon brtsegs): bya bar yang zung zhig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i man ngag ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang
241a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems
241b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
241b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so// /
241b3(dkon brtsegs): sh+lau ka drug brgya lnga bcu/ bam po gnyis so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi ra mai tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bskur
241b4(dkon brtsegs): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / / n+ya/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya da sha d+har+m+ma ka na/ nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
241b5(dkon brtsegs): pa chos bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
241b6(dkon brtsegs): gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
241b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus
242a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po stan las langs te/
242a2(dkon brtsegs): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
242a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

242a6(dkon brtsegs): tu skabs phyes/ ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyis sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom

242b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dge slong theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na dge slong theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
242b2(dkon brtsegs): lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags par 'dogs pa mdzad/ don gang gis na theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bgyi
242b3(dkon brtsegs): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la legs so zhes
242b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lhag par g.yo ba ni bzang ba yin/ yongs su dpyad pa'ang bzang ba yin/ dris pa lung bstan pa la spobs pa'ang bzang ba yin te/ rigs
242b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu khyod 'di lta ste/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod
242b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yongs su dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad par bya'o//
242b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
243a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin
243a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ nan tan snying por byed pa yin/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa yin/ chos 'dod pa yin//

243a6(dkon brtsegs): med cing sgyu med la/ drang zhing drang po'i rang bzhin can yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub la'ang mngon par yid

243b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / 'god pa med pa dang / 'chad pa med pa la'ang mngon par yid ches/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / thams cad shes pa

243b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang po brgyad cu phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'od 'dom gang ba nyid la'ang mngon par yid ches/ nyan thos kyis bshad pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa 'am/ byang chub

243b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par yid ches/ dge sbyong dang bram ze yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dag la'ang mngon par yid ches/ dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod
243b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i dbang po 'am/ mi rnams kyi nang du mi'i dbang por 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu la'ang mngon par yid ches mi dge ba//
244a1(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams kyi nang du mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga'
244a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba dang / mi bzang ba dang / drag pa dang / rtsub pa dang / tsha bar gyur pa la'ang mngon par yid ches so// de de ltar mngon par yid ches pas chos gsum
244a3(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa yin te/ gsum gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ nem dur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tsom mo// rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes sa 'brang ba zhes bya

244a6(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa med/ / de lta bas na mkhas pa'i mis// dad pas rjes su 'brang ba bsten// dad pa med pa'i mi la ni// dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste// me yis sa bon

246b1(dkon brtsegs): med cing / de sgrib pa med la lam gyi rgyun gcad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nye bar rjen cing gnas par byed do// rigs kyi bu de'i byang chub sems dpa'i khrel

246b6(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / sgyu med pa yin/ mi rtsub dang mi brlang ba yin/ mi rgod pa dang ma khengs pa yin/ mi cor zhing mu cor mi smra ba yin//

247a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par skyo ba bskyed pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag
247b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed na/ de ni byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa'i rgyu dang po yin no// gzhan yang byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi bsngags pa brjod pa

247b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / gling med pa dag mthong na/ bdag sems can 'di dag gi skyob pa dang / skyabs dang /

247b6(dkon brtsegs): ba skyed par byed/ mchog tu dga' ba skyed par byed/ sems shin tu sbyangs pa skyed par byed/ sems spro ba skyed par byed cing // rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des bla na med
