248a1(dkon brtsegs): don du sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa sgom par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ bsam gtan la mnyam par
248a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jog par byed/ shes rab sgom par byed pa yin te/ de la ji ltar na sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa yin zhe na/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la
248a3(dkon brtsegs): skom dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang /
248a4(dkon brtsegs): rna cha gdub kor dang / rgyan 'dod pa rnams la rgyan sbyin par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu mdor na rang gi sha dag gis kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par
248a5(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// sbyin pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed la/ sbyin pa des kyang rlom sems su
248a6(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ / de la ji ltar ni tshul khrims srung bar byed pa yin zhe na/ de lus kyis legs par bsdams pa dang / ngag gis legs par bsdams pa dang / yid
248a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis legs par bsdams pa dang / de lus kyis nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong bar byed pa dang / ngag
248b1(dkon brtsegs): gis nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong bar byed la/ tshul khrims ma nyams
248b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ma ral ba dang / ma 'dres pa dang / nag nog tu ma gyur par srung bar byed de/ de ltar tshul khrims srung bar byed do// tshul khrims de'ang bla na med pa yang
248b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed la/ tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do// de la ji ltar na bzod pa sgom par byed pa yin zhe na/
248b4(dkon brtsegs): de la khyim na gnas pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba dag gos spyos sam/ rgyud bkag gam/ brdegs sam/ btsogs sam/ bcings sam/ go rar bcug gam/
248b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhus sam/ rnam par gtses na'ang bzod par byed/ dang du len par byed de/ de ltar bzod pa sgom par byed do// zod pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
248b6(dkon brtsegs): chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed la/ bzod pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do// de la ji ltar na brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa yin zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
248b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/ sems can gyi khams kyang mtha' yas mu med pa yin pas/ de dag bdag gcig pu
249a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med pas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su dgod par bya'o snyam du sems te/ de rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang /
249a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhi des brtson 'grus rtsom par byed cing / de lus kyi tshor ba la lus dang ldan pa'i dran pas nye bar rtog par byed do// de tshor ba la nye bar rtog pa la brtson par byed pa
249a3(dkon brtsegs): na sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang / chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba la'ang brtson par byed do// de de ltar dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag pa na/ sdig
249a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skye da/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog par
249a5(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyed pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skye da 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog
249a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'dun pa skye da/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag
249a7(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu 'jog par byed do/ / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / byir zhing 'byung ba dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / brjed par mi 'gyur ba
249b1(dkon brtsegs): dang yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed do//
249b2(dkon brtsegs): de de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pa na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang po sgom par byed do// de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa 'ang
249b3(dkon brtsegs): sgom par byed do/ / de de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su grub pas bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par gnas shing / de bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag
249b4(dkon brtsegs): bar yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de ltar brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do// brtson 'grus de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
249b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed la/ brtson 'grus des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do// de la ji ltar na bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par byed pa yin zhe na/
249b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dor chags dang bral ba la mi gnas pa dang / 'gog pa la mi gnas pa dang / rnam par spangs par yongs su ma bsngos pa dang / nang la mi gnas pa dang / phyi rol
249b7(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas pa dang / gzugs la mi gnas pa dang / tshor ba la mi gnas pa dang / 'du shes la mi gnas pa dang / 'du byed la mi gnas pa dang / rnam par shes pa
250a1(dkon brtsegs): / la mi gnas pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa dang / gzugs kyi khams la mi gnas pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la mi
250a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la mi gnas pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi gnas pa dang / 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas pa dang / 'jig
250a3(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol la mi gnas pa dang / gzugs la mi gnas pa dang / s+tha la mi gnas pa dang / dri la mi gnas pa dang / ro la mi gnas pa dang / reg la mi gnas pa
250a4(dkon brtsegs): dang chos la mi gnas pa dang / sbyin pa la mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims la mi gnas pa dang / bzod pa la mi gnas pa dang / brtson 'grus la mi gnas pa
250a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bsam gtan la mi gnas pa dang / shes rab la mi gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu mdor na chags pa thams cad spangs nas mi gnas par bsam gtan byed de/ de lta
250a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do/ / bsam gtan de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed la/ bsam gtan nges kyang rlom sems
250a7(dkon brtsegs): su mi byed do/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na shes rab sgom par byed pa yin zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can gyi khams mu med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das
250b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang sems can gcig kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad ni sems
250b2(dkon brtsegs): can med pa'o/ / chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro snyam ste/ de ltar shes rab sgom par byed do// shes rab de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
250b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed la/ shes rab des kyang rlom sems su mi byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe/
250b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gyis// 'od 'bar 'byung gnas nyid na 'dug/ khyi dor byas na de bas ni// nyis
250b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyis kyang mdzes pa ltar/ / de bzhin rigs dang ldan pa yang / byang chub sems ni tshol byed de// mtha' gnyis rnam par dag pa yi// spyod yul du ni bdud mi 'ong //
250b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa
250b7(dkon brtsegs): dang chos la dga' ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa yin te/ des dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ bkres pas nyen cing zas 'dod pa gzhan dag mthong na/
251a1(dkon brtsegs): des de dag la ldum ldum mam/ sngo rngad dam/ bza' bca' ci bdog cing yod pa dag sbyin par byed cing / de 'jig rten gyi 'tsho ba dang yo byad 'di lta
251a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bsags shing / sems can rnams la sbyin par byed pa dang / de dam pa'i chos 'dzin
251a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi drung du song ste gus par smra ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mngon par ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang / gus par bya ba'i las dag byas nas zhe sa dang bcas/ gus
251a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcas pas tshul bzhin du dri ba 'dri bar byed cing / de'i 'og tu de la dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de'ang ji ltar dri ba dris pa bzhin du lan 'debs par byed la/ de'ang dam pa'i chos
251a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa de la ston par 'du shes skyed par byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed par byed/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed par 'du shes skyed par byed/ mkhan
251a6(dkon brtsegs): por 'du shes skyed par byed/ slob dpon du 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag yun ring po nas 'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams pa tshol bar byed pa yin no snyam du tshol bar byed pa yin par
251a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag yun ring po nas gti mug gis bsgribs shing gnyid log pa'i gnyid sad par byed pa yin no zhes sad par byed pa yin par 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag
251b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam du bying ba 'byin par byed pa yin no zhes 'byin par byed pa yin par 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag lam ngan par zhugs pa la lam bzang po ston par byed pa/
251b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhes lam ston par byed pa yin por 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag 'khor ba'i btson rar bcings pa 'grel pa yin no zhes 'grel par byed pa yin par 'du shes skyed par
251b3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ bdag yun ring po nas nyam thag pa'i sman pa dam pa yin no zhes sman pa yin par 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang /
251b4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi me sa kun tu 'bar bar gyur pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no zhes char sprin chen po yin par 'du shes skyed par byed cing / de chos kyi rgyu dang / chos kyi gzhi dang /
251b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi ched kyi phyir tsha ba'ang khyad du gsod/ grang ba dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa'ang khyad du
251b6(dkon brtsegs): gsod/ bkres pa'ang khyad du gsod/ skom pa'ang khyad du gsod la/ gzhan bde ba dag mthong na'ang 'dod pa'i sems skyed par mi byed par de 'di snyam du sems te
251b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i snang ba 'char bas na/ bdag 'jig rten na bde ba yin no snyam du sems te/ de rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des mya ngan mi byed/ smre sngags
252a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'don cing / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba'i sems skyed par mi byed la/ de mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
252a2(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang bral bas/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos tshig gcig tsam gyi phyir yang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba
252a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po mnar med par gnas par spro'o snyam pa de lta bu'i sems skye bar 'gyur zhing / de de ltar yid yongs su skyo ba med pas na/ bsgrim mi dgos pa kho nar rnam pa thams cad
252a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par sgrub par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa rnams kyang thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dod pa
252a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / de nas de'i tshe becom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rgyal ba'i sras po shes rab che// chos 'dod par ni gyur pa rnams// dam
252a6(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su tshol ba na/ / skyo ba skyed par mi byed do// gus pas dam chos yongs tshol ba'i// rgyal ba'i thugs las skyes pa rnams// sems kyis 'dzin
252a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / / nan tan gyis ni sgrub pa yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la nye bar rtog par byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di
252b1(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar nye bar rtog par byed de/ chos thams cad ni byis pa'i skye bo kun tu rmongs par byed pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni yod pa ma yin
252b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir rmi lam lta bu'o/ / chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i phyir chu zla lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni sems can med pa'i phyir mig yor lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni yang dag
252b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa kun btags pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/ / chos thams cad ni byung nas 'jig cing 'ju ba'i phyir brag cha lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
252b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phyir byung nas 'jig cing 'ju ba yin no/ / chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no// chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'i phyir ma
252b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa yin no/ / chos thams cad ni byed pa po med pa'i phyir bcos ma ma yin pa'o// ros thams cad ni gos pa med pa'i phyir nab mkha' lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
252b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis kun tu 'bar ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no/ / chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir gzod ma nas yongs su dag pa yin no// chos thams
252b7(dkon brtsegs): cad ni dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa yin no/ / chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir gzod ma nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// chos thams cad ni
253a1(dkon brtsegs): nges par snang ba ma yin pa'i phyir gzugs can ma yin no/ / chos thams cad ni lus med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// chos
253a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni gnas yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no/ / chos thams cad ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs pa'i phyir rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no// chos thams
253a3(dkon brtsegs): cad ni nyon mongs pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'dus pa'i phyir gnas med pa yin no/ / chos thams cad ni thabs la mkhas pa'i rig pa dang bral ba'i phyir sbrul gdug pa lta bu yin no//
253a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni snying po med pa'i phyir chu shing gi sdong po lta bu yin no// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'i phyir dbu ba rdos pa lta bu yin no zhes nye bar rtog par byed pa yin te/
253a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la nye bar rtog par byed pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// chos kun sgyu ma lta
253a6(dkon brtsegs): bu ste/ / byis pa rnams kyi sems rmongs byed// yang dag ma yin rmi 'dra bar// de ltar ltos shig dge slong dag/ chos rnams chu zla lta bu ste// mig yor gyis ni kun nas bslang // chos
253a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzugs brnyan lta bur ni/ / mkhas pa su zhig rtog mi byed/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa yin men/
253b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag go zhes yang dag par rjes su lta zhing / gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du mi byed par/
253b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor gyi chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis legs par rtogs par byed cing / de dag gi mtshan ma rnams dang / legs par bshad pa rnams dang / legs par
253b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan btab pa rnams legs par zin par byed la/ mtshan ma dang / legs par bshad pa dang / legs par mtshan btab pa legs par bzung ba de dag la/ de'i chos kyi dbyings kyi
253b4(dkon brtsegs): lam rtsol ba med pa kho nar 'jug pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes yang dag par rjes su lta zhing / rnam par shes pa la 'dod
253b5(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du mi byed par/ chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor gyi chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis legs par rtogs par byed cing / de dag gi mtshan ma
253b6(dkon brtsegs): dngar legs par bshad pa dang / legs par mtshan btab pa de dag legs par zin par byed la/ mtshan ma dang / legs par bshad pa dang / legs par mtshan btab pa legs par
253b7(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba de dag la/ de'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lam rtsol ba med pa kho nar 'jug pa dang / mi rtag pa la ji lta ba bzhin du sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa la'ang de bzhin
254a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ de gzugs bdag med do zhes yang dag par rjes su lta zhing / gzugs bdag med do zhes yang dag par rjes su lta ba na/ gzugs kyis mi skrag mi
254a2(dkon brtsegs): dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba yin la/ des de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
254a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes yang dag par rjes su lta zhing / rnam par shes pa bdag med de//
254a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes yang dag par rjes su lta ba na/ rnam par shes pas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su rtog
254a5(dkon brtsegs): pas kun nas bslang ba yin la/ des de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma
254a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa zhig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sgyu mar byas pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sim/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi
254a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dag mngon par sprul te bstan par gyur na/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can ni de mthong na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des de ni//
254b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyu mar byas pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa dang / brdzun pa dang / slu bar byed pa'i chos yin par rig cing kun tu shes pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du
254b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzugs bdag med do zhes yang dag par rjes su lta ba na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni yang dag pa ma yin
254b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba yin la/ des de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
254b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa bdag med do zhes yang dag par rjes su lta ba na/ rnam par shes pas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa
254b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba yin la/ des de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
254b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam ngag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su lta zhing
254b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du mi bgyid par/ chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor gyi chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis legs par rtogs par bgyid
255a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la 'di
255a2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di na skyes bu mkhas pa la la dpes bshad pa'i don kun shes par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir dpe brjod par byas nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di/
255a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig dug spyod par gyur na/ de dus dus su dug de byi dor byed/ sbed par byed/ nor du byed/ bdag gir byed cing / yo
255a4(dkon brtsegs): byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag tu 'tshong bar byed kyi/ de za bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi 'dis bdag gi srog gi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro// rigs
255a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang mya ngan las 'da' bar sems pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba la gzhol ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba la 'bab pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la/
255a6(dkon brtsegs): bab par yang byed mod kyi/ mya ngan las 'das pa de mngon sum du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi 'dis bdag byang chub las ldog par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro//
255a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig me spyod par gyur na/ de dus dus su me de la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/
255b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod par byed/ legs par rim gror byed kyang / de 'di snyam du bdag gis me 'di la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas// mchod par byas/ legs par rim gror byas
255b2(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ 'di la lag pa gnyis kyis ni gzung bar mi bya'o snyam du sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi 'dis bdag la lus kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems kyi yid mi bde ba 'byung bar
255b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang mya ngan las 'das pa la sems pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba dang //
255b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la bab par yang byed mod kyi/ mya ngan las 'das pa de mngon sum du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi 'dis bdag
255b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las ldog par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba
255b6(dkon brtsegs): dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpas ni
255b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba kho nar gnas par bgyi ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpas ni 'khor
256a1(dkon brtsegs): ba kho nar gnas par bya ba yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe 'khor ba'i skyon rnams kyis mi
256a2(dkon brtsegs): gos pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir dpe brjod par byas nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sbrul 'dzin pa'i mi gsang sngags
256a3(dkon brtsegs): dang sman gyi stobs bskyed pa chen po dang ldan pa ni/ sbrul gdug pa dag dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang / gzhi des de'i srog gi bar chad byed par yang mi 'gyur
256a4(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab dang / thabs dang / rig pa'i gsang sngags dang / sman gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
256a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
256a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po dag mya ngan las 'das pa de'ang mngon sum du mi bgyi la/ 'khor ba'i skyon de dag gis kyang mi gos pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ngo
256a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' de dag la skyabs/
256b1(dkon brtsegs): su mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tha na sems dang ba gcig tsam rnyed par gyur pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa
256b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ nyan par bgyid pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
256b3(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos
256b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ nyan par byed pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba yin no// chos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya po
256b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur nas/ sems rnam par grol ba de dag stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo
256b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbar ba dag btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
256b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa lags
257a1(dkon brtsegs): so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
257a2(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / grags chen thabs la mkhas pa dang // shes rab khyad par 'phags pa yis// nyan thos rnams kyi sa dag las// yang dag 'das par gyur pa dang // /
257a3(dkon brtsegs): phung po skyo 'jig zad 'gyur bar// yang dag ji bzhin shes gyur kyang // 'gro ba nyam thag 'di mthong nas// mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gro ba'i// shes rab che rnams phyag bya'i 'os//
257a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med rnams phyag bya'i 'os// spyan yangs ldan rnams phyag bya'i 'os// rgyal ba'i sras rnams phyag bya'i 'os// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
257a5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di
257a6(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal zhes bya ba ni bdag ni gzhan dag dang / rus dang / gzugs dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor dang / yo byad gang yang rung ba dag gam/ glang po che'i tshogs sam/
257a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs dag mi mtshungs so snyam du 'gran par byed cing / de ltar sems mngon par mtho bar byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni nga rgyal zhes
257b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / che ba'i nga rgyal zhes bya ba ni bdag ni gzhan dag pas rigs dang / rus dang / gzugs dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor dang / 'bru phun sum tshogs pa dag gam
257b2(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs dag gis khyad par du 'phags pa yin no snyam du sems la/ de ltar sems khengs shing
257b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dud pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni che ba'i nga rgyal zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag dang bral bas na/ de'i phyir nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang bral ba zhes bya'o// de nas de'i tshe
257b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal ni zhing rtag tu byams pa'i sems// snying rje'i yid dang ldan zhing 'gro ba dag la bag yod pa'i//
257b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gtso bo yangs pa 'di na bsod snyoms spyod byed cing // lha dang mi rnams dag la phan parjod par byed pa yin// // bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o//
257b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
257b7(dkon brtsegs): pas dgongs te gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab mo gang dag yin pa de dag la sgra ji bzhin kho nar mngon par zhen par mi byed pa yin te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa
258a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes gsungs pa ni/
258a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mi blta'o// kun dga' bo nga ni ro rgya ba na'o zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi blta'o// nga ni rgas 'khogs te gtugs pa yin gyis/ nga'i bsnyen bkur ba tshol cig ces
258a3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi blta'o/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod song la sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi gnas nas sman long zhig dang bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi
258a4(dkon brtsegs): blta'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig tu tshig gis rtsod par byed do zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de bzhin
258a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pas zug go zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi blta'o/ / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa lhas byin ni yun ring po nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed ma
258a6(dkon brtsegs): dang gcugs can dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bor gyur pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir bram ze'i grong sA la can du ji/
258a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung ngo zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi blta'o// bram ze'i bu mo dregs mas shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
258b1(dkon brtsegs): la skur pa btab bo zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi blta'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med kyi ljongs su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na/ zla ba gsum du rta chas kyi nas/
258b2(dkon brtsegs): ngadag gsol to zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri
258b3(dkon brtsegs): med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa
258b4(dkon brtsegs): de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas nyan thos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa gang yin pa de
258b5(dkon brtsegs): ni rigs las brtags te lung bstan to/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par rgyun chad pa dag la rigs mchis su
258b6(dkon brtsegs): lags kyang / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i
258b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhig la bu zhig bdog par gyur la/ de'ang bzo'i gnas thams cad slob
259a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing / de dbang po rtul la dbang po mi rno ba zhig yin pas/ de phyis bslab par bya ba gang yin pa de ni sngar slob par byed la/ sngar bslab par bya ba
259a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni phyis slob par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de gzhi des rgyal po'i bu ma yin no zhes brjod par bya ba yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
259a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni ma lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags te/ de ni rgyal po'i bu zhes bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rigs
259a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rtul po'ang bsgom pa'i lam gyis sngar nyon mongs pa rnams zad par byed cing / phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
259a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhi des mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bya snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
259a6(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dod chen po ma gtogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes de skad mchi ba'i sems can de ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i
259a7(dkon brtsegs): skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dpe gzhar yang nyon
259b1(dkon brtsegs): cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa zad nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gam/ 'on te ma zad pas 'dug
259b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pas nas mchis lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bas nas mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
259b3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de gzhi des mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags so// bde bar gshegs
259b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la'ang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom
259b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kun dga' bo nga ni ro rgyab na'o zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas phyi ma'i skye bo de bzhin gshegs
259b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku rdo rje ltar sra ba'ang sku ro rgyab snyung na/ gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pa la thugs brtse bas de skad gsungs pa yin na/ de la mi blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs
259b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku ro rgyab snyung zhe'o zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed de/ de dag ni rang yang nyams par byas la/ gzhan yang nyams par byed pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de la dgongs
260a1(dkon brtsegs): nas de skad ces gsungs so/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nga ni rgas 'khogs te gtugs pa yin gyis/ nga'i bsnyen bkur ba tshol cig
260a2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rigs kyi bu de'ang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la thugs brtse bas nga'i nyan thos rgas 'khogs
260a3(dkon brtsegs): t e gtugs pa gang dag gi lus la bsnyen bkur ba dgos pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes 'phongs par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de skad
260a4(dkon brtsegs): ces gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de las dgongs nas de skad gsungs pa yin na/ de la mi blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa bgres 'khogs te gtug go zhes sgra ji
260a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed de/ de dag kyang rang yang nyams par byas la/ gzhan yang nyams par byed pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mo'u 'gal
260a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu khyod song la sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi gan nas sman long zhig dang bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
260a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de'ang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la thugs brtse bas/ ngas nyan thos gang dag la sman dgos pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes
260b1(dkon brtsegs): 'a'ongs par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de skad gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de las dgongs nas de skad gsungs pa yin na/ de la mi blung po khacig sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed/
260b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu la zhes sa med pa dang / gus par bsgrim pa med pa ma yin par bstan cing dris na'ang rings pa rings pa kho nar snyun gsos sman bstan pa las na/
260b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku la snyun mnga' ba yin no snyam pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la'ang nyes dmigs dag snang ste/ chos mthong ba rnams la'ang de lta bu'i bag med
260b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/ so so'i skye bo dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos shes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed de/ de dag kyang rang yang nyams par byas la/ gzhan yang nyams par
260b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig tu tshig gis rtsod par byed
260b6(dkon brtsegs): do zhes gang gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'ang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la'ang dgra bo dang
260b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir rgol ba dag yod na/ bdag cag la lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pa dag la thugs brtse bas de skad gsungs pa yin na/ de la mi blun po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang dgra
261a1(dkon brtsegs): bo dang phyir rgol ba dag yod do zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa la'ang dgra bo
261a2(dkon brtsegs): dang phyir rgol ba dag med na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi chu bo chen po dang ldan pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
261a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pas zug go zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni las
261a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir bya ba nyid ston par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la'ang sngon byas pa'i las dag yod na/ gzhan dag la sgyu smos kyang ci dgos shes rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi nges sdig
261a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las la mi dga' zhing dga' bar mi 'gyur ba'i don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa las bdag gir bya ba nyid ston par mdzad pa yin na/ de la mi blun po de dag de
261a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal bas zug go zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa lhas
261a7(dkon brtsegs): byin ni yun rin po nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed ma dang / gzugs can dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bor gyur pa yin no gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi logs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
261b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te skyes bu dam pa lha sbyin med par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gcig kyang yod par mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu gang gi
261b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir skyes bu dam pa lhas byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la brtsod pa dang / bsgrin pa dang / phyir brgal ba dag bstan pa de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid dag
261b3(dkon brtsegs): yod par mngon no/ / rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i tshig gis skyes bu dam pa lhas sbyin gyis 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'jom par bya'o snyam nas grong bar gyi dbus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
261b4(dkon brtsegs): la glang po che nor skyong rbad par gyur pa gang yin pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas btul cing rnam par btul nas dul bar mdzad de/ skye bo phal po ches de mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing rmad du byung /
261b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dzin pas/ dkon mchog gsum po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la skyabs su dong ste/ de'ang skye bu dam pa lha sbyin gyi
261b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu'i rtsal yin par blta bar bya'o/ / de la mi blun po de dag ni kye ma lha sbyin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsheng ma dang / gcugs can dang / phyir rgol ba yin ro zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar
261b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par byed do/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshe rabs lnga brgyar skyes bu dam pa lha sbyin gyis gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i ye/
262a1(dkon brtsegs): tan thams cad bstan par bya ba'i phyir byas pa yin na/ de la mi blun po kha cig kye ma lha sbyin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed ma dang / gcugs can dang /
262a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir rgol ba yin no zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin te/ de dag ni gzhi des lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
262a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa lhas byin ni tshogs shin tu bsags pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa/ rgyal ba du ma la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/
262a4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ byang chub chen po la gzhol ba/ byang chub chen po la 'bab pa/ byang chub chen po la bab pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
262a5(dkon brtsegs): nye ba yin pas na/ de la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
262a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ bram ze'i grong sA la can du ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung ngo zhes
262a7(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'ang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la bltas te de lta bu bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
262b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la bltas nas de lta bu bstan te/ dge slong
262b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms pa kha cig bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs pa'i tshe/ bdag nyid
262b3(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams chung bas bsod snyoms ma rnyed pa na/ de dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byas nas/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs
262b4(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pa de nyid kyang ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung na/ bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa'i rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bsod snyoms
262b5(dkon brtsegs): ma rnyed pa 'dis bdag cag yongs su gdung bar mi bya'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ba'i don gyi dbang 'di gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ bram ze'i grong
262b6(dkon brtsegs): sA la can du ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung bar bstan to/ / gzhan yang bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams byin gyis brlabs pas na/ de ltar
262b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms mi ster to zhes zer na/ de'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i song snyoms kyi bar chad byed par mi nus pa'i phyir
263a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kun tu byin gyis brlabs pa yin gyi
263a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med de/ sems can de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu ston par
263a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do/ / de bzhin gshegs pas zhal zas bcad cing chad pa de na/ bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang / lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma dang / nyan thos dag
263a4(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde bar mi 'dug gam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i thugs la sems par byed de/ de dag nyin mtshan du de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge
263a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun dang bcas pa'i thugs la sems kyis sems par byed pa na/ thugs kyi gnas gcig tsam la'ang mtho ba med cing dma' ba med la/ sngon ji lta ba bzhin du phyis kyang de bzhin
263a6(dkon brtsegs): phyis ji lta ba bzhin du sngon yang de bzhin te/ yid mi bde ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong nas/ de'i tshe na lha'i bu bdun khri 'dus par gyur pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs
263a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la rab tu btud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang / de dag thams cad chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bshad de/ de ltar na
263b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i skye bo la gzigs pa yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi sgrib pa yod pa ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bram ze'i bu mo
263b2(dkon brtsegs): dregs mas shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab bo zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
263b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pas bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'phang bar yang
263b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pas las kyi bya ba bstan te/ nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba la skur pa btab pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag yang dag pa ma
263b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i skur pas skur bar 'gyur bas/ de dag 'gyod pa can du gyur pa'i tshe/ de dag skur pa btab pa na 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa des kyang re
263b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig mngon sum du skur pa brnyes par gyur na/ bdag cag gis lta ci'i phyir mi rnyed ces zer zhing / de dag de'i tshe na skur pa de zil gyis mnan nas/ tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa/
263b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su byang ba spyod par 'gyur ba dang / nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro// bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma ni re zhig sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyas pa yin pas/ rmi lam na'ang de bzhin gsheg
264a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la skur pa 'debs par byed pa yin te/ shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas de kun
264a2(dkon brtsegs): tu bsrung bar spyod do zhes mkhyen par gyur na ni/ de kun tu bsrung bar yang mdzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'ga' yang yongs su ma gtang ba'i
264a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med kyi ljongs su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na/ zla ba gsum du rta chas kyi
264a4(dkon brtsegs): nas dag gsol to zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyis bu ngas bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag de bzhin gshegs pa
264a5(dkon brtsegs): spyan drang bar mi sems par shes te/ shes bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa der dbyar gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par zla ba
264a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum kyi bar du gang dag gi rta chas stsol ba'i rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa sha stag yin te/ de dag sdig pa'i
264a7(dkon brtsegs): grogs po'i dbang du song nas/ sdig pa'i las byas pas/ las des de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te/ rta lnga brgya po de dag gi nang na rta cang shes gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
264b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba smon lam gyi dbang gis bsams bzhin du der skyes pa yin la/ rta lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po de nyid kyis byang chub yang dag par
264b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du bcug pa yin pas/ de de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir der skyes te/ rta cang shes de nyid kyi mthus rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur
264b3(dkon brtsegs): cing de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de'ang mngon du gyur pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rta lnga brgya po de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dbyar der gnas so//
264b4(dkon brtsegs): de na rta cang shes kyis chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul lo// rta lnga brgya po de dag gi chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed phyed ni dge slong lnga
264b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya po de dag la 'bul zhing / rta cang shes des rta'i skad des rta lnga brgya po de dag sdig pa 'chags su bcug cing / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya po dag la phyag 'tshal du'ang brlag
264b6(dkon brtsegs): go/ rigs kyi bu de nas zla ba gsum po de dag 'das nas rta lnga brgya po de dag shi 'phos te/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes nas/ lhar gyur pa de dag gis yang de
264b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang
265a1(dkon brtsegs): chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ / rtardza po de dag 'dul zhing 'tsho bar byed pa'i rta rdzi gang yin pa de'ang / de bzhin gshegs pas rang sangs
265a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rab tu sems dul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas gang yin pa de la ni mi bsod pa cung zad kyang med de/ rigs
265a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo la sogs pa yongs su longs spyad par gyur na'ang / shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang /
265a4(dkon brtsegs): gyo mo la sogs pa de dag gi ro de lta bu dang / ro bro ba'i mchog gang dag yin pa de lta bu dag ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
265a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba brnyes pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs des na khod kyis 'di ltar blta ste/ de bzhin
265a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i zhal zas thams cad ni bsod pa yin par rig par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dge slong kun dga' 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs
265a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rta chas kyi nas dag gsol bar mdzad pa lta zhes snying rje bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de'i sems la rnam par gzigs nas/ kun dga' bo 'di ci'i ro yin shes sam zhes
265b1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyi 'bru gcig byin pa dang / des de zos nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur te/ ngal 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgyal po'i khyim du skyes shing rgyal po'i khyim du legs par rgyas pa
265b2(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ bdag gis ro 'di lta bu ni sngan chad ma myong lags so zhes zer te/ de'i byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zas mi za bar dga' ba dang bde bas zhag bdun 'das par gyur to//
265b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang la'ang las kyi sgrib pa mi mnga' ba yin par rig par bya ste/ sems can gang dag dge/
265b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag mgron du gnyer la zas 'bul bar mi byed pa de dag gis ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa nyid kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ las kyi rgyud de lta bu
265b5(dkon brtsegs): dag nye bar ston par mdzad do/ / rigs kyi bu gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs la/ zhal zas ma gsol ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos su lung bstan
265b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid kyi khyad par la ltos/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par
265b7(dkon brtsegs): khas blangs pa'i dge slong lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag las dge slong bzhi bcu ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang / sdug pa'i mtshan ma la spyod pa yin pas/ gal te de'i tshe na de dag gis zas bsod
266a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag zos par gyur na 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa shin tu shas chen po dag skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de dag gis zas ngan pa zos pa des 'dod chags dang ldan
266a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag srab mor gyur nas/ de dag gis zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa
266a3(dkon brtsegs): nges par rtogs pa des ni legs pa kho nar nges par rtogs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe
266a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag/ bkri don gsungs pa gang yin dang // nges don gsungs pa gang yin pa// legs pa
266a5(dkon brtsegs): kho nar rtogs par byed/ / brtan pa dgongs la mkhas gyur pa// nying mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa rnams// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan gyis// gsungs pa khong du chud pa yin//
266a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'dod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
266a7(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag gam/ dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal dag gam/ yid dgas kyi sdug bsngal dag gis kun tu gdung shing tsha bar gyur kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
266b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i theg pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa ma sdud cing / e mar gyis bdag len pa med par bag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur cig ces don cung ngur ma byed de/ bya ba cung ngu/
266b2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed cing / don nyung ba nyid dang bya ba nyung ba nyid la brtson par mi byed kyi/ de ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i las bya ba dag la grogs su 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa
266b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos
266b4(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'dod pa yin no/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// snying rje'i
266b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid can dag ni/ / ri 'dra'i sems kyis spyod byed la// sems can don la mi skyo zhing // byang chub las ni phyir mi ldog/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can la// phan par 'dod pas skyo mi byed//
266b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan la phan pa'i phyir// bag med pa yang mi byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin cher zla 'od
266b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos gang dag dang ldan ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags pa'i chos bcu po de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
267a1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal lags na/ don gang gis na theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma sprul lags so// de skad ces gsol pa
267a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de khyod nyid la
267a3(dkon brtsegs): dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin du lan thob cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu lam gang nas
267a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i lam de ji skad brjod par bya snyam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni rgyal po'i gshegs shul zhes brjod par bgyi lags so// shul po che zhes brjod par bgyi/ shul bde ba zhes
267a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bgyi/ shul bzang po zhes brjod par bgyi/ zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i shul zhes brjod par bgyi/ 'khrug long ma mchis pa'i shul zhes brjod par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan
267a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gang gis gshegs pa'i theg pa de la'ang theg pa chen po zhes
267a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / theg pa mchog ces bya/ theg pa rab ces bya/ theg pa rab mchog ces bya/ theg pa thu bo zhes bya/ theg pa gtso bo zhes bya/ theg pa bla na med pa zhes bya
267b1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa gong na med pa zhes bya/ theg pa mnyam pa med pa zhes bya/ theg pa mi mnyam pa med pa zhes bya/ theg pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir
267b2(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po ni bzang ba lags so// bde bar gshegs pa theg pa chen po ni bzang ba lags
267b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni bdag gi bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'das shing / gzhan dag kyang yang dag par 'da'
267b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa yin gyis/ bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma de dang chos kyi rnam grangs de la mtho ba tsam du 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas bdud
267b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa go gyon nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba de logs su song ba dang / byang chub
267b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos/ bdud sdig can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das la mtho ba tsam pa dang
267b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par bya ba'i bsam pas 'ong bar mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par byas te/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba
268a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byabs/ bdud sdig can dpung na tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por song nas/ lam po che dang / lams
268a2(dkon brtsegs): gi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu sgra sgrogs par byed/ dbyangs rjod par byed cing / 'di skad ces rgyal po'i khab kyi mi khyed cag shes par gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
268a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs
268a4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ dor bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang
268a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos ston par mdzad/ rab tu ston par mdzad kyis/ de'i phyir khyed cag kyang dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar deng zhig dang / des khyed cag la yun ring
268a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang rjes su bsgrags so// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal kyi mi dang / yul gyi
268a7(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams bdud sdig can gyis bskul ba na/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dar
268b1(dkon brtsegs): dag thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
268b2(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bdud sdig car yang dpung gi tshogs yar lag pa'i dang
268b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dag mngon par sprul nas/
268b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag pa'i
268b5(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos/ bdud sdig can phyogs
268b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / sdig can khyod dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci la 'ongs/ bdud kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan
268b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mtho ba tsam pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya ba'i bsam pas 'ongs so// byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos smras pa/ sdig can khyod de
269a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la mtho ba tsam pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i bar chad byas pas khyod la ci bya/ sdig can khyod la des yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang //
269a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur bar khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nyes pa la nyes par shog shigade nas bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
269a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dri med rnam dag rin cher zla 'od rgyal po las rjes su 'thun pa'i gdam ngag rjes su bstan pa de thos nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
269a4(dkon brtsegs): ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa/ rmongs pa/ mi gsal ba/ mi mkhas pa bdag gi tshod ma
269a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pa dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu la bar chad bgyi bar brtsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das nongs pa la nongs par bshad par 'tshal lo// bde
269a6(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa nongs pa la nongs par bshags par 'tshal zhing slan chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa de legs par rjes su
269a7(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar gsol zhes/ nyes pa la nyes pa'i sgo nas bshags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyes pa byung na rnam
269b1(dkon brtsegs): par dag par lnga ba dang / nyes pa la nyes par lta bar 'chags par byed/ sbyong bar byed cing / phyin chad kyang sdom par byed na 'phags pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di 'phel ba
269b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de nas bdud sdig can stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis
269b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub po ni thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi dge ba'i las kyi lam du gdags pa ma mdzad lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can
269b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no/ / bdud kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi mnga' bdag ci'i slad du bdag la sdig can zhes bgyi ba'i sgras kun rjod par mdzad
269b5(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can de'i phyir 'di na skyes bu mkhas pa la la bshad pa'i don dpes kun shes par 'gyur ba dag yod pas dpe nyon cig/ sdig can 'di
269b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag phyug po nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig la bu sdug pa/ 'dod pa/ dga' ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ mthong nami mthun pa gcig pu zhig bdog par gyur
269b7(dkon brtsegs): cing / de'ang de dang 'brel pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar gyur la/ de'i bu gcig pa de'ang gdul dka' ba dang / bcos dka' ba dang / g.yo sgyu can zhig yin par gyur nas// tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag des rba
270a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa de 'di lta ste/ nyes pa de las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir lags pas kyang rdeg par byed/ dbyig pa dang / khu tshur dang / brdeg pa gang yang rung ba dag gis kyang
270a2(dkon brtsegs): rdeg par byed cing / ngag rtsub po dag gis kyang sdigs par byed na/ sdig can 'di ji snyam du sems// tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de bu gcig pa de la khro ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'thab pa
270a3(dkon brtsegs): dang brngam pa'i bsam pas rdeg par byed pa yin snyam mam/ bdud kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de lta ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
270a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni de la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du rdeg lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal mkhyen pa'ang
270a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can ngag rtsub pos 'dul ba rnams ni ngag rtsub pos 'dul bar mdzad do/ / sems can sma dbab pas 'dul ba rnams ni sma dbab pas 'dul bar mdzad do// sems can bsdu bas 'dul ba
270a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni bsdu bas 'dul bar mdzad do/ / sems can gzugs kyis 'dul ba rnams ni gzugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do// sems can sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyis
270a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba rnams ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyis 'dul bar mdzad do// de nas bdud sdig can dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / mchog tu
270b1(dkon brtsegs): yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
270b2(dkon brtsegs): to/ / bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog gam/ 'chad pa der bdag kyang chos mnyan pa
270b3(dkon brtsegs): dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / chos smra ba de la'ang sman gdags pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi lags so// de la snga ltas ni 'di dag lags par rig
270b4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ste/ de'i 'khor zhi ba dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa dang bral ba dang / de la chos nyan pa rgya chen po rgya chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
270b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chad pa dag gis de'i lus dub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems kyang ngal bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ji lta ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog pa dang / ston pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston/
270b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa de lta de ltar de'i sems dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / gzeng mtho ba nyid du'ang 'gyur lags so// de nas gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu gang dag 'khor
270b7(dkon brtsegs): der 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis bdud kyis bshad pa 'di thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dang ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
271a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa la gzhan
271a2(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu 'di dag gis dang ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo
271a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam
271a4(dkon brtsegs): par gnon pa zhes bya ba zhig byung bas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid bshad do/ / des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na'ang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu mtho ba tsam pa'i
271a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa can dag lhags te/ lhags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas legs so legs par gsungs so bya ba'i tshig ni rjod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la sems dang ba dang /
271a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba ni ma thob bo// de dag rgyu de dang rkyen des bskal pa drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du lha dang mi rnams su skyes pa ma gtogs par// nam yang sems can dmyal ba rnams
271a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dud 'gro rnams dang / yi dgas rnams su ma skyes so// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba ma thob pas ni tshe rabs gzhan de dang de dag
271b1(dkon brtsegs): tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar gyur to/ / kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyur gyur pa de dag gzhan dag gcig yin snyam du khyod nem du
271b2(dkon brtsegs): dang yid gnyis dang / the tshom za bar gyur na/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i byor zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa
271b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kun tu rgyu de dag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo 'di dag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang bskyes shing / dga' ba'ang skyes// mchog tu dga' ba'ang skyes pas/ dnge bzhid
271b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang mdzad do/ / de nas gzhad mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu de dag lung bstan pa'i mod la skyes pa'i rang
271b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing rje
271b6(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags nyi khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe rang
271b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya chen
272a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs rgya
272a2(dkon brtsegs): bu mo gang la la zhig gis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa de bas ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig
272a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa de bsod nams res grangs med par ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe
272a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dren par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/
272a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang chos smra ba de la sdang ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ma lags pa ji tsam zhig
272a6(dkon brtsegs): skyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung bar gyur pa de bas ni/ rigs
272a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang chos smra ba de la sdang ba'i sems skyed par byed pa de bsod nams ma yin pa ches grangs med par ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i
272b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi snang bar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ma
272b2(dkon brtsegs): da pa rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bgyi lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis nas
272b3(dkon brtsegs): lus zhig ste gum pa'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur bar rjes su bsrung bar bgyi 'tshal ba'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
272b4(dkon brtsegs): bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de dag gi mdun du brjod par bya ba kho na yin no/ / da ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
272b5(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
272b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos bcu pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos zhus pa zhes bya bar rung
272b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal
273a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'o
273a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos bcu pa'i le'u
