308b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / g.yo sgyu dang ni bag med dang // gya gyu la sogs rab tu yang // thams cad 'dod chags bzhin du bshad// yang dag ye shes thob gyur na// mig ni zhi ba nyid du rtogs// zhi ba
309a1(dkon brtsegs): @nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir/ / 'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yang dag ye shes thob gyur na// sangs rgyas tshul la rab tu gnas// tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i
309a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ / 'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yang dag ye shes thob gyur na// sangs rgyas thabs la gnas par 'gyur// thabs la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir// 'od zer dag ni 'byung bar
309a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / yang dag ye shes ma bsgrubs par// sgrib pa dag ni gtan spongs shing // 'od zer 'byung ba bsgrub par ni// ngas sngon ma thos ma thong ngo // yang dag ye shes rab bsgrubs
309a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / sgrib pa'i gnod pa gtan spong zhing // spyod pa 'di rjes gang 'brang ba// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i spyod pa yongs tshol zhing // mdo sde 'di la bslab byas
309a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / de bzhin gshegs la gang mchod pa// yang dag ye shes thabs thob 'gyur// yang dag ye shes gang bsgrubs pa// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par gyis// 'od zer
309a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ / lag mthil 'bras bu ji bzhin no// mig la bdag med gang rmongs pa// dge sbyong chos ni nyams par 'gyur// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer/
309a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// mig la bdag med gang rtogs pa// dge sbyong chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// mig gi
309b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' nag dogs pa/ / rnabaskye ba'i mtha sa gas// bskye ba'i mtha rtogs pas// dge sbyong na sa// gal rtomag gang da/ yo sa/ ba sa du nga/ yong su shes pa ma gyu de
309b2(dkon brtsegs): 'is de lnga bu'i/ 'od par byed po 'jug gas te ga ny-id/ tha na yo su shes 'gyu // log ba'i tha' kyang / 'o su shes pa nyid du gyur gang dag de 'i de/ khri'i 'di zer byed brjob par yul / gal mim no sa nyid/ ma l
309b3(dkon brtsegs): egs par ma shes na/ / mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // legs pa nyid du mi shes pas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo
309b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid/ / mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // legs pa nyid du shes 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par
309b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni mngon sum ma shes na// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // mngon sum nyid du mi shes pas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer
309b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ / gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // mtha' ni mngon sum shes 'gyur na// mngon sum nyid du rab shes pas// gang zag de yis
309b7(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i/ / 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni legs par ma shes na// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // yongs su shes par mi 'gyur bas//
310a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag
310a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang / / mngon sum nyid du shes 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// rnam dag legs par ma shes na//
310a3(dkon brtsegs): rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa// legs pa nyid du mi shes pas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// rnam dag legs par
310a4(dkon brtsegs): shes gyur na/ / rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa// legs pa nyid du rtogs 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// de bzhin sna dang lce dang lus/
310a5(dkon brtsegs): yid dang gzugs sgra dri ro dang // reg bya chos dang sa chu dang // me rlung dag gis dngos po dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po dang // khams dang 'jig rten skye mched dang // sgra dang
310a6(dkon brtsegs): ming la sogs pa yang / / thams cad de bzhin rig par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
310a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing / / 'od zer 'gyed pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnam pa brgyad cu po 'di dag mngon par
310b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par bya'o/ / rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su srung zhing rjes su dran pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa srung zhing
310b2(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi byed pa dang / sems shin tu mnyam pa dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / 'dod chags kyi bsam pa med pa dang // bslu ba'i
310b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa med pa dang / theg pa chen po mdo sde dam pa dag mngon par yid ches pa dang / dbang phyug dang rgyags pa la zhen cing sred pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs
310b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang / bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / dgon pa na gnas pa dang / 'khor rnams la mi rten pa dang / rnyed pa la mi rten pa
310b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / grags pa la mi rten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la rab tu gnas pa dang / 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu ston pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la sgra med par ri mi
310b6(dkon brtsegs): gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la mchog gi bsam pa skyed pa dang / chos la gus pa'i phyir mkhan po dang slob dpon la shin tu bkur ba dang / mdo sde 'di'i
310b7(dkon brtsegs): don rab tu rtogs pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang / tshig smras pa rnams la mi bden pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa dang / dge
311a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyin pa gtang ba dang / bdud kyi las rab tu rtogs pa dang / dbang po rnams dam du bsrung ba dang / tshig rab tu brtags pa dang / don dam pa'i bden
311a2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa dang / sa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang / gzungs zad mi shes pa yongs su tshol ba dang / lus dang srog la 'phangs pa med pa dang / 'khor bzhi po dag la rjes su
311a3(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa yongs su bcad pa dang / 'jig rten phyi ma'i chos med do zhes zer ba'i log par lta ba rnams spangs pa dang / da dung ma bslabs pa dag la gya gyu'i
311a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma mi ston pa dang / gang bslab par gyur pa dag la ci nus kyis rnam par phye nas rab tu ston pa dang / glu dang rol mo'i sgra dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / rgyan dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi
311a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / bden pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gnyid rab tu spangs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba
311a6(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas la gus pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i las yongs su spangs pa dang / bslab pa'i gnas rnams la yang dag par brtson
311a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos la sred pa'i phyir grogs khyad par can la rten par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su tshol ba la skyo ba med pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba la shin tu mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi/
311b1(dkon brtsegs): chos srung zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / sdig pa'i las mi slong ba dang / bstan pa rnams la the tshom med pa dang / dpes ston pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang / gsang ba rnams rnam par phye nas
311b2(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed pa dang / byang chub chen po yongs su tshol ba la ngal ba med pa dang / mdo sde yang dag par gzung ba rnams rjod par byed pa dang / rang gi bslab pa mi spong ba dang / pha rol gyi smra ba rnams tshar
311b3(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang / spyod pa tshad med pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chos kyi ye shes de dag las sems nges par gyur pa dang / rgyu dang
311b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa dang / srid pa gsum po dag la chags pa med pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal spangs pa dang / mngon par yid ches pa dag la
311b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po rnam par gzhag nas ston par byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i bye brag rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' yongs su shes pa dang / gzhan gyi dring
311b6(dkon brtsegs): la mi ltos pa dang / yongs su spong ba'i spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus kyis grub par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad kyi bkod pa dag phun sum tshogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di
311b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam pa brgyad cu zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos brgyad cu po 'di dag ni chos lnga'i nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba shes pa
312a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / mya ngan las 'das pa shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad pa shes pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa shes pa dang / bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shes pa gang yin pa'o//
312a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos lnga po de dag ni chos gnyis kyi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyan pa dang / gzugs yod
312a3(dkon brtsegs): su dag pas rab tu brgyan pa gang yin pa'o/ / gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos gnyis po de dag ni chos gcig gi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
312a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba mngon par grub pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu yang chos rnam pa brgyad cu yod de/ de dag
312a5(dkon brtsegs): gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba legs par yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /
312a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab rgya chen por gyur pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba dang bral ba dang / nga rgyal rab tu bcom pa dang / tshig mnyen pa dang / dngos
312a7(dkon brtsegs): po sna tshogs rab tu shes pa dang / dge ba'i grogs po yongs su shes pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pa dang / spyod lam gyis sems can
312b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba dang / nyon mongs par lhung ba rnams kyi the tsom rab tu gcod pa dang / mi dge ba rnams la smod cing chos dkar po rnams mngon par sgrub pa dang / mi dge ba'i grogs po dang mi 'grogs pa
312b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa la yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / brtson 'grus rab tu rtsom pa dang / bdud kyi dngos po rab tu rtogs pa dang / bden pa
312b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams mngon du gyur pa dang / yang dag pa kho nar mchod pa byed pa dang / the tshom yongs su gcod pa dang // sems kyis rtag tu sems can yongs su bzla bar sems pa dang / srid pa rnams la mngon
312b4(dkon brtsegs): par zhen pa med pa dang / sems rgya chen po yongs su bskyed pa dang / sems can mi dge ba rnams la nyes dmigs yang dag par ston pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu spong
312b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'dod pa'i phan pa yongs su mi tshol ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'chos pa dang / 'phags pa rnams la gus pa bskyed pa dang /
312b6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la gnas pa dag la rten cing rim gro byed pa dang / theg pa dman pa dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag thag ring du spong ba dang / phyir rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa
312b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa rgya chen po bshams nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems kyis dbul bar byed pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / spobs pa phun
313a1(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa dang / dpe sna tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i chos rab tu ston par byed pa dang / stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba le lo med pa dang /
313a2(dkon brtsegs): don zab mo yang dag par ston pa dang / gzungs chen po dang ldan pa dang / chos yang dag par ston par byed kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / chos rgya cher spel bar byed pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa la chog shes
313a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / spyod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi dge ba rnams kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa
313a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge ba'i las yang dag par sgrub pa dang / phung po rnams khong du chud pa dang / lta ba rnams rab tu spangs pa dang / rgyu'i ngo bo nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang / sdod yul las yang dag par 'das pa
313a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / spyod yul ma yin pa yongs su spangs pa dang / yongs su dang ba skyed pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la rab tu dga' ba dang / mnyam pa nyid du yongs su sdud par
313a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / bdag med pa la mngon par ma chags pa dang / 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su tshol ba la mos pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba'i phyir dgon pa na gnas pa dang /
313a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bsod snyoms slong zhing le lo med par gyur pa dang / ji tsam rnyed pa de tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par byed pa dang /
313b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i grogs po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang / bdag gi zla ma yin pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang / so so'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa dang 'thun par byed pa dang / sangs//
313b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la shin tu dang ba dang / snod ma yin pa yongs su spong ba dang / mi mthun pa rnams la tshig sbyin par mi byed pa dang / gsol ba mi 'debs pa dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed pa dang / gsol
313b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'debs pa zhig 'ongs na ci rigs par ston par byed pa dang / zas la snyoms par gyur pa dang / rtag tu gtong zhing mnyam pa nyid du gtong ba dang / sgo chen po phye nas gtong bar byed pa gang yin pa
313b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni zla 'od gzhon nu chos rnam pa brgyad cu zhes bya ste/ 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba thob par byed do// de'i tshe zla 'od
313b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa chos de lta bu thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad mtha' mkhyen
313b6(dkon brtsegs): pas de slad rnams dag ye shes ston mdzad lags/ / rnam dag ye shes ston par mdzad pas ni// rnam dag 'od zer phun sum tshogs pa lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig bdag med mkhyen
313b7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ / de slad rnam dag dbyangs ni ston mdzad lags// rnam dag dbyangs ni ston par mdzad pas na// tshangs dbyangs mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa lags// bcom ldan sngon ri sems can phan
314a1(dkon brtsegs): btags pas/ / de skad rnam dag gsung ni rdzogs pa lags// rnam dag gsung ni yongs su rdzogs pas na// 'jig rten tshad med rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad//
314a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid stong mkhyen pas// de slad kun 'dzin mkhyen pa rdzogs pa lags// kun 'dzin mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med
314a3(dkon brtsegs): ston/ / de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khyad par mkhyen// mig gi khyad par dag kyang mtha' ma mchis// mkhyen pa'i ming ni dpag tu ma mchis pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston//
314a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yi ge khyad par sgo mkhyen pas// mig stong yi ge bral bar rab tu mkhyen// mig stong yi ge bral bar mkhyen pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston// gang zhig mig la
314a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag med rab sems pa/ / sangs rgyas gsung ni bden pa nyid du rtogs// sangs rgyas gsung ni bden par rtogs pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer nges pa ston// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog ni/
314a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs rdzogs pas// mig gi 'jig pa dpag med thugs su chud// mig gi 'jig pa rab tu mkhyen pas na// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog
314a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ / mig gi skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen// ji ltar bcom ldan mig gi skye mkhyen pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce lus yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya/
314b1(dkon brtsegs): dag dang chos// 'jig rten skyed dang sgra dang ming la sogs// thams cad la yang de bzhin rab tu mkhyen// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar
314b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol byon/ / bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// tshul khrims rnam dag pha rol byon dang ldan// ji ltar bcom ldan tshul khrims
314b3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol byon/ / bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// bzod pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan bzod pa'i pha rol byon// bdag/
314b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// brtson 'grus pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan brtson 'grus pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring por
314b5(dkon brtsegs): mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// bsam gtan pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan bsam gtan pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin
314b6(dkon brtsegs): sho ga/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// shes rab pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan shes rab pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje
314b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ / chos sku'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan chos sku'i pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis
315a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog gyur pa/ / rnam dag gzugs ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag gzugs ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs/
315a2(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rnam dag yid ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan yid ni yid ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang
315a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog gyur pa/ / yon tan mchog ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan yon tan mchog ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis
315a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog gyur pa/ / gzugs kyi mtshan ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan gzugs kyi mtshan ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang
315a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog gyur pa/ / rnam dag sgra ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag sgra ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis
315a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog gyur pa/ / rdzu 'phrul chen po dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul che ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/
315a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gdul slang srid pa gsum na bzhugs// ji ltar bcom ldan sems can 'dul mdzad pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/
315b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan 'khor ba'i spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// 'dod
315b2(dkon brtsegs): chags spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ / ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod chags spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// zhe
315b3(dkon brtsegs): sdang spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ / ji ltar bcom ldan zhe sdang spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// gti
315b4(dkon brtsegs): mug spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ / ji ltar bcom ldan gti mug spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//
315b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod sdang spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// zhe
315b6(dkon brtsegs): sdang gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das/ / ji ltar bcom ldan sdang rmongs spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//
315b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod rmongs spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//
316a1(dkon brtsegs): namanyam spyod pa dpag med yang dag 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan nam nyam spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por ma thags de pa shog/ 'dzin pa 'dod chags das
316a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs 'das pas/ / 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten lan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa zhe sdang dag las yod
316a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pas/ / 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa gti mug spyod las yongs
316a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa/ / 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pas// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'dod chags zhe sdang spyod
316a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa/ / 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa zhe sdang gti mug spyod 'das
316a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'dod chags gti mug spyod 'das
316a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa dug gsum cha mnyam spyod
316b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa/ / 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa mchog ldan
316b2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ / lha tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// klu tshogs
316b3(dkon brtsegs): mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// gnod sbyin mang po thams cad
316b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar mdzad/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// dri za thams cad rab tu 'dul mdzad cing //
316b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin grul bum dpag tu ma ma dris pa// 'khor bcas ji snyed rab tu 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha mi la lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa
316b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ / chos rnams yang dag don ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// yang dag de la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sdug bsngal zad
316b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' mkhyen/ / skye dgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// sdug bsngal zad la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu zad mtha' mkhyen
317a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ / skye dgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// rgyu bad de la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen
317a2(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog ldan pas/ / 'jig rten spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten spyod la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan
317a3(dkon brtsegs): pas/ 'jig rten gnas dang gnas med rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog
317a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ / 'jig rten las dang 'bras bu rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog
317a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ / 'jig rten rang bzhin sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa
317a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pas/ / thams cad kun tu 'gro ba'i spyod pa mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen
317a7(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog ldan pas/ / 'jig rten mos pa sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa
317b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pas/ / dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa
317b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pas/ / bsam gtan spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog
317b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ / rnam par thar pa'i spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan
317b4(dkon brtsegs): pas/ / cha mnyam spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//
317b5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms 'jug spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba rab mkhyen pas// 'khor ba
317b6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs rgyu las skyes par mkhyen/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab mkhyen pas// 'jig
317b7(dkon brtsegs): rten pa na 'dogs dpe zla yod ma mchis/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa ting 'dzin rab gnas pas// khyad
318a1(dkon brtsegs): par thabs kyi ye shes skyed par mdzad/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchon
318a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ / sngon gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dpag med mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog
318a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ / 'chi 'pho skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog
318a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ / nyon mongs zad pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa
318a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pas/ / bla med byang chub yang dag mngon sangs rgyas// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyi da shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa
318a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ / nyon mongs bag chags dag ni rab tu spangs// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs
318a7(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ / 'khor ba nges 'byung chos ni rab tu ston// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs
318b1(dkon brtsegs): sapas chos don rab mkhyen pas/ / sems can dpag med rnams la go bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs
318b2(dkon brtsegs): pas chos nyid sgyu ma dang / / rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyi da shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig
318b3(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad kyi/ / yi ge dag dang brjod pa rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog
318b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ / dam chos zab mo dag ni ston par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsung thugs 'dul
318b5(dkon brtsegs): bas/ / thams cad ye shes rjes su 'brang bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum rab mkhyer
318b6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ / 'dzin dang chags pa mi mnga' thogs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin
318b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab bsgrubs pas de las ldog mi 'gyur// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab
319a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pas/ / rnam grol mkhyen dang gzigs pa ldog mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/
319a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas zhe gnas lhag mthong bsgrubs// lha mi 'jig rten dag ra mtshungs ma mchis// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur
319a3(dkon brtsegs): cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor
319a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen ldan pas// 'gro ba sna tshogs dag ni gsal bar gzigs// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'gro ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog
319a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ / de slad de la rmongs pa yongs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skye zad nyid la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs
319a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rab zhi mtha' mkhyen pas/ / de slad de la rmongs pa yongs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// rab zhi de la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba'i mtha'
319a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas/ / de slad de la rmongs pa yongs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'khor ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen//
319b1(dkon brtsegs): de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// snga phyi'i mtha' la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skyon zlog mtha' rab mkhyen/
319b2(dkon brtsegs): slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skyon zlog de la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen// mig gi rtag
319b3(dkon brtsegs): chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// snga phyi mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas// mig gi rtag chad dag la
319b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin mi mnga'/ / bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog/ gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pas// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de
319b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ / de slad 'dod pa dag la zhe na mi mnga'// gang zhig yod med mtha' ni ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni/
319b6(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig zad dang ma zad ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas//
319b7(dkon brtsegs): de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig 'jug dang mi 'jug ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen nas// de slad 'dod pa dag la
320a1(dkon brtsegs): zhen mi mnga'/ / zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chal pa dang // g.yo sgyu phrag dog nga rgyal khengs pa dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam
320a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan shes rab dag kyang de bzhin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// zla 'di gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'od zer
320a3(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi kha dog lta bu rab tu bkye'o/ / 'od zer des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dpag tu med pa rnams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu phan pa dag byas nas/ bcom
320a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nyid du thim par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dug pa'i stan las
320a5(dkon brtsegs): langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas
320a6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa// 'brug dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing // ka la bing ka'i sgra phyung nas// chos rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin
320a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / ci yi slad du 'dzum pa mdzad// nyi ma stong pas khyad par 'phags// rnam dag spa rab dag dang ldan// yon tan ngo mtshar rab mnga' ba// ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad// sbyin dang
320b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ / bsam gtan shes rab rab brgyan pas// thams cad dag ni yongs rdzogs pa// ci skad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mnyes pas//
320b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub rnams ni rtag tu spangs// sems can nad ni legs gso ba// ci slad 'od zer bkye bar mdzad// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso// mig ni rtag tu stong dben mkhyen// rnam
320b3(dkon brtsegs): dag tshangs pa'i dbangs mnga' bas/ / sems can rnams la chos ston mdzad// rna ba sna lde lus dang yid// sgra dang ming la sogs pa nas// kun 'byung 'gog pa lam dag dang // ye
320b4(dkon brtsegs): shes bzod pa rab de bzhin/ / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso// mig zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang // rab zhi dang ni 'khor ba dag/ thams cad stong dben nyid du mkhyen// rna ba sna lce lus dang
320b5(dkon brtsegs): yid/ / gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// gzhan yang rten cing 'brel 'byung chos// chad dang rtag pa yongs bral nas//
320b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan gyis byas min pas// rkyen mang las byung nyid du gsung // res 'ga' rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis// sdug bsngal gzhi ni ston par mdzad// res 'ga' don ni sna tshogs
320b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ / sangs rgyas 'od zer bsngags par mdzad// res 'ga' tshig ni tshad med kyis// rab dben chos ni ston mdzad cing // gang zag srog dang bdag med dang // sems can med pa
321a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid du ston/ / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med kyang // bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis// tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis// de 'dra'i rgyas na ston par
321a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ / de bzhin gshegs pas yon tan nos// yang dag nyid ni ston mdzad kyang // brjod dang brjod bya mi mnga' bas// brjod mdzad chos kyang yong mi mnga'// bcom ldan yang
321a3(dkon brtsegs): dag chos gsung zhing / / skye dgu rnams ni go mdzad pas// lha rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dag/ gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur// lha ma yin ni thams cad kyang // mos pa dag ni
321a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag/ mi ni mang po tshad med kyang // the tshom dra ba chad par 'gyur// 'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rtogs// zhe sdang gti mug rnam par bshig/ sreng dang nga rgyal ma rika dang //
321a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo sgyu phrag dog spros pa nas// sdug bsngal phung po la sogs par// thams cad kyang ni yongs su spangs// 'di la sogs pa'i tshig gi don// mthar ni kun kyang rnam par dag/ de
321a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig la/ / sna tshogs ming ni rab mkhyen pas// grangs ni brgya stong mang po rnams// bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu ston// sangs rgyas tshad med mang po las//
321a7(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i chos ni legs bslabs pas// chos kyi dngos po gcig la yang // brjod pa thug pa med pa ston// de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi// rnam grangs sna tshogs rab
321b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas/ / ming tshig dang po bar ma dang // mtha' ma rnam 'byed rab tu mkhyen// tha dad tshig ni sna tshogs dag/ thams cad rab tu bslabs pas na// don mchog dag na gyi nom pa/
321b2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa dag la rab tu mkhyen// de 'dra'i dbyangs ni rnam dag pa// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung bas// lce 'bab zhig la rten pa nas// lus sems par la rten pa'ang min// sa ni rnam pa drug/
321b3(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yos// phyogs bcu'i 'khor ni yongs 'dus nas// thal sbyar bcom ldan zhal lta na// the tsom dag ni bsal du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad dang // skye mtha'
321b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rang bzhin gyis/ / rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang // 'gro 'ong med par rab tu mkhyen// bzhugs dang gnas ni mi mnga' bas// yang dag mtha' la rab tu bzhugs// bcom
321b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan spun ni thogs mi mnga'/ / de slad deng bdag zhu ba lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid kyi// sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag kyang // zad dang ma zad 'khor ba ni// rang bzhin
321b6(dkon brtsegs): stong dben rab mkhyen pas/ / chos kyi don rnams rab phye nas// 'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad// thub pa dbyangs snyan rab mnga' bas// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom
321b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan sngon dang phyi mtha' dang / / mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing // rnam rtog tshig dang bral lags na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan ming ni dpag med dang //
322a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong dben mkhyen lags na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan zad dang skye mtha' dang // mig nyid stong dben rab
322a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen cing / / nyon mongs rnams ni yongs spangs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa brnyes// grags pa mchog ni phun tshogs pa// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan
322a3(dkon brtsegs): yun ring bsgom bslabs pas/ / bsam gyis mi khyab ston par mdzad// mog nyid stong pa nyid du mkhyen// dri bral rtag tu rnam par dag/ sems kyi spyod pa tshad med rnams// dgongs pa gcig
322a4(dkon brtsegs): gi thams cad mkhyen/ / 'od zer 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// 'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags// drang srong chen po mngon sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags// nyon mongs dag ni rab
322a5(dkon brtsegs): bsal bas/ / thugs ni rtag tu zhi zhing dben// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog gis// mig zad mtha' ni rab tu rtogs// rgyu dang rkyen ni gang gi slad// deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston par
322a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ / rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen// rna ba
322a7(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ / sna nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan lce la bdag med mkhyen// lus kyang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sems nyid stong par
322b1(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhyen na/ / ci srad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen// sgra yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dri nyid stong par rab mkhyer na// ci slad 'dzub pa ston par
322b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ / bcom ldan rol bdag med mkhyen// reg bya mi rtag nyid du rtogs// chos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci sdad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sa la bdag med mkhyen/
322b3(dkon brtsegs): chu yang mi rtag nyid du rtog/ me nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rlung la bdag med mkhyen// ngo bo mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dngos nyid stong par
322b4(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhyen nas/ / ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag med mkhyen// sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs// phung po stong par rab mkhyen ma// ci slad 'dzum pa
322b5(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad/ / bcom ldan khams la bdag med mkhyen// 'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs// skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sba la
322b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag med mkhyen/ / ming yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// lam nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci skad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan ye shes bdag med mkhyen// rab dben mi rtag
322b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rtogs/ / sems can stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med// bdag dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen// mos pa ston par
323a1(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhyen na/ / ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// 'khor ba bdag med nyid du gzigs// rtag dang mi rtag pa yang mkhyen// mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen na//
323a2(dkon brtsegs): snasmad 'dzum pa ston pa ston par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnams grol// grags pa khams gsum kun tu gang // brgya byin mo yi dbang po dang // klu rnams la sogs kun
323a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mchod/ / de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad dang // skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen lags na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa// 'khor
323a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dir thams cad rab tu 'dus/ / sangs rgyas gsung las skyes pa dang // chos las sprul te gang byung ba// thams cad bcom ldan spyan sngar mchis// gus pas thal mo rab
323a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyar lags/ / 'khor 'dus de dag slad du ni// 'od zer rgyu rkyen 'di 'u lags// de zezhin gshegs pas mig nyid ni// stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na// khyim na gnas
323a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i rnal 'byor pa/ / thams cad las ni yang dag 'das// de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams ni// bye brag med cing mnyam mkhyen pa// bcom ldan dgongs pas rab mkhyen gyi//
323a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul dag gis gzigs ma yid// bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen// ngo bo nyid stong 'gro 'ong med// rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad ma mchis// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//
323b1(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gsum pa// de bzhin gshegs pa skye mtha' rab zad pa// thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten kun skyob mdzad// chos rje mchog gyur mi
323b2(dkon brtsegs): yi gtsor gyur pa/ / ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis// gzhan yang lha tshogs gzi byin che ba rnams// mkha' la gdugs
323b3(dkon brtsegs): ni dam pa dag kyang thogs/ / sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par 'gyur// gang zhig sngon ni de bzhin gshegs pa las// yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa// mnyab par dga'
323b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso/ / ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// gang zhig sngon ni sangs rgyas rab mchod nas// chos 'di thos nas dga' ba rab skyes nas// 'dren pa
323b5(dkon brtsegs): rab mchog mi li gtsor gyur pa/ / cisra 'dzum pa bstan mdzad ba shad du gsol// bcom ldan gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas// bya rgyal dang bzhin tu dbyangs na// sgra snya
323b6(dkon brtsegs): med rang gi dang gis 'byung / / tsaM slad 'od zer 'di bgyi bshad du gsol// tshigs bshad bye 'tshad ma mchis pa yi// rjes 'thun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod 'gyur zhing // @#
323b7(dkon brtsegs): yi swa skad mchog ldan pa/ / ci srang 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol// 'brug sba zab mos chos ni bstan pa'i sras// 'jig rten brgya stong dpag med grags gyur pa// thugs rjes
324a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig rtsub yang na 'jab ston pa/ / ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye// skye dang mi skye zad dang mi zad mkhyen// mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med par rtogs// 'jig
324a2(dkon brtsegs): rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i mchog gyur pa/ / ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye// mig gi 'byung ba rtag tu stong dben dang // 'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang // smig rgyu chu
324a3(dkon brtsegs): bur lta bur rab mkhyen pa/ / rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan lags// de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams nas// sgra dang ming la sogs
324a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar du yang / / thams cad de bzhin du ni rig par bgyi// rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang mi 'jig su// mtshan mchog brgya stong dag ni phun sum tshogs// sru la 'khrul 'khor mi mnga'
324a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo mdzad pa/ / rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi rting pa ring // phyag gi mtshan ma mi gda' seng ge 'dra// lte ba shin tu zab cing rked
324a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa/ / rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// gser sku rnam dag rdul dang dri ma spangs// ba spu re re kha dog mthon mthing ldan// g.yas su 'khyil cing spos kyi ngad ldang ba//
324a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// sku mchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtag gnas pa// dper na n+ya gro d+ha yi shing rgyal bzhin// yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan// gsung
324b1(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad/ / dpung pa zlub zhing phrag pa sdug la mdzes// gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil bar gda'// zhing ni brgya stong dpag med rgyu bar mdzad//
324b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can log dang yang dag lam ston mdzad// tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra// ljags mtshan srid ring zhal ni kun tu khebs// 'gram pa seng ge 'dra zhing shangs kyang mtho//
324b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad thabs dang rnam dag thugs las skyes// ut+pa la yi bsung ni zhal nas 'byung // tsan dan dri dag sku ni kun tu khyab// sngon ni byams pa rgya cher bsgoms pas na// rnam dag mos
324b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mthil shin tu mnyam// sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur// gom pa seng ge glang po che 'dra bas// 'jig rten thams cad
324b5(dkon brtsegs): las ni yang dag 'das/ / 'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis mdzes par brgyan// khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rab tu gsal// dge ba dag gis skye dgu pa na 'dogs pas// gang gis mthong
324b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ba rab tu skye/ / sor gcig 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas// sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad// sngon ni dge sbyong mang por rab bsgrubs pas// mtshan gyis dkod pa sna tshogs
324b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di brnyes lags/ / gzugs sku yongs rdzogs dpe zla yongs ma mchis// zhal mtshan rab mdzes shin tu khyad par 'phags// rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// ci skad
325a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ / byin pa ri dgas e n+ya la dang 'dra// sku dbyibs mi dgu seng ge ji lta bzhin// 'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mdza
325a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mnga'// phyag mthil mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus mo 'das// mi yi seng ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phag
325a3(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ / sku las 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing // kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal ba// rnam dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad// mdo sde tshad
325a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag ston par mdzad/ / rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis// de 'dra'i chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur ma lags// gang gis mthar lha rnams ni rab spangs na// bcom ldan rnam dag sku'i
325a5(dkon brtsegs): myur thob 'gyur/ / lha rnga 'brug sgra gsung ni kun grags shing // ka lan ta ka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal// lha yi glu sgra brgya stong mang ldan pa// ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/ 'dir
325a6(dkon brtsegs): pas gsung gcig tu ni chos bstan pas/ / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims cad dag rgyun yang bcad// de bzhin gshegs pas dbyings rab gang gsungs pa// de kun zab cing ngo mtshar chos lags so//
325a7(dkon brtsegs): khyu mchog smin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye bas// sangs rgyas zhing ni brgya stong gsal bar mdzad// spyan mchog dag ni kha dog mthon mthing 'dra// btsug tor mtshan ni mkha' yi lhas mi mthong //
325b1(dkon brtsegs): tshems dkar gtams pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan// dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs// dge ba'i 'phrin las tshad med dag las skyes// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol//
325b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku// kha dog dam pa dpag med phun tshogs shing // 'od zer rnam dag ngo mtshar rab bkye ba// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// thugs
325b3(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso/ / sems can yang dag bsam pa thugs su chud// thogs pa ma mchis spobs pa mchog brnyes pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol//
325b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol rab byon pas// rig pa gsum dang mngon shes drug phun tshogs// rnam dag 'od zer dpag med ston mdzad pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du
325b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ / bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed// bcom ldan brgya stong snyed la mchod pa mdzad// de 'dra'i rgyu 'bras 'cha ba ni mi 'tshal ba// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad
325b6(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ / bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed// ting 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab bzhugs pas// mig gi skye mtha' zad pa'i mtha' mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan
325b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bshad du gsol/ / 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar dus// 'dren pas de dag kun ni rab tu mkhyen// rnam dag mkhyen pa thogs med bsam mi khyab// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad
326a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo
326a2(dkon brtsegs): la bzhag nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ / gzhon nu shin tu legs par nyon// ngas ni deng 'dir byang chub chos// 'od zer rab tu ston pa'i mdo// khyod la shin tu yongs gtad
326a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ / ma 'ongs tha ma dus ngan tshe// chos 'di rnam par 'jig pa na// khyod kyis sems can rnams la ni// rab tu phye nas bshad par gyis// ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis//
326a4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i// mdo sde dam pa 'di dag la// gang mos gang ni mi mos pa// thams cad kun kyang gzigs shing mkhyen// sems
326a5(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni gang zhig gis/ / byang chub lam 'di rab tshol ba// rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing // mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi// gang zhig dad pa rab 'jig cing // 'du 'dri
326a6(dkon brtsegs): la ni mos gyur dang / / nyin mtshan gnyis la gang dga' ba// mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// nga yi bstan pa dag la ni// rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i chos
326a7(dkon brtsegs): dag la/ / mos pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// dad pas byin pa chud gson 'gyur// 'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag la// nyes dmigs mang bar thos nas ni//
326b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag la mngon zhen nas// 'jigs pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par 'gyur// chos gos dag ni bgos gyur kyang // de la shes
326b2(dkon brtsegs): rab ci yang med/ / thub pas legs par gsungs pa yi// yang dag dga' ni gang yin pa// shes pa med pas thos gyur na// yid ches len par mi 'gyur te// skyes bu blun po de dag dang // /
326b3(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag/ gal te thos par gyur nas kyang // rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi// sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i
326b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zag dag la ni/ / ngas ni rab tu smod par byed// mi lus thob par gyur mod kyi// de ni don med chud zos yin// gal te shin tu zab pa'i chos// 'di dag thos par gyur nas ni//
326b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi// sems ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni// sngon chad sangs rgyas phrad pas na// gdon mi za ba kho nar ni// bla med byang chub thob
326b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ / skyes bu blun po gang dag gcig/ lta ba ngan pas rab rmas nas// shes rab srog ni gcod byed pa// byang chub yongs su spong bar 'gyur// de lta bas na mi dge ba'i//
326b7(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen dag ni rab spangs nas// blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni// brten cing gus pa bskyed par bya// 'jig rten dag ni thams cad na// nyes dmigs tshad med gang yod pa// sems
327a1(dkon brtsegs): can ngan song gsum por ni/ / rtag tu bying bar gang bzhed pa// thams cad gti mug rmongs pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas na// nyon mongs rjes su 'jug
327a2(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / / rang dbang dag ni thob mi 'gyur// yang dag chos ni spong byed cing // chos ma yin pa spyod par byed// de lta bas na rmongs pa yi// skyes bu dman pa spang bar bya// ji ltar kha la
327a3(dkon brtsegs): skur ba yis/ / rang gis srog shing bcag pa bzhin// mi dge las ni byas pas na// sems can dmyal bar skyes par 'gyur// kha nas tshig ngan phyung nas ni// rtag tu bdag la gnod
327a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ / ji ltar sta re rno thogs nas// rang gi lus ni gcod byed 'dra// chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen dag gis// byas pa'i las kyi rjes su ni// rnam smin myong ba skyabs med par// de
327a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar khong du ma chud pas/ / 'jig rten drang srong la brten nas// dge ba'i grogs po yi snyam sems// de nas rang nyid 'di snyam du// stong pa nyid ni gang sgom pa// 'dus ma byas ni rtogs
327a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ / chad par lta ba skyed par byed// lus ni snod chag pa dang 'dra// sems kyang rjes su 'gag 'gyur zhes// phal cher bkyal pa'i tshig dag la// mongs pa nyid du rab 'gyur
327a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing / 'di la mngon par zhen pas na// phan pa'i don ni ci yang med// gal te sbrul ni gdug pa yis// gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang // nam yang skye dgu mang po rnams// ngan 'gro
327b1(dkon brtsegs): dag tu lhung mi byed/ / blun po gang zhig chos ston pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas// skye dgu mang po tshad med snyed// sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed// khyed la sogs pa 'khor
327b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa/ / 'di lta bur ni lta bar gyis// deng 'dir nga yi spyan sngar ni// zla 'od gzhon nu gang 'dug pa// 'dis ni sngon chad 'das pa yi// sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das//
327b3(dkon brtsegs): tshad med gang+gA'i klung ji snyed// mchod pa rim gro rab byas shing // shin tu brtan par yongs bsgoms nas// bla med ye shes btsal bas na// srid pa dag ni thams cad la// sems kyis
327b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ci yang med/ / mig gi skye mtha' gtan du ni// rnam par dag par shes pas na// spros pa dag ni yongs spangs nas// mngon par zhen pa ci yang med// sems can dag ni
327b5(dkon brtsegs): tshad med la/ / phan pa dag ni bya ba'i phyir// bla med 'od zer ston pa yi// mdo sde dag ni ston par byed// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// chos 'di slob par mi nus pas// rnal 'byor
327b6(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa dag la ni/ / skyon nyid du yang lta bar byed// de lta bas na blun po dag/ thag ring por ni yongs spangs nas// de dag la ni brten mi byed// de yi chos kyang mi bslab bo// skyes/
327b7(dkon brtsegs): bu blun po gang yin pa// rtsod pa'i smral mos pas na// rtsod smra med pa'i spyod pa la// nan tan bsgrub par mi nus pas// skyes bu de dag rnams la ni// tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang
328a1(dkon brtsegs): med/ / de lta bas na de dag la// bsnyen bkur mi bya bsngags mi brjod// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// le lo snyoms las la gnas pas// rtag tu lus
328a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag yid kyi/ / mi dge'i las ni spyad pas na// de la tshul khrims dag pa dang // shes rab mang thos ci 'dra yang // rtag par 'dod pa'i yul sems shing // 'du 'dzi dag la mos par
328a3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ / khyed kyis 'di ltar blun po de// rigs dang rus dang lus kyang ni// dman pa yin par rab tu ltos// khong khro bka' blo mi bde zhing // byad bzhin dag ni mi sdug la// gal te/
328a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang // lus ni rtag tu ma rabs 'gyur// bdag tu 'du shes la zhen pas// yang dag don la rmongs par 'gyur// blo gros dag dang mi ldan pas// tshig gi bye brag
328a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byed mi nus/ / rang bzhin stong pa'i chos thos kyang // de la mos pa skye mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// yun ring po nas 'jig rten pa'i// tshig gi smos pa gang
328a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ / thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin// so so'i skye bos 'di dag la// shin tu zhen cing chags pas na// ji srid 'tshe yi bar du yang // rtogs shing khong du chud mi 'gyur//
328a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bsngags pa rjod byed kyang // tshangs par spyod pa sgrub mi byed// kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang // lus kyis chos min spyod par byed// rang gis 'dul ba ston byed kyang // rtag
328b1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dul min spyod par byed/ / sangs rgyas slob ma dag la ni// kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos gyon gsungs// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag gis// gos 'di rab tu bgos gyur kyang // nga
328b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal dang ni bag med pa'i/ / sems ni rab tu 'phel bar byed// dad pas byin pa ci zos pa// thu lum 'bar ba ming pa 'dra// de ltar khyim gyi gnas spangs nas// 'dod pa lnga yi bde
328b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang med/ / gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la// mchog gi bde ba ma thob nas// spyod pa 'dren ma mos byed pas// mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur// yid kyi mos pa ji snyed pa//
328b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang ni ngag mi 'gyur// de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni// 'khor mang nang du gnas gyur kyang // dper na ji ltar wa skyes dag/ seng ge'i khrur ni zhugs pa bzhin// de ltar rab tu
328b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba yi/ / chos ni yang dag bstan byas kyang // de kho na dang stong pa'i don// rtogs shing khong du ma chud pas// 'khor mang dag la bstan bsngags kyang // khengs pa'i sems ni skyed
328b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ / ston pa chen po mi dran pas// ngo tsha dman pa'i sems kyang med// mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang // yid bzhin nor bu thob pa bzhin// shin tu dga' bas 'dzin byed
328b7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ sems kyis cung zad gtong mi byed// 'di lta bu yi ma rabs dag/ khyim nas rab tu byung nas ni// spyod lam dag kyang srung ba dang // chos gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed kyang //
329a1(dkon brtsegs): cha byad tsam dang ldan pas na// yang dag shes rab ci yang med// kha spu dag ni bregs gyur kyang // sdig pa'i sems ni mi spong zhing // dge sbyong ma yin pa yi chos//
329a2(dkon brtsegs): log lta dag tu lhung 'gyur na// rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur// dge sbyong mngon du bya ba yin// 'bras bu dag kyang 'thob mi 'gyur// ma rig
329a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs rnams kyang ni/ / rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur ro// grong khyer dag tu rnam rgyu zhing // rang nyid dben pa'i bsngags brjod kyang // skyes bu blun po blo med pas// yang dag bgrod
329a4(dkon brtsegs): pa shes mi 'gyur/ / sems kyi 'dun pa ci yod pa// de dag thams cad mi dge yin// rnyed pa 'dod pa rgyu yi phyir// dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag rgyu//
329a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ma yin no// rmugs dang gnyid la rab tu dga'// lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas// rtag tu de lta'i dngos po dag/ bsgrub pa la ni mos par byed// dgon pa'i gnas ni de
329a6(dkon brtsegs): dag tu/ / lo ni mang por gnas byed kyang // phyin log lta bar gyur pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das lam stor bas na// nams kyang dge sbyong lam dag gi/ 'bras bu dag ni thob mi 'gyur//
329a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag lta ba rab nyams shing // tshul khrims dag dang 'gal byas pas// gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan par// de la shin tu sred par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni//
329b1(dkon brtsegs): rtug tu sred pa skyed par byed// gal te grong khyer zhugs na yang // nga rgyal mtshan ma ston byed cing // lus kyi las ni mi srung bas// spyod lam dag la gnas mi byed// res 'ga' grong/
329b2(dkon brtsegs): khyer zhugs nas ni// rgyu tshe rang nyid 'di skad du// dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu// raM phug dag ni gang yod pa// khyed rnams 'di ltar shes par gyis// de ni bdag gi gnas yin te//
329b3(dkon brtsegs): mtho dman ran par lta ba dang // 'gro gom tshul la gnas so zhes// tha dad mtshan ma'i chog brjod de// dgra bcom pa yi rtags bstan pas// khyim pa dag ni ji snyed pa// phan tshun du ni
329b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du/ / dgon pa'i dge slong gang yin pa// yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zer// res 'ga' dgon pa de dag na// gnas par gyur pa de yi tshe// gal te gzhan dag 'ongs gyur na// /
329b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bur ni ston par byed// bdag ni dgon gnas 'di dag tu// nyin mtshan 'chag par byed ce'am// yang na rtswa 'jam bting nas ni// 'dir ni 'dug par byed ces zer// res 'ga'
329b6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer zhugs gyur nas/ / khyim pa'i der ni phyin pa'i tshe// g.yo sgyu nan tan 'di skad du// bde 'am zhes ni 'dri bar byed// 'jig rten pa yi 'du 'dzi'i gtam// rgyal po chom rkun la
329b7(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i/ / sna tshogs dag ni rjod par byed// res 'ga' 'chags pa'i sems dag gis// bud med rnams kyi mdun dag tu// thabs ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rang gi yon tan rjod par/
330a1(dkon brtsegs): byed// bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kyang // bsod nams zhing ni chen po byed// bdag ni rgyal thabs rab spangs nas// rab tu byung nas lam sgom yin//
330a2(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo dang ni sras rnams kyang // mtho ris skyes par gyur ces zer// de dag de skad thos nas ni// shin tu gus pa rab bskyed de// gos zas dang ni btung ba dag/ sna tshogs sbyar
330a3(dkon brtsegs): nas mchod par byed/ / btsun pas thugs rjer rab dgongs shing // bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer// ro zhim dag la zhen chags shing // nyes dmigs rnams ni mi shes pas//
330a4(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyis glags kyang rnyed gyur nas// rus sbal rgya mos zin pa 'dra// dgon par gnas pa dag la yang // rnyed pa dag gis snyems par byed// dge slong brtson 'grus can dag la//
330a5(dkon brtsegs): brnyas shing skur pa 'debs par byed// rnyed dang grags pas sems rmongs pas// yang nas yang du zhen pa skyed// lus ni yongs su gso ba'i phyir// rtag tu g.yo sgyu spyod pas na// lus
330a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag gi mi dge'i las/ / yang nas yang du 'phel bar byed// gal te sbyin bdag dad pa yis// dang ba'i sems kyis mchod na yang // le lo snyom las dbang gis ni// de yi bsod
330a7(dkon brtsegs): nams 'bri bar byed/ / skyes bu blun po de dag ni// rtag tu mi dge 'dod skyed pas// stong pa nyid kyi chos 'di la// rjes 'thun bzod sems 'thob mi 'gyur// gang dag nga yi bstan pa
330b1(dkon brtsegs): las/ nyes dmigs de dag rab spangs nas// nan tan bag yod grub byed na// chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur// rnyed pa dang ni mi rnyed dang // bstod smad sdug bsngal bde la//
330b2(dkon brtsegs): sogs// 'jig rten chos kyis mi g.yos pa// chos 'di thos pa dka' mi 'gyur// lus la mi gtsang 'du shes dang // phung po rma yi 'du shes dang // zas ni rma bskus 'du shes
330b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ da chos 'di thos pa dka' mi 'gyur// gos gtsang dag ni thob gyur kyang // dregs pa dag ni mi skyed cing // ngo tsha dag phyir gos gyon pa// chos 'di thob pa dka' mi 'gyur//
330b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang stobs ni mi snyems shing // zas la chags pa med pa dang // srog gnas phyir ni gang za ba// chos 'di thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// srid pa 'di ni ston shes nas// 'dod pa
330b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la blang dor med/ / rtag tu stong dben gang spyod pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// dpag tshad gcig 'das ri khrod du// gcig pu 'dug nas mnyam gzhag cing // 'dus
330b6(dkon brtsegs): byas bdag med gang rtogs pa/ / chos 'di 'thob par dka' mi 'gyur// mig zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang // mig 'jug mtshan nyid rtogs byed cing // mig gtsang lam ni rab bsgrub pa//
330b7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur// rna ba sA lce lus dang yid// gzugs snga dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad kun yang de bzhin no// de bzhin ma 'ongs dus
331a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ dge slong dag ni tshad med snyed// brtson pa dang ni le lo can// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// dge dang mi dge grogs po dag/ bsgrub pa dang ni mi
331a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa/ / yid ches pa dang yid mi ches// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// dge dang mi dge grogs po dag/ mig zad lam ni gang yin pa// bsgrub pa dang ni mi bsgrub pa// thams
331a3(dkon brtsegs): cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ / gang zhig byang chub rab mos shing // zla gcig gnyis gsum 'das nas ni// dus gzhan phyir ni gang ldog pa// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//
331a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// mos pa'i sems ni gang bskyed pa// gal te nyams par gyur na yang // slar ni dang ba thob pa 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// bag
331a5(dkon brtsegs): med spong bar mi byed pa/ / mdo 'di sangs rgyas bka' ma yin// de snyams du ni sems par 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// bdud kyis yongs su gang bzung ba// dang
331a6(dkon brtsegs): po dad pa skyes gyur kyang / / phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// gang zhig chos la ma mos pa// mi bden grags dang rnyed pa tshol// grong khyer grong rdal rab rgyu zhing // gzungs rnams dang ni
331a7(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin dang / / kun 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjod kyang // de yis yang ngag rtogs mi 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang // 'jig rten las ni 'dod tshol ba// brjod pa
331b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni rtog byed pas/ / stong nyid sgom la skur pa 'debs// dran dang shes rab sems med pas// tshe zad bar du don med 'das// blun pos stong pa'i chos spong ba// de ni tshul khrims
331b2(dkon brtsegs): bgegs byas pas/ / mnar med dag tu lhung bar 'gyur// nams kyang mtho ris yong mi skye// gang gis skad cig gcig la ni// mchod rten stong ni byas pa bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di
331b3(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ / tshig bzhi tshogs bcad gcig 'dzin 'phags// me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten mchod pa bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas// tshig bzhi tshigs
331b4(dkon brtsegs): cad sems pa 'phags/ / gang gis rin chen mchod rten dag/ gang+gA'i bye snyed byas pa bas// gang gis tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// sangs
331b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing ni 'bum phrag brgya/ / me tog gtor nas mchod pa bas// gang gis tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// chos gos 'bum phrag rgya mang po// sangs
331b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams la phul ba bas/ / gang gis tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas spyan ni rnam dag 'phags// mi mkhyen mi gzigs gang yang med//
331b7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mdo sde 'di mos na// sangs rgyas spyan ni thob par 'gyur// 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med de// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa byung // nga ni bram ze khye'u gyur tshe// me tog thogs
332a1(dkon brtsegs): nas mchod pa byas/ / shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba// byang chub snying po la 'dug nas// mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes// nga la byang chub lung yang bstan// khyod ni de
332a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe gzhon nur gyur/ / nga lung bstan pa thos gyur nas// dga' zhing dang ba'i sems bskyed de// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du// gal te bram ze khye'u 'di ni// mngon par rdzogs par
332a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas che/ / bdag ni de yi grogs gyur nas// mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu yang // chos kyi sde snod rab 'dzin cing // srung bar shog ces smon lam btab// sangs rgyas mar
332a4(dkon brtsegs): me mdzad de yis/ / 'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni// ji skad gsungs bzhin de yi tshe// bram ze khye'u dang gzhon nu gnyis// legs par mnyan cing yongs su bzung // nga sngon 'das
332a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus kyi tshe/ / me tog ut+pa la dag gis// sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas// de tshe khyod kyang der 'dug ste// 'di skad du ni smon lam btab// nga yi bstan pa tha ma la// mdo sde
332a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rab gzung nas/ / rgya cher ston par shog ces smras// gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas// zhe sdang sems ni mi skyed par// gzung 'dzin klog cing gang 'don pa// de ni skyes bu
332a7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa yin/ / khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// thos dka'i chos 'di rab gzung nas// sems can dag la don gyi tshul// rgya cher dbye zhing bstan par bya// ngas kyang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/
332b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag chos ni nub pa na// 'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni// sems can dag la rgya cher bstan// blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas// 'di la skur pa 'debs par byed// ngas ni de skad thos gyur/
332b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang // zhe sdang dag ni skyed mi byed// ngas ni rtag tu bzod bsgom nas// 'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed// bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na// mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis
332b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyan/ / gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas sku// gya nom yongs su rdzogs 'gyur zhing // gser gyi kha dog rnam dag 'phags// bzod pa'i stobs las byung bar ltos// nga yi zhabs ni
332b4(dkon brtsegs): sa rag nas/ / zhing ni tshad med g.yo byed kyang // sems can rnams ni mi ltung ba// thams cad bzod pa'i stobs las skyes// nga yi spu khung gcig nas ni// 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye
332b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ thams cad gsal bar gang byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // srin po shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs// srog chags gzi byin 'phrog byed pa// nga la
332b6(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu gus pa yang / / thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // nga yi 'khor ni ji snyed pa// sems ni rab tu dul gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la gus pa yang // thams
332b7(dkon brtsegs): cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / / rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag/ 'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag tu// sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las
333a1(dkon brtsegs): byung / klu yi rgyal po brgya stong dag/ rab tu gdug cing 'jigs rung ba// sangs rgyas mthong na dga' ba yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //
333a2(dkon brtsegs): srin po gnod sbyin la sogs pas// me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong thogs// 'ongs nas nga la mchod byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // zhing ni brgya stong tshad med
333a3(dkon brtsegs): par/ / bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// nga yi yon tan bsngags pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po// brgya stong
333a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni 'dus gyur nas/ / me tog gtor nas nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa// bye ba brgya phrag drug cu rnams// 'ongs
333a5(dkon brtsegs): nas nga la gang mchod pa/ / thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gzhan yang klu yi rgyal po ni// ma na ba ga la sogs pas// mu tig dmar pos nga mchod pa// thams cad
333a6(dkon brtsegs): babazod mchog stobs las byung / / du mu ru dang shi khyi ba'i// brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas// rol mo dag gis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto
333a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phye dang ni lus srul po/ / brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas// me tog spos kyis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // sa chen 'dzin pa klu yi rgyal// lus phyed
333b1(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rab bstan nas/ / thal sbyar nga la gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lus phyed sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs// bye ba phrag ni brgya stong snyed// dang
333b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems kyis nga mchod pa/ / thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos// sangs rgyas 'od zer gang reg pa// sdug bsngal bral nas bde thob
333b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // sa ma mu tra dang rlung gi lha// brgya stong nam mkha' gang bar ni// spos kyi char pabang mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las
333b4(dkon brtsegs): byung / / lha yi 'khor ni brgya stong dag/ lha yi me tog gtor mchod de// sred spangs sangs rgyas ston byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // khyod kyis sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
333b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / / sbyin dang tshul khrims sgra bsgrag nas// thams cad kun tu thos mdzad pa// bzod mchog stobs las byung bar ltos// phung po khams kyi sgra dag dang // bded pa bzhi yi sgra dag/
333b6(dkon brtsegs): gis/ thams cad kun tu go mdzad pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' la mig zad mtha' dag dang // raba'i sgra ni thos
333b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ / skye ba'i mtha' yang de bzhin no// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig ni rgyu dang rkyen// de las skye yang 'gro 'ong med// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur//
334a1(dkon brtsegs): yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig zhi rtogs byed na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul
334a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni/ / mkha' las mig zad mtha' zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig
334a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' rab zhi bas/ / sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig skye mtha' zhi bas// sangs rgyas
334a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni de las skyes/ / de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig 'jug rab zhin// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos
334a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ / nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig mi skye zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//
334a6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las mig dben rab zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg byas nas// sgra dang ming
334a7(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa'i bar/ / thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no// 'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang // 'cha ba dang phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang // khengs dang nga rgyal la sogs pa// rgya cher bshad pa
334b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang de bzhin no/ / de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa de lta bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
334b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sang gi gdugs la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'khor mang po dang bcas pas gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag gis sbyar
334b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gdugs tshod gsol bar cig nang / de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu de'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams la'ang
334b4(dkon brtsegs): phan pa mdzad par 'gyur bar thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo // de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
334b5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rab tu dga' bas rang gi khyim du song ste/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin
334b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pas rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor dar gyi lding khang bres te/ lding khang de'ang shin tu mtho zhing rgya che la thams cad kun tu khyab pa/ gser gyi
334b7(dkon brtsegs): tsong tsong dra bar bres pa/ nor bu rin po che'i 'phreng ba sbyangs pa/ seng ge'i ba dan dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba la lu gu rgyud can 'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhan yang rin po
335a1(dkon brtsegs): che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'phreng ba'i phung po dang gcal du bkram mo/ / me tog tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug tal sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba
335a2(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med pa'ang rin po che'i lding khang gi nang thams cad dang 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun tu khyab par spangs shing rgyan du bres so/ / gzhan yang de'i nang du khri stan rnams bshams nas//
335a3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i spos byi li ka dang / du ma tsa dang / tsan dan dang / gur kum rnam par dag cing yid dga' bar byed pa sna tshogs bsregs so// de bzhin du sbyar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang
335a4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i yo byad du sbyar ro/ / gzhan yang spos chus lam srang rnams kun tu khyab par chag chag btab bo// sa gzhi kun tu me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram mo// de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang / lha ma
335a5(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi bu mo dang / sgra gcan zin gyi bu mo grangs med tshad med pa'ang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir// der 'ongs nas grong khyer chen po
335a6(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags pa de rab tu brgyan no/ / de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa grong khyer de kun tu khyab par brgyan cing yongs su dag pa dang / gdugs tshod la bab par rig nas/ bcom
335a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sman par mdzad pa'i slad du grong khyer chen por gshegs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs
335b1(dkon brtsegs): cig tu grong khyer du gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la zhabs gzhag ma thag tu grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po'ang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med/
335b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe long ba dag ni gzugs mthong bar gyur/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thob par gyur/ 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur/ byang bzhin mi sdug pa rnam
335b3(dkon brtsegs): ni byad bzhin bzang po thob par gyur/ nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par gyur/ bu med pa rnams ni bu yod par gyur/ gos med pa rnams ni gos thob par gyur/ rin po che med pa rnams
335b4(dkon brtsegs): ni rin po che thob par gyur/ nye bshes med pa rnams ni nye ba shes dang ldan pa gyur/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis 'phongs pa rnams ni lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// gzhan
335b5(dkon brtsegs): yang ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ne tso dang / rma bya dang / ka ri ka la sogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems ni bskyed nas/ sgra
335b6(dkon brtsegs): snyan cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa byung ste/ gang gis sgra de dag thos pa'ang yid shin tu bde bar gyur to// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam pa ka'i ljon shing tshad
335b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa snyed mngon par sprul nas/ sems can brgya stong mang po rnams me tog yongs su dag pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos mchog dam pa thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te
336a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas so/ / gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang phyug thob pa brgya stong dum mu tig dpar po dang / tsan ngan gyi skye mthogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la ra
336a2(dkon brtsegs): dka' bas mngon par gtor ro/ / lha ma yin mang po dang gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang dngul gyis rab tu brgyan pa thogs nas bar snang la 'dug ste/ de bzhin
336a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i steng du khebs par g.yogs so/ / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsan dan gyi ljon shing dang / gser gyi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i snod rang
336a4(dkon brtsegs): gos la sogs pa'i ljon shing brgya stong tshad med dpag tu med pa rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/ me tog dang lo ma phun sum tshogs shing rgyas pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi
336a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thun mong du mngon par grub pa/ rlung gi ngad langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams kun tu khyab par gang ba mngon par sprul
336a6(dkon brtsegs): to/ / sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang dus gcig tu me tog thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// de bzhin du sems can dang sems can ma yin pa
336a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa shad/ gang dag ci dang ci smon par byed pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang gis de dag gi bsam pa ji lta
336b1(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe/ 'khor 'dus pa thams cad nam mkha' las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgras/
336b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par ston pa'i sgra thos par gyur kyang / de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la/ tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong du mas kyang chos rnams yang dag par bstan par
336b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags zad mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang

337a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ / 'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad

337a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ / 'dod chags rab 'gog stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab ser sna//

337a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung chen bzhi yi dngos po dang / / 'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po khams rnams dang // 'jig rten skye sgra ming sogs kyang de bzhin// chos rje dam pa'i chos ni bstan pas na// sems

338a1(dkon brtsegs): lag dang dang thos/ / gtong dang 'thun pa'i stobs dang rab ni stobs// rab dul yang dag mtha' dang bden mkhas stobs// 'jigs dang dga' dang phan 'dogs
338a2(dkon brtsegs): la mos dang / / byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod 'tshe med// stong dang mtshan ma med sogs kyang de bzhin// stobs bcu 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lha yi gtso// yon tan grags pa

338b1(dkon brtsegs): po yi/ / lag dang rkang gi gdub kor 'phreng ba dang // de bzhin rin chen rgyan ni sna tshogs las// ma dkrol bar yang rang nyid sgra snyan byung // so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing //

338b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas la/ / dri ma spangs pa'i chos dag rab bshad pas// thams cad dga' nas dge ba'i sems bskyed de// thub mchog zha ba la spyi btung phyag byas nas// kha cig bcom ldan bla med
