339a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ / mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung // gang ni mig pad mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/

343a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa bsgrub par mos// lha rnams so sor gzhal med khang zhugs nas// phan tshun dgo' ba'i gtam ni 'di skad smras// 'dren po deng ni 'jig rten
343a6(dkon brtsegs): byung bas na/ / lha mi thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad// sa bla'i lha 'khor gzhal med khang gnas nas// dang ba'i sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du// 'dren pa 'jig rten deng byung
343a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu legs/ / 'jig rten kun bde rgyu ni rab tu mdzad// mkha' la spyod pa'i lha rnams de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs
343b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ / 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags
343b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ / 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// sum cu rtsa gsum lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes//
343b3(dkon brtsegs): khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// 'thab bral lha dag de skad thos nas ni// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang
343b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyes/ / khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// bdag cag byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas// bcom
343b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan bla med mkhyen pa nye bar bgyi/ / lha mi gtso mchog la ni brten nas su// sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zer// dga' ldan lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang // thams
343b6(dkon brtsegs): cad dga' nas shin tu dang bskyes/ khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bsgral pa bye bar ni//
343b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod mchog khyad 'phags dpag med mngon bsgrubs nas// sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan// 'khor ba bsgral nas mya ngan 'das la bkod// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams de
344a1(dkon brtsegs): skang thos nas ni/ / thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang bskyed// khyad 'phags sgra ska sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'drer bzung bas 'jig rten
344a2(dkon brtsegs): paphan mdzad zer/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dran
344a3(dkon brtsegs): pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer/ / de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi 'das pas na// bdud dang mu stegs mang po pham par mdzad// bla med byang chub dag ni yongs rdzogs
344a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ skye dgu dngas nas pha rol 'jog ces zer// tshangs ris lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan
344a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ / 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// de bzhin gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos pas// tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad
344a6(dkon brtsegs): du/ 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad// bdud dpung 'jigs skrag mya ngan byed ces zer// srid pa'i rtse mo'i lha yi bar du yang // sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten
344a7(dkon brtsegs): pan mdzad thos/ / de bzhin sgra ni kun tu grags pas na// lha ma yin dag 'grims shing lha rnams 'phel// bdud kyi khang pa dag ni yongs stongs shing // lha rnams 'khor ni rab tu
344b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par gyur/ / mi 'jigs stobs kyis log tshogs rab btul nas// byang chub chen po mchog ni myur du brnyes// de bzhin skad cig yud tsam lha rnams kyis// bcom lar byung
344b2(dkon brtsegs): nas phan mdzad thos gyur nas/ / 'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa shin tu legs// rnam dag mig ni sems can byin zhes zer/ bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// 'dod pas
344b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdungs pa rnams/ / mi gtsang bsgoms pa bshad thos pas// 'dod chags zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// zhe sdang ngag gis
344b4(dkon brtsegs): gdungs pa rnams/ / byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas// zhe sdang zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// gti mug dag gis gdungs pa rnams//
344b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab chos ni bstan thos pas// gti mug zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// nga rgyal dag gis gdungs pa rnams// nga rgyal spangs pa'i chos
344b6(dkon brtsegs): thos pas/ / nga rgyal zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// phrag dog dag gis gdungs pa rnams// brag dog spangs pa'i chos thos pas// phrag dog
344b7(dkon brtsegs): ni ste ma lus spangs/ / bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// khong khro dag gis gdungs pa rnams// khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ khong khro zhi ste ma lus spangs/
345a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// ser sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams// ser sna spangs pa'i chos thos pas// ser sna ni ste ma lus spangs/
345a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig dul ba'i spyod sgrub pa// dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas// mang du thos pa'i gtsor zhugs nas// kun 'dzin sgo ni sgrub par byed// gzhan yang mkha' las sgyu thos
345a3(dkon brtsegs): pas/ / me tog dag gis sangs rgyas mchod// yon tan khyad par 'phags bsgrub cing // snying rje chen po'i rdzu 'phrul ston// gzhan yang mkha' las sba thos na// bcom
345a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan sku dang skye gnas dang / / gdung brgyud dang ni gsung sgra rnams// khyad par 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod// sems can 'gro ba ji lta bar// rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rigs
345a5(dkon brtsegs): bshad/ / mig dang rna ba sna lde lus// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dang // bskum pa dang ni brkyang ba dang // ston par mdzad pa khyad par 'phags// bcom ldan 'jig
345a6(dkon brtsegs): rten 'das pas na/ / 'jig rten sgron ma rab mdzad cing // gzugs ni mang po ston pa yang // thams cad sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin// snod dang snod min de rjes su// mi
345a7(dkon brtsegs): mthun chos ni ston mdzad pas/ / sems can tshe rabs tshad med nas// sangs rgyas mchod pa ma byas shing // dmu rgod gdul bar dka' ba la// sems can dmyal ba
345b1(dkon brtsegs): bshad par mdzad/ / gang zhig las lam rmongs gyur cing // sbru la brten nas spos dga' ba// bcom ldan de dag lta ba dang // spros bzhi pa'i sgra thos mdzad// gzhan
345b2(dkon brtsegs): yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid/ / nges pa nyid du sbyong pa dang // 'gro 'ong med cing mtshan med dang // ci yang med pa'i sgra yang thos// gzhan yang sems can brgya stod dag/ mkha'
345b3(dkon brtsegs): las sha dang shes rab spyan/ / de bzhin chos kyi spyan par du// yang dag ston pa'i sgra yang thos// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sgra//
345b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol rnam grol mthong ba'i sgra// ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur// sems can dag ni ji snyed pa// ji bzhin rdzu 'phrul rab bstan nas// ji ltar rjes 'thun sgra skad kyis// yang
345b5(dkon brtsegs): ngadag chos ni bstan par mdzad/ / sems can la la gang zhig gis// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod bsgrub mos// rdzu 'phrul mos pa ji lta bzhin// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra
345b6(dkon brtsegs): ston/ bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// sems can dbang po ji lta bzhin// rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas// len 'dzin ston la 'god par mdzad// bcom ldan rdzu
345b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul stob kyis ni/ / phung po khams dang skye mched kyis// bcings dang grol dang nye ring dang // sa yi gnas skabs bye brag gis// mtshan nyid ston pa thos par 'gyur// gzhan
346a1(dkon brtsegs): yang sa dang ye shes kyi/ / 'od zer tshad med ston pa dang // nyon mongs bag chags spangs pa dang // spangs min ston pa thos par gyur// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul/
346a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni// lha dang mi yi ngo bo nyid// las dang 'bras bu mi mtshungs pas// skye len tha dad thos par gyur// res 'ga' bud med mdun dag tu// bud med brgyan pa'i lus
346a3(dkon brtsegs): sprul nas/ / mkha' las skyo ston sgra thos pas// gang thos 'dod chags sel mdzad pas// shA ri'i bu ni ji lta bzhin// shin tu dang ba skyes par gyur// thugs rjes mos
346a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ji bzhin du/ / bla me de chos ni ston par mdzad// mo'u 'gal dang ni 'od srungs dang // ka pi na dang kun dga' dang // 'od srungs chen po dag dang ni// kun shes ko'u di
346a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sogs/ / de dag mos pa ji bzhin du// nyan thos chos ston thos par gyur// lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin// gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang // be ro ka ni 'khor bcas dang /
346a6(dkon brtsegs): grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// gzungs sngags sgra ni thos par gyur// iM de sau/ bi di si/ i ra su i ra/ o na si
346a7(dkon brtsegs): ma na si/ u khyi/ a no khyi/ a khyi tshal mang nang ye/ da ra ni shwa ni mi/ ta ka ni/ i mi man tra/ ni ha ra/ a bu re/ bud d+he/ ni re/ a khi tsa ra/ bi ya ki ri ya te
346b1(dkon brtsegs): a ki tsha ra ba ra mi te/ ka la ba hi ni/ sarbo bing sha ni ra d+h+we po na/ pa ra sha sad de/ sha sa ta/ pa ra sha sad ta/ ta ra sad ta/ b+hu mi/ a ma b+ha ra am b+ha ra/ li li b+ha na/ shi
346b2(dkon brtsegs): tsing ta/ bi ba mi ta/ tsid ta a nan ta/ o be ra ha ba mi ta b+hu mi/ na na ma ka ni a ka ni bi b+ha ming ta/ sha ri bi shwA/ a ma la ni ma la/ bu li te na ra shi tsa/ ha ha ri/ ma ma li/ b+ha ra
346b3(dkon brtsegs): niti shwA/ tsakrA ni ra ha ra/ ut+ti ri ta tsa ba tsi/ a na ta ri/ ku ta ri/ ke du su ke du/ su ba ri/ ka ra ni/ ku su ma ni ye/ kra ka ri/ ka khA ri/ u pa la mu ri/ tish+tsa/ da ra ni/
346b4(dkon brtsegs): na ga nir ha re/ pa ra lang te/ a te pa ra ya te/ a na ta ra b+ha na d+he/ an ta ra b+ha ti shi tsa/ ha si ri/ ma kha li/ i ne sam b+ha re/ ti sh+tsa sit+ka ra ni/ ku b+hu lo tsa te/ gzhan
346b5(dkon brtsegs): yang rgyal po rnam thos bu/ / yul 'khor srung ni la sogs pas// khyad 'phags sgra ni grangs med kyi// bden pa'i sngags tshig rab tu smras/ tshad med smra ni de dag kyang // bde
346b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rdzu 'phrul dbang gis byung / / rdzu 'phrul dag ni tshad med pas// bstan pa dag kyang tshad med do// res 'ga' sangs rgyas med zhing du// rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i stobs dag
346b7(dkon brtsegs): gis/ / 'khor skor sangs rgyas su ston pas// da ltar mthong ba ji bzhin no// bsam gyis mi khyab zhing dag tu// sprul pa tshad med sngor mdzad pas// bskams nas gom
347a1(dkon brtsegs): bdun gshegs dang / / rgyal srid spangs nas rab byung dang // byang chub snying por sangs rgyas nas// brnyes pa'i chos dag rab dgongs te// chos kyi 'khor
347a2(dkon brtsegs): lo skor mdzad dang / / mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs ngag gis// sna tshogs chos ni ston mdzad pas// sems can dag ni tshad med rnams// khyad 'phags
347a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes grub par mdzad/ / de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// byams chos bsgom pa bshang bstan pas// byams pa'i sems ni 'phel
347a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad/ / de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lha rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi bshad bstan pas// bsdu ba'i spyod bzhi 'phel bar mdzad// de tshe
347a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po yis/ / klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// zhe sdang nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas// zhe sdang sems ni spangs par 'gyur// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// /
347a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor nas// rnam 'tshe nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas// rnam 'tsho sems ni spangs par 'gyur// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lha ma yin gyis
347a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs bskor nas/ / 'thab pa'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan te// bzod pa bsgom pa'i bsngags pa brjod// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// nam mkha' lding gis yongs bskor nas//
347b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gal byas nyes dmigs bshad bstan te// 'dum pa'i sems kyis bsngags pa mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// dga' ba'i tshig ni
347b2(dkon brtsegs): dpag med kyis/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod bstan// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lto 'phye 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// mu stegs chos la smod mdzad cing //

347b7(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ / mig 'jug bstan pa thos gyur nas// mthar byin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya

348b1(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong snyed/ / mag la gso ba med thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig

348b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas/ / lus kyi tshul khrims sems shes rab// zag med rten pa med pa yi// bsngags pa dag ni brjod par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sdug bsnga
349a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'gog pa'i lam bsngags shing // spos la dga' zhing zhed pa dag/ sangs rgyas smad par rab tu bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//
349a2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la rgya cher ni// mig chad skyon ni rab 'byed cing // rab zhi mtshan nyid bstan par byed// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar
349a3(dkon brtsegs): du yang / / thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// dar la bab cing gzhon pa la// nyes dmigs dpag
349a4(dkon brtsegs): med yod par bstan/ / thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// tshe rigs dag gis bsnyems pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par
349a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ / thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// longs spyod bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje
349a6(dkon brtsegs): chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ / sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// rang dbang bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//
349a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// gzugs kyis bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams
349b1(dkon brtsegs): la na cher ni/ / bud med pag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen po'i 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// gos kyis
349b2(dkon brtsegs): bag med gyur pa la/ / nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// chang gis bag med gyur pa la// nyes
349b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ / thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// rgyal po bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par
349b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ / thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// tshul khrims bsnyems par gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs
349b5(dkon brtsegs): rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ / sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// shes rab bsnyems par gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// de bzhin rtogs dang rdzu 'phrul
349b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsam gtan mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang // nor dang bshad dang rigs dang 'khor// rol mo glu dang lce rkyang dang // grags pa phun tshogs bsngags pa dang // bkur sti dang ni rnyed pa
349b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mdzes dang g.yo sgyu nga rgyal dang // ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang // khengs dang phun tshogs nga rgyal dang // bag med 'dod chags de bzhin no// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan
350a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / sems can gang zhig sems dang yid// dman par gyur pa de dag la// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'du shes bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/
350a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang zhig rang zhum zhing // rtsol bar mi byed de dag la// brtson 'grus stobs ni ston par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig nor rnams
350a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ / chags par gyur pa de dag la// chog shes chos ni ston par mdzad// gzhan yang spos kyi dri gtsang khang // me tog dag gi gzhal med khang // khang pa brtsegs ma mchog sprul
350a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs par bstan// gzhan yang lha yi bu mo rnams// me tog tsam pa'i khang pa na// gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// me tog 'phreng thogs
350a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod byed bi stan/ / gzhan yang lha min bu mo dag/ me tog ma li'i khang pa na// gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// me tog 'phreng thogs mchod byed bstan// gzhan yang lha
350a6(dkon brtsegs): yi bu rnams dag/ pad+ma sngon po'i khang pa na// gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa bstan// gzhan yang tshangs pa rnams kyi lha// gser gyi gzhal med khang
350a7(dkon brtsegs): pan/ / gnas pa lus kun bstan sprul nas// sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags pa bstan// gzhan yang lha yi bu mo dag/ sna tshogs rgyan gyis lus brgyan cing // rgyan ni phan tshun reg pa las/
350b1(dkon brtsegs): sgra snyan dgu ni rab byung nas// 'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag ni// 'gyur zhing mi brtan yin na yang // byis pa mi bden rtogs pa yis// yang dag ji bzhin mi shes zer// rgyan gyi sgra ni de dag kyang //
350b2(dkon brtsegs): lus dang sems las byung ma yin// 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med// phyogs kyang yod pa ma yin te// gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// byis pa rnams
350b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi sems pas/ / 'di la the tshom skye bar 'gyur// rgyan gyi rnam pa de dag las// sgra snyan byung ba de yis ni// sangs rgyas zhing kun grags pas na// sems can tshad med grol
350b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur/ / de lta bas na khyed rnams kyis// 'dren pa'i rang byung ye shes dang // yon tan dpag med sku dag ni// srid pa'i spros las 'das pa dang // rab dben skyon ni med pa dang // /
350b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bral sems ni rab sbyangs dang // mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa dang // sku dang thugs ni dag par ltos// khyed kyis bcom ldan grong gshegs tshe// gom pa dag ni seng ge 'dra// gshegs
350b6(dkon brtsegs): stangs ngang pa glang chen 'dra/ / sems can re bskong bar mdzad// bsod nams khyad 'phags yongs su rdzogs// yang dag mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// sems can dag ni thams cad
350b7(dkon brtsegs): kun/ / lta bas mi ngoms nyid du ltos// khyed kyis rkang gnyis gtso bo'i mchog/ thugs rje chen po ldan pas na// dngos po chung ngus mchod byas kyang // yon tan tshad med 'thob mdzad
351a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ / sems can dag ni mang po rnams// bskal pa brgya stong mang por ni// mya ngan 'das pa 'thob par du// rnam smin thug pa med par ltos// byed kyis rkang
351a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gtso mchog ni/ / zag med tshul khrims rdzogs pas na// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// gus pas spyi bos phyag byed dang // lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams// so sor gzhal
351a3(dkon brtsegs): med khang spangs nas/ / rtse ba dag la chags med par// 'dren pa la ni sten byed ltos// khyed kyis bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor// bcom ldan 'das la dad bskyed nas// gser gyi rlung
351a4(dkon brtsegs): yab dag thogs te/ / g.yas g.yon du ni 'khod pa dang // bdud kyi bu ni lnga brgya yis// lha yi me tog yid 'ong bas// de bzhin gshegs la mngon gtor nas// bla med ye shes
351a5(dkon brtsegs): tshol la ltos/ / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ni// bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pas na// deng ci bcom ldan phrad gyur nas// so sor dga' bar gyur pa yin// spobs pa dag ni
351a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad med kyis/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod// de yi tshe na bdud kyi bu// sred pa spangs pa zhes bya ba// thog mar bcom ldan bsngags brjod nas// mig zad mtha' ni shes
351a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur/ / mig gi skye mtha' shes pas na// rab zhi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs// gzhan yang mig zad la sogs pa'i// ming don tshig ni dpag med rtogs// des na tshig mkhas dag gis
351b1(dkon brtsegs): ni/ / sems can rnams la yang dag bstan// ming dang don rnams la yang ni// zhen dang the tshom med pas na// 'gro 'ong med par rab rtogs shing // blang dor med pa nyid du gyur// rang
351b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dag ni stong dben pas/ / yi ge rnams ni spangs pa dang // len dang gzung dang klog pa dang // kha ton 'don cing sgrub byed rtogs// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//
351b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon yang rab tu phye ste bstan// btags pa'i ming tsam yin pas na// yang dag brjod du ci yang med// rang bzhin stob pa de dag ni// phung po khams dang skye mched 'das// brdzun pa
351b4(dkon brtsegs): med cing bden pa'ang med/ / gnas dang gnas pa yod pa min// tshig gis smra ba'i lam chad cing // sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu zhi// skye bo'i mtshan ma zhen pa'i phyir// bcom ldan
351b5(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gshegs pa mthong / / bcom ldan mtshan ma yongs spangs kyang // byis pa yang dag ma yin rtogs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// gang zhig dga' ba skye
351b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ / de ni mtshan mar rtog pa ste// mya ngan gdung dang bcas par 'gyur// gang zhig mtshan ma'i rtog spangs pa// grong khyer gshegs pa mthong mi 'gyur// gshegs shing
351b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyod pa'i mtshan ma la/ / rnam rtog med pa'i shes rab 'thob// gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong // des na grong khyer gshegs pa mthong // skye zhing 'khor ba'i chos dag la/
352a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa skyed par byed// gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan mar mthong // dga' ba dag ni skye 'gyur ba// de ni bdud kyi spyod la gnas// bdud kyi spyod yul
352a2(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba yin/ / gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan mar mthong // de ni 'gyur ba mthong ba yin// de ni mya ngan gdungs bcas pas// mkhas pas snying brtser bya ba yin// chos la thob par
352a3(dkon brtsegs): gang lta ba/ / de la chos stor mya ngan yod// sangs rgyas mthong ba skyes pa la// mya ngan 'das pa'i sdug bsngal yod// bskal pa mang por gang bsgom pa// mtshan ma thams cad
352a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas na/ / grong khyer gshegs par mi rtog cing // mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes med// sems kyi mtshan nyid stong rtogs pa// sangs rgyas spyod la gnas pas na// grong
352a5(dkon brtsegs): khyer gshegs par mi rtog cing / / mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes med// gang gis de ltar rab shes pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong 'gyur zhing // ngo bo nyid kyang stong rtogs pa//
352a6(dkon brtsegs): mthar ni skye 'gag ci yang med// bcom ldan bskal pa dpag med nas// dka' ba rnams ni rab spyad nas// ngo bo nyid ni stong mkhyen na// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so//
352a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// 'khor ni brgya stong mang gis bskor// mi dang mi ma yin la sogs// dang ba'i sems kyis mchod pa bas// gang gis skad cig tsam du ni//
352b1(dkon brtsegs): mig padam tha' ni rab sems shing // mtshan ma rnams na stong rtogs na// 'arda yab sod nams de bas 'phags// bzang ba dang ni grangs kyi// rgyu tsam du yang mi bzod do// de
352b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mig gi skye mtha' dang / / mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par bya// rna ba sna lce lus dang yod// gzugs sgra dri ro reg
352b3(dkon brtsegs): bya nas/ / sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis//
352b4(dkon brtsegs): sa ni kun tu rab tu g.yos// ri rnams gang yin de dag kyang // thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phyogs// lha dang mi ni chos kyi phyir// thams cad 'ongs nas gus mchod byas//
352b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// lha yi dbang po mi yi rgyal// lha ma yin ni mang po dang // gnod sbyin dag ni mang po rnams// rang gi grong
352b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer spangs nas ni/ / bcom ldan spyan sngar 'dus gyur te// rab tu dga' bas mchod pa byas// de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// gzhan yang
352b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa tha dad pa'i/ / bya yi tshogs ni tshad med pa// ne tso dang ni rma bya dang // ka la bing ka bya yi rnams// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi// yon tan mchog ni mthong bas na//
353a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad nam mkha' dag la ni// rab tu dga' bas rnam par rtse// thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// sgra snyan dag ni rab tu byung // de nas de tshe bcom ldan
353a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ / grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang // rdzu 'phrul gyis ni stobs dag gis// sems can tshad med brgya stong snyed// mdongs pa dag ni
353a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar gyur/ / 'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur// dbang po ma tshang gang yin pa// thams cad dbang po tshang bar gyur// sdug bsngal la ni gnas pa dag/ thams cad bde ba thob
353a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur/ / de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// 'di skad smra ba thos par gyur// gang gis mtshan ma
353a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis ni/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rtog byed pa// de yis bcom ldan 'das la ni// mchod pa bya zhes brjod mi bya// mig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyid// rtogs par yang ni mi
353a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / mtshan ma rnams ni gang spangs pa// yon tan gzhi ni bsags pas na// mig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyid// rab tu rtogs par yang 'gyur ro// 'di ltar mig ni zad pa'i
353a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha'/ / rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan yang // rab tu rtogs par khong du chud// mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag la// mi 'dzin sbed pa med pa dang //
353b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig gi rab dben de dag la// rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi rab dben
353b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la/ / rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'ong med pa la// rtag tu
353b3(dkon brtsegs): rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa/ / de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'od med pa dag/ rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs
353b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ / de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas// mig zad ngo bo nyid la rtag rmongs pa// de ni
353b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo spyod par lhung bas na/ / des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig la bdag med rab rtogs nas// mig zad ngo bo rtag tu rtogs gyur pas// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang
353b6(dkon brtsegs): bral bas na/ / des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas// bzod pa'i gnas la rtag tu rmongs gyur pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas
353b7(dkon brtsegs): na/ da des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig la bdag med rab rtogs nas// bzod pa'i gnas ni rtag tu rtogs gyur pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na//
354a1(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' ni gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// lus kyi bye brag tha dad pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// las kyi bye brags
354a2(dkon brtsegs): da pa/ / rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig skye mtha' ni gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs
354a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ / sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs
354a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams/ / mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig gi 'jig pa gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sdug bsngal 'jig pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs
354a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ / sdug bsngal 'jig pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig gi med
354a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa/ / yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par
354a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i phyir/ / des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig gi skye med gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// bag chags spangs pa
354b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa/ / de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//
354b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mig gi mi rtog nyid// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs
354b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa'i phyir/ / des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang mig la yi ge med// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas ye
354b4(dkon brtsegs): shes stobs dag kyang / / rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag ni// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid
354b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ba yin/ / gzhan yang mig gi mi 'ong nyid// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// 'dod rnams spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// 'dod rnams spangs
354b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa/ / rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang bsam gtan bsgom pa dag/ yang dag ji
354b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ / nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin//
355a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gang zag des ni de bzhin du// mig ni sngon mtha' shes pa dang // mig gi mi gnas shes pa dang /
355a2(dkon brtsegs): mig mi skye ba'i shes pa dang // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang // mig gi dman pa shes pa dang // mig ni khyad par 'phags shes dang // ye shes dben pa shes pa dang // rnam dag
355a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes shes pa dang / / tshul khrims rnam dag shes pa dang // lus kyi sdom pa'i shes pa dang // rnam dag sgra yi shes pa dang // ngag gi sdom pa'i shes pa dang // rnam dag sems kyi
355a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / / gnas kyi bye brag shes pa dang // sems kyi chos kyi shes pa dang // sems skyon shes pa'i shes pa dang // rnam dag las kyi shes pa dang // sems kyi sdom pa'i shes pa dang //
355a5(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmigs shes pa'i shes pa dang // rnam dag sgra yi shes pa dang // phung po bye brag shes pa dang // phung po rgyu rkyen shes pa dang // mig ni yongs shes shes pa dang // sdug bsngal
355a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas shes pa dang / / zag med tshul khrims shes pa dang // tshul khrims rgyu rkyen shes pa dang // sdug bsngal rgyu rkyen shes pa dang // sdug bsngal zad pa'i rgyu shes dang // 'dus
355a7(dkon brtsegs): byas rnams kyi shes pa dang / / zag mig zad pa'i shes pa dag/ yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin// gzhan yang rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis kyi// spyod dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang // spyod pa
355b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i shes pa dang / / mtshan ma bcas dang mtshan ma med// 'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma byas// rnam par gzhag dang yongs sdud dang // bdag dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa// yang dag
355b2(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin shes pa yin/ / gzhan yang mig zad skye mtha' dang // mig gi mtha' dang rab dben dang // 'jug pa dang ni med pa dang // mi skye ba dang nyer zhi nyid// yang dag ji bzhin shes pas
355b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ / sems can dag ni mang po rnams// rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang // mthu dang bcas pa'i ye shes dang // brtson 'grus ye shes 'thob par byed// gzhan yang gcig
355b4(dkon brtsegs): dang tha dad shes/ / sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// mos pa'i shes pa gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi// mos pa khyad
355b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags pa dang / / rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang // las dang rnam smin shes pa dang // dbang po khams kyi shes pa dang // sems ni 'gyur ba shes pa dang // shes rab mos pa'i
355b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / / shin tu rnam grol shes pa dang // spobs mchog gi ni shes pa dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang sems can ma rungs dang // chos la mos pa med gyur pa//
355b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na// mos pa'i shes pa skyed par byed// gzhan yang don gyi tshul dag ni// yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na// le lo med pa'i shes pa dag/ dus shes sgrub par byed
356a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ / gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// chos rnams rab tu 'byed pa dang // thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/
356a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rgya chen don dag dang // tshig gi bstan pa gang yin pa// rjes su shes pa'i shes pa dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang grogs bzang 'thun gnas dang // gos
356a3(dkon brtsegs): dang zas dang btung ba dag/ tshod 'dzin pa yi shes pa rnams// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang bya ba med pa yi// gzungs kyi chos ni gang yin pa// nan tan bsgrub pa'i
356a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang lus sems skyon med cing // sgro 'dogs skur 'debs yongs spangs nas// bla med ye shes gang tshol ba// yang dag
356a5(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin shes pa yin/ / gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs ngag gis// nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// sprul pa'i sku ni rab bstan nas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// yongs
356a6(dkon brtsegs): su smin par mdzad pas na/ / thams cad rab tu dgar gyur nas// dang ba skyes pa'i shes pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang // mos shing gus pa'i shes pa dang // 'dod
356a7(dkon brtsegs): chags spangs pa'i chos dag dang / / rab mos bsgrub pa'i shes pa dang // 'phags pa'i dge 'dun tshogs la yang // mchod par mos pa'i shes pa dang // byang chub chen po rag la yang /
356b1(dkon brtsegs): rab mos bsngo ba'i shes pa dang // gzungs rnams kyi ni sgo dag la// rab mos ston pa'i shes pa dang // mos pa rnams ni gang yin pa// so sor rab rtogs shes pa dang // 'phags pa'i
356b2(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin gang yin pa/ / legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang // bsrung dang rjes su dran rnams la// nges par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang // dpag tu med pa'i sems dag la// legs par
356b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'i shes pa dang / / tshigs su bcad pa tshad med rnams// yang dag ston pa'i shes pa dang // 'dod pa'i mtshams sbyor gang yin pa// rtogs shing go ba'i shes pa dang // 'gro ba dman
356b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag tu/ / ltung bar mi 'gyur shes pa dang // mi dge ba shes gnyen gang yin pa// yongs su spong byed shes pa dang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang yin pa// sten par byed pa'i shes pa
356b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dri zhing lan ldon gang yin pa// rab tu rnam 'byed shes pa dang // gnas dang gnas min gang yin pa// legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang // sa dang sa min gang yin pa// legs
356b6(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / / rab 'bring tha ma gang yin pa// rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang // 'dus byas shes pa gang yin pa// 'dus ma byas kyi shes pa dang // dngos po dang ni rdzas kyi
356b7(dkon brtsegs): shes/ / dngos dang dngos min shes pa dang // yongs su sdud byed shes pa dang // yongs su sdud min shes pa dang // mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes pa dang // yang dag bsgrub min shes pa dang // mig
357a1(dkon brtsegs): dang mig min shes pa dang / / mig dang lhan cig shes pa dang // mig gi bye brag shes pa dang // mig gi rang bzhin shes pa dang // yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/
357a2(dkon brtsegs): rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// gang zhig mig gi rgyu rkyen nyid// yang dag stong zhing dben pa dang //
357a3(dkon brtsegs): mthar ni bdag yod ma yin par// sems par byed pa gang yin pa// gang zag de ni de bzhin du// yang dag nges pa kho nar ni// sems kyi ting 'dzin gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par
357a4(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur/ / gang zhig mig ni rten 'brel dang // mig mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dag/ nges pa nyid du rtogs gyur nas// sems par byed pa gang yin pa// gang zag des ni de bzhin du//
357a5(dkon brtsegs): mig gi rgyu rkyen gang yin dang // mthar ni yod pa ma yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga//
357a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis// dngos po ngo mtshar rab bstan pa// deng 'dir bdag
357a7(dkon brtsegs): gis mdor bsdus nas/ / yon tan phyogs ni cung zad cig/ sems can dga' ba skyed pa'i phyir// yang dag par ni bstan par bya// de tshe lha min 'dren pa yis// spu yi khung bu gcig nas
357b1(dkon brtsegs): ni/ / 'od zer brgya stong tshad med snyed// rab tu bkye bar gyur pas na// 'od zer dag ni re res kyang // zhing ni tshad med gsal mdzad nas// sems can mang po kun gyi phyir// sangs
357b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mdzad pa rab tu mdzad/ / gang zhig 'das pa'i dus su ni// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang // yun ring sbyin dang tshul khrims dag/ mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa// de lta
357b3(dkon brtsegs): bu yi gang zag dag/ des ni ji skad bstan pa yi// rdzu 'phrul dngos po thos gyur na// rab tu dga' zhing mos par 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnams// nyan thos dang ni
357b4(dkon brtsegs): rang rgyal gyis/ / spyod yu la min par rab shes nas// de lta bu yi gang zag dag/ des ni ji skad bskad pa yis// rdzu 'phrul dag ni thos gyus na// mos pa dag ni skye 'gyur zhing //
357b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar 'dzin pa'i sems kyang skyed// lha dang mi ni 'dren pa yis// bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dag gis// de lta bu la sogs pa yi// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rab bstan pas// sems can
357b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni brgya stong dang / / tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni// brten cing rim gro mchod pa byas// lha dang mi ni 'dren pa yis// bsam gyis mi khyab
357b7(dkon brtsegs): mthu dag gis/ / mdo sde dag ni brgya stong dang // tshad med grangs med rab bshad pas// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// bstan pa de ni thos pas na// thams cad dang bas rab blang
358a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ / sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur// de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni mthu dag gis// nam mkha' las ni 'di
358a2(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ / mig zad mtha' ni shes pa nas// mig ni nye bar zhi ba dang // mig nyid rgyu yi bar du yang // 'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang // mtha' ni stong dben shes par gyis// de skad du ni thos par
358a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ / rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de yi tshe ni bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs
358a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ / nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// sgra snyan dam pa mchog byung nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sna tshogs// bsngags pa brjod par gyur pas na// 'khor ni 'dus pa chen po
358a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ / thams cad dad mos sems kyang skyes// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni bdud dang bdud dpung dag/ pham mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya//
358a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// log par lta ba'i tshogs thams cad// rab tu 'dul bar nus shes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang
358a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ / mtshan ni 'dod chags gzhom pa dang // zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa// thams cad
358b1(dkon brtsegs): spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ / da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni zhe sdang gzhom pa dang // zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos
358b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de dag ni/ / zhe sdang dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni gti mug gzhom pa dang //
358b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// gti mug dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa
358b4(dkon brtsegs): yi/ / mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni nga rgyal gzhom pa dang // zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// nga rgyal dag ni gang yin pa//
358b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni khong khro gzhom pa dang // zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta
358b6(dkon brtsegs): bu yi mtshan/ / thos par gyur pa de dag ni// khong khro dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni phrag dog
358b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhom pa dang / / zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu mi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// phrag dog dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar gyur zhes zer// da ltar
359a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ / mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni mi bden gzhom pa dang // zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur
359a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni/ / mi bden dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni lha rnams gzhom pa dang // zhi mdzad
359a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ / gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// lta ba dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi
359a4(dkon brtsegs): yi seng ge gang yin pa/ / mtshan ni spros pa gzhom pa dang // zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// spros pa dag ni gang yin pa// thams
359a5(dkon brtsegs): cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ / da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni yang dag pa yi chos// rnam dag chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//
359a6(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag ni// rnam dag chos ni gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni las rnams rtogs pa yi// chos
359a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal zhes bya ba yin/ / gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// las rnams thams cad gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi//
359b1(dkon brtsegs): mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni rdzu 'phrul phun tshogs pa'i// chos kyi rgyal zhes bya ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// zos par gyur pa de dag ni// rdzu 'phrul yon tan gang yin pa// yongs su
359b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ / da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni pha rol phyin pa rnams// phun tshogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// /
359b3(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag ni// pha rol phyin drug gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni 'du byed
359b4(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa/ / rab rtogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni// 'du byed dag ni thams cad kun// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar
359b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ / mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni rnam par dag pa yi// 'od zer kun 'dzin bskyed ces bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// khyad
359b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags pa'i skye len dag/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni kha dog dag pa yi// 'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang
359b7(dkon brtsegs): bya/ / gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dam par// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi sang
360a1(dkon brtsegs): ge gang yin pa/ / mtshan ni sku nyid dag pa yi// 'od zer kunar 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// khyad par 'phags pa'i
360a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs skra dag/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni gdung nyid dag pa yi// 'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya//
360a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// khyad par 'phag pa'i rus rigs rnams// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng
360a4(dkon brtsegs): ge gang yin pa/ / mtshan ni rgya cher grags pa yi// 'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// rgya cher grags pa'i grags pa rnams// yongs su
360a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ / da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni sbyin pa gtong ba dang // tshul khrims can dang bzod sgom dang // brtson 'grus brtsams
360a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bsam gtan dang / / shes rab kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// sbyin pa dang ni tshul khrims nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang /
360a7(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi sgo ni gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni stong pa nyid rdzogs pa'i// chos kyi rje zhes bya/
360b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni// chos rnams stong pa'i don dag kyang // yang dag rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge
360b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa/ / mtshan ni bdag med rdzogs pa yi// chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni// skye 'gag med don gang yin pa// yang dag ston par
360b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhes zer/ / da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni spyan nyid dag pa yi// kun 'dzini chos kyi rje zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// 'dzin par byed/
360b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni// mig zad mtha' don gang yin pa// yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni nyi shu rtsa lnga dang // me tog 'phreng ba
360b5(dkon brtsegs): spos dag dang / / mar me bdug dang gos rnams kyang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// / bam po lnga pa ste tha ma'o// de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das//
360b6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs rnams kyis// nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// sgra snyan dam pa rab byung ste// gzungs kyi spyod
360b7(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs dag/ yang dag par ni bstan pas na// 'khor ni 'dus pa chen po rnams// 'di lta bu yi chog thos te// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// mig gi zad mtha' gang yin dang // skye mtha'
361a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni mtha' rnams dang / / rab dben dang ni 'jug pa nas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi// chos rnams gang yin de dag gi/ mthar phyin nas ni gang yin pa// thams cad
361a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs par byed/ / sbyin pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dag sdud pa dang // tshul khrims stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dag 'grub pa dang // bzod pa'i stobs ni gang
361a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis/ / mthar ni gang dag bkod pa dang // brtson 'grus stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dag slong ba dang // bsam gtan stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dag sgom pa dang //
361a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar ni gang dag ston pa dang // yi ge rnams dang brjod pa dang // sgra skad rnams ni spangs pa nas// gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang // mthar ni rnam dag
361a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rtogs/ / zag dang bcas dang zag med dang // don rnams dang ni phan pa dag/ thams cad stong zhing dben pa dang // mthar ni rnam dag nyid du rtogs// srid pa dag ni thams cad la// rten
361a6(dkon brtsegs): cing gnas par mi byed dang / / gzungs dang ting 'dzin dag la ni// rab tu dben par gnas par byed// 'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang // dge ba ma yin mi dge min// lung du mi ston pa yang min//
361a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i// de lta bu yi mtshan ma rnams// thams cad yongs su dag pas na// dbang phyug yon tan dag la yang // gnas par yang ni mi byed do// nyan thos dang ni skye
361b1(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos la yang // gnas par yang ni mi byed do// mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag dang // skye mtha' dang ni mtha' rnams ras// nye bar ni ba'i bar rlabs kyi// stong
361b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni gang yin pa/ / thams cad yongs su zhi bar byed// skye ba dang ni mi skye dang // sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba dang // bstod pa dang ni smad pa dang // thams cad yongs su spong zhes zer// mthar
361b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir snang ba gang yin dang / / stong pa'i gzungs ni gang yin pa// thams cad rab tu gang rtogs pa// 'di nyid sangs rgyas spyod yul la// rab tu gnas par byed pa yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas rol
361b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ / gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul la// rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas mkhyen pa la// rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin// mig zad
361b5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yi stobs dag la/ / de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang // mig skye mtha' yi stobs dag la// de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang // mig gi mtha' yi stobs dag la// de bzhin du ni gnas pa nas// nye bar
361b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i stobs kyi bar/ / de la rab tu gnas pa dang // rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// gzungs ni gang
361b7(dkon brtsegs): yin 'di dag gis/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs// khyad par 'phags pa gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par byed ces zer// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// gzi byin mthu stobs
362a1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu/ / yongs su rdzogs par byas nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gnas kun la ni 'jug pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// spyod yul
362a2(dkon brtsegs): kun la gnas gyur pas/ / 'jig rten pa ni thams cad kun// lha ma yin gyi tshogs dag la// brtan par 'dzin pa'i sems spangs nas// tshangs pa'i spyod la gnas par byed// gnod sbyin brgya stong
362a3(dkon brtsegs): tshad med dang / / grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams// de dag thams cad kun kyang ni// rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed// dri za'i 'khor ni gang yin dang // srin po'i 'khor ni gang yin pa// tshad med grangs
362a4(dkon brtsegs): med de dag kyang / / rab tu dul la dga' bar byed// gal te tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// sgra snyan dag ni dam pa yis// tshig dang don ni rjod byed kyang // yang dag bstan par mi nus te// sems
362a5(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis/ / dpag par bya ba ma yin dang // sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis// gzung bar bya ba min zhes zer// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni// mig gis dmigs
362a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba min/ / gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni// lus kyi bar gyis dmigs bya min// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni// mig gis dmigs par bya ba min// mig gi spyod yul bar gyis kyang //
362a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa bya ba ma yin te// rna ba sna lce lus nas ni// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// gzhan yang mig go zad mtha' dang //
362b1(dkon brtsegs): mig rnams kyi ni skye mtha' dang // mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag la// bdag dang skyes bu med pa dang // sems cad dang ni srog med dang // de bzhir gang zag med
362b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / / mtshan ma med cing byed med dang // 'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang // 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mtshan// thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// gzhan yang 'di skad chos nyid
362b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ mig ni rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// gzhan yang 'di skad chos rnams lags// grub pa'i mig ni gang yin pa// ye shes mig dang shes rab mig/ tshangs pa'i mig dang lha
362b4(dkon brtsegs): yi mig/ tshangs par skyes nas thob mig dang // lhar ni skyes nas thob mig dang // tshangs pa'i rnam smin mig dag dang // lha yi rnam smin mig dag dang // tshangs pa'i rgyu las skyes mig/
362b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / dalha yi rgyu las skyes mig dang // lha yi rdzu 'phrul mig dag dang // lha yi brtson 'grus dag gi mig/ dman par skyes pa'i mig dag dang // khyad 'phags skyes pa'i mig dag
362b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gang yin pa// yongs su spangs pa'i mig dag dang // klu dang gnod sbyin mig dag dang // grul bum gyi ni mig dag dang // yongs su gdung bcas mig dag
362b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / / yongs su gdung min mig dag dang // rnam par dag pa'i mig dag dang // rnam par dag min mig dag dang // mchur ring zheng chung mig dag dang // nyan thos theg pa pa yi mig/ bsam
363a1(dkon brtsegs): gtan pa yi mig dag dang / / ting nge 'dzin gyi mig dag dang // spyod yul las byung mig dag dang // 'du shes las byung mig dag dang // 'dod chags las byung mig dag
363a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dod chags bral ba'i mig dag dang // rgyu las byung ba'i mig dag dang // rgyu min las byung mig dag dang // mtshungs par ldan pa'i mig ngag dang // mtshungs par ldan min mig dag
363a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sgo brten las byung mig dag dang // sgo las byung min mig dag dang // rgyu rkyen las byung mig dag dang // rgyu sgo las skyes mig dag dang // sha las grub min mig dag dang // ye
363a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rnam par dag mig dang / / yod pa min pa'i mig dag dang // dmigs med mig ni gang yin pa// thams cad rtogs par byed ces zer// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming la sogs
363a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar/ / chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das// nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yi// sgra snyan dam pa
363a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog byung nas/ / khyad par 'phags pa gzungs kyi chos// 'di skad du ni bka' stsal te// 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa yis// rdzu 'phrul dag ni sprul pa yin// 'di lta ste/ si le/ ma
363a7(dkon brtsegs): ma le/ sid d+hi/ e ne/ si ne/ ku lu ni yu/ ku lu ni yu/ ku le/ ma le/ ku no ti/ a la she/ a si le/ si si le te/ su li te/ si le si le/ khyi bi le/ a bi le/ su te tsa na/ d+ha ni
363b1(dkon brtsegs): ma naM/ ka ni/ kA li te/ su ka 9/ pra la shan nga nI/ a n+d+ra ma sa kye/ zi lo me/ su b+ha na re sh+tse/ a shi ri le/ sar ma par phun+da te/ ba ra bi h+Na/ d+ha ra ni/ d+hi shU tsi ha/ su d+he/ a rbA na/ b+hu pog sa
363b2(dkon brtsegs): nang/ kung ba ne/ b+hA sa b+ha nang / pan ri/ d+hu ri ya/ ni ba ri/ ka no ni/ ma nang b+h+ya/ su ru tsi ta/ ba na/ a tsha ra/ a b+hi la b+hIr+ya/ pra ti sh+ma ha/ d+hA ra naM/ a si te/ lo ni bi/ gzungs
363b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang yin 'di dag ni/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu brnyes// mthu chen dag ni phun sum tshogs// shes rab dag ni tshad kyang med// 'dzin pa dag ni yongs su spong // dran pa dag ni/
363b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par byed// gzugs med 'gro dang 'ong ba med// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams yod pa min// mtshan ma med cing brjod dang bral// spros pa dag las yang dag 'das// byang chub sems/
363b5(dkon brtsegs): dpas sgrub byed na// mthar ni bsil ba 'thob par 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa bye ba phrag/ brgya stong mang po dag gis ni// tshig gcig tsam ni rab bstan kyang // mtha' ni dmigs par yong mi
363b6(dkon brtsegs): nus/ / 'phags pa mang pos rab tu bsngags// rnam par dag cing zhen pa med// 'khor 'dus mang po thams cad kyis// shin tu gus pa skyed par byed// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// dge pa'i
363b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mthu stobs kyis/ / nyon mongs rab bcom nyer zhi nas// khyad 'phags phan yon thob par byed// yon tan dang ni shes rab dag/ shin tu rgya che rgya mtsho 'dra// bzod pa dag ni sgrub par byed//
364a1(dkon brtsegs): sems ni rab bde g.yo med 'gyur// byang chub sems dpas rtag tu bsgom// mkhas pa dag gis rab tu bsngags// dbul 'phongs dag ni spong byed cing // nor dang rin chen
364a2(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par byed/ / gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// yon tan rnams ni 'phel bar byed// rtag tu stong nyid la sogs pa'i// bden tshig dag gis rab tu brgyan// yi ge dag ni spangs pas na//
364a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya// sems dang rnam shes spangs pas na// chos kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// dri bral rtag tu rnam dag byed// yang dag ye shes la
364a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas/ / phan pa sna tshogs ston par byed// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// dga' zhing dang bskyed par byed// gnod sbyin dag ni tshad med dang // grul bum 'khor ni gang yin pa// 'di la
364a5(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa yi dgas rgyal/ / dga' ba chen po skyed ces zer// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// rab tu zhi zhing spros pa med// sems can dag la byams pas na// kun la bde ba sbyin par byed//
364a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa mang po brgya stong du// 'gro ba rnams su rtag gnas shing // phan pa tshad med rab byed kyang // rnam par dag cing gos pa med// tshigs su bcad pa brgya skyong gis// bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab bstan
364a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / sems can dag ni ched med rnams// dga' ba chen po skyed par byed// sngon gyi sangs rgyas tshad med rnams// shin tu rnam dag mos pa yis// gzungs 'di la ni brten nas su// rtag tu chos nyid
364b1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par byed/ / tshangs dang brgya byin lha rnams dang // klu yi rgyal po lha ma yin// gzungs 'di thos par gyur nas kyang // sems kyi dga' ba skyed ces zer// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag rnams// gang
364b2(dkon brtsegs): du gnas pa'i yul der ni/ / rtag tu gnod dang 'khrug pa dang // nad dang sdug bsngal mya ngan med// sems can dag ni thams cad kur// so sor dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// gzungs 'di rtag tu bdag
364b3(dkon brtsegs): cag gis/ / sems la gnas par smon lam 'debs// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// lus dang sems dang dkan dag dang // kha mchu dag la gnas gyur na// yon tan dpag me da skyed par
364b4(dkon brtsegs): byed/ / gal te rtag tu 'dzin byed na// yon tan tshad med thob gyur nas// sems can mang la phan 'dogs shing // thams cad dga' ba thob ces zer// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag gis//
364b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa rnams ni rab spong zhing // dam chos dag ni ston byed pas// thug pa med pa'i spobs pa thob// sems can dag ni brgya stong rnams// the tsom dag ni rab bsal nas// nga rgyal rnams ni rab
364b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ste/ / yon tan dpag med 'thob ces zer// shin tu zab cing gsang ba'i chos// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// mkhas pas rtag tu sems byed cing // nan tan gyis ni sgrub par byed//
364b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab go cha rab bgos nas// nyon mongs rab tu 'jom par byed// yon tan sems ni 'phel byed pas// rab tu mos shing skyo ba med// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// grags pa chen
365a1(dkon brtsegs): po phun tshogs pas/ / zad pa dang ni mi zad dang // skye dang mi skye mtha' rab rtogs// 'di 'dra'i shes rab sna tshogs kyis// bdag nyid rab tu brgyan pas na// de bzhin gshegs
365a2(dkon brtsegs): pa brgya stong rnams/ / shin tu gus shing mchod pa mdzad// de 'dra'i gzungs ni gang yin pa// rig pa dag gi rkang gnyis byed// ting 'dzin mchog la rab gnas nas// byang chub lam la gzhol bar
365a3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ / zhi gnas lhag mthong rjes 'brang zhing // zag med shes rab rtogs par byed// rab dang dbang po stobs kyis ni// lag gnyis yongs su grub par byed// brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa yis//
365a4(dkon brtsegs): nu ma gnyis ni grub par byed// shes rab pha rol phyin pas ni// spyi gtsug mtshan nyid rab tu byed// mdo sde dag gis skud byas nas// so sor rig bzhi 'phreng bar brgyus// sngon ni mngon par
365a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pa yi/ / yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // dpe ni tshad med ji snyed pa// thams cad rab tu brgyan ces zer// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// yon tan tshad med phun tshogs pas//
365a6(dkon brtsegs): mig gi sngon dang phyi mtha' dang // zad dang mi zad mtha' dag dang // skye ba dang ni mi skye dang // mtha' dang mtha' min gang yin dang // dben pa dang ni mi dbyen dang // 'jug pa dang ni 'jug min dang //
365a7(dkon brtsegs): ci yang med dang mi 'byung dang // nyer zhi dang ni bdag med dang // gang zag med dang srog med dang // sems can med pa'i bar dag dang // 'di la sogs pa'i tshad med sgo// thams cad rab tu rtogs
365b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ / rna ba sA lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// 'jig rten skye ba'i ming bar du// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// gong du bsngags pa brjod pa yi// gzungs mchog dab pa
365b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa/ / rab dben yon tan mchog ldan zhing // sangs rgyas spyod yul yin pas na// gzungs don yang dag gang yin pa// yi ges brjod bya ma yin yang // 'jig rten pa yi rjes su yang // bta/
365b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ming gis brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du byon pa dang / gdan bshams pa la rab tu bzhugs so// de'i z
365b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das ga ngan la bzhugs par rig nas/ bdag nyid mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pa thogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams la
365b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phul te/ mchod pa de'ang bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / bsam gtan gyi yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu las mngon par grub pa sha
365b6(dkon brtsegs): stag go/ / de ltar mchod pa phul ba'ang bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir ma yin gyi/ sems can tshad med pa thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub la gzhol zhing phan yon chen po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod
365b7(dkon brtsegs): cing phul bas na/ mchod pa des kun tu khyab cing thams cad rab tu tshim par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol ba'i 'og tu 'khor 'dus pa mang po'i mdun du
366a1(dkon brtsegs): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gzhon du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig theg pa chen po la gnas nas/ sbyin pa'i tshig
366a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sgrub par byed na/ yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad cu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par byed cing tshig
366a3(dkon brtsegs): snyan pas yongs su sdud par byed pa dang / mtshan gya nom pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dbang po rnams ma tshang ba med pa dang / 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du byed pa
366a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyon mongs pa rnams zad nas dbang phyug mchog 'thob pa dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu brgyan pa dang / 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang
366a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa mchog mngon par sgrub pa dang / spyod pa bla na med cing mtshungs pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bag
366a6(dkon brtsegs): chags yang dag par bcom nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / sku dang ring bsrel 'jig rten thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
366a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa rnams rab tu btul bas mi'i rgyal po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ling gi rgyal po dang / tshangs
366b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po rnams yongs su dang bskye bar 'gyur ba dang / mthu chen po dang ldan pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / tshigs su bcang ba dang / lung du bstan pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / dbyangs
366b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsnyad pa dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / gtan pa phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar du le
366b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba dang / sems la le lo med pa dang / chos la ser sna med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam la yang dag par gnas pa dang / 'jig
366b4(dkon brtsegs): rten na mchog tu gyur cing ming dang gzugs yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi sku mngon du byed par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams phun sum
366b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / mu stegs can rnams zil gyis gnon pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa dang / sdig pa can gyi spyod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams dang ye
366b6(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi rgyu la mngon par yid ches pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sdu mas byed pa dang / bdud mang po pham par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa gsungs pa'i chos bden pa dag la the tshom dang nem nur med
366b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'dod pa ngan pa rnams rab tu bcom pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pas rdzu 'phrul khyad par du 'phags pa 'thob par 'gyur ba
367a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye shi spong bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / spyod pa dpag tu med pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / yon tan rnams yongs su sdud
367a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams la spro ba bskyed pa dang / chos kyi dga' ba la yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa gtong ba mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes chen po'i sgor
367a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / dro bar gyur pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba dang // rigs nges pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi bzod pa bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam la bde bar gnas
367a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa'o/ / gzhon nu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sbyin pa'i tshogs mngon par sgrub par bye da na/ yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad cu po 'di dag phu na sum tshogs
367a5(dkon brtsegs): shing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' blo chen gang // sbyin pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa
367a6(dkon brtsegs): la/ phan yon mchog ni brgyad cu yod// ngas mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin// gzhan yang dpag med bsam dka' yi// yon tan dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad sbyin pa las skye ste// deng 'dir
367a7(dkon brtsegs): cung zad bstan par bya/ / khyod kyis 'khor 'dus mang po la// mnyam pa'i sems kyis gang mchod pa// sbyin pa'i tshogs ni de dag la// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya// sbyin pa 'di yis bsagras
367b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ / bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad lus brgyan pa// thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// skye gnas dang ni rus rigs dang // yul rnams dang ni khyim dag dang //
367b2(dkon brtsegs): grags pa dang ni gzugs dang sems// thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur// lha rnams rdzu 'phrul dngos po dag/ gzhal med khang dang lha mo dang // rnam dag thogs med spobs pa yang // sbyin
367b3(dkon brtsegs): ba las ni byung ba yin/ / sbyin pa'i tshogs mchog gang yin pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di skad du// 'di ni dang por byang chub rnams// gnas pa'i gzhi zhes bsngags par mdzad// byang
367b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can/ / sbyin la the tshom med pa dag/ nges pa'i sems la rab gnas nas// sbyin pa nan tan sgrub par gyis// sbyin pa'i sems ni gang dag gis// bsod nams
367b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni rdzogs byed pa/ / byang chub sems dpas sgrub byed na// sangs rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// sbyin pa'i mthu yi stobs kyis ni// rdzu 'phrul mchog ni rdzogs byed pas// zhing ni bye ba
367b6(dkon brtsegs): bskul byas kyang / / sems can rnams la gnod mi 'gyur// sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis na// rnam dge tshul khrims mang thos dang // yang dag yid ches brtson 'grus dang // ting 'dzin zag
367b7(dkon brtsegs): med shes rab 'dren/ / sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis na// dbang po stobs dang yan lag dang // yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang // bag chags spong ba 'dren par byed// sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis
368a1(dkon brtsegs): na/ rnam dag sgra snyan dag gis ni// zhing ni bye ba brgya phrag tu// dpag med chos ston 'dren par byed// yongs su dang bas sbyin btang bas// rdzu 'phrul rnams ni yongs su
368a2(dkon brtsegs): 'thob/ / rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// nan tan sbyin pa btang bar gyis// lha mi mang po tshad med rnams// lha ma yin dang klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin brgya stong mang po dang // 'khor rnams kyis
368a3(dkon brtsegs): ni yongs bskor nas/ / gzhal med khang mchog rab bzhugs te// rang dbang dag gis rtse byed pa// 'di la sogs pa'i rgyal po rnams// sbyin la brtson pa mthong gyur na// thams cad langs nas
368a4(dkon brtsegs): bsu nas ni/ / stan bting mchod pa dag kyang byed// sbyin gtong gang zag gang yin pa// gzi byin chen po phun tshogs shing // rdzu 'phrul stobs la dbang thob pas// lha rgyal rnams ni sdud par
368a5(dkon brtsegs): byed/ gru la bu ma dang ni gnod sbyin rnams// thams cad skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur// dri za 'khor bcas rnams kyis kyang // rol mo dag gis mchod par byed// chom rkun dag gis byams/
368a6(dkon brtsegs): sems skyed// ma rungs pa rnams ring du 'gro// nor rnams nyams par mi 'gyur te// bang mdzod dag ni gang bar 'gyur// sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'i phyir// tshogs mchog dag ni rdzogs par
368a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas ye shes thug bar du// mu stegs chos ni spyod mi byed// de la na ba yong med de// gzugs rnams yongs su srung bar byed// khyad par 'phags pa'i stobs rnams kyang // sbyin pa
368b1(dkon brtsegs): las ni byung ba yin/ / de ltar sbyin pa gang gtong ba// byang chub la ma ni sgrub par byed// mi dge ba shes gnyen phrang mi 'gyur// spyod 'thun grogs po 'thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang byang chub
368b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams/ / sbyin pa'i tsho gas ni sogs byed pa// bsam gyis mi khyab gzungs dag dang // shes rab yongs su rdzogs byed pas// tshigs su bcad pa tshad med kyis// kun 'dzin yang
368b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag ston par byed/ / thams cad la ni thogs med pas// ngo bo nyid don stor mi 'gyur// byang chub sems ni rgya che la// mos pa'i sems ni brtan par 'gyur// tshul khrims dag pa phun tshogs
368b4(dkon brtsegs): shing / / bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed// 'dod pa lnga la zhen med cing // rtse gcig yang dag dran pa tshol// sems la rtag tu rmongs med pas// 'dod pa dag la srid mi skyed// zhe sdang
368b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs gang yin pa/ / yang dag ji bzhin rab tu rtogs// spyod yul dag ni thams cad la// zhen pa med cing rmongs pa med// gang zag des ni nyon mongs rnams// legs pa nyid du
368b6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par 'gyur/ / rgyu dang rkyen ni 'dus pa las// nyes dmigs rnams ni skye ba nas// sangs rgyas chos kyi bar dag gis// rgyu dang rgyu yi rgyu nyid dang // de bzhin rgyu yi bya ba rnams//
368b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// des ni mig zang mtha' yi rgyu// gang yin rab tu rtogs pas na// rmongs pa rnams ni yongs spangs nis// mig la mngon par zhon mi 'gyur//
369a1(dkon brtsegs): des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang // mthu' dang rab tu dben pa dang // 'jug pa dang ni med pa dang // mi skye ba nas nyer ni'i bar// 'di la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid
369a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang / / rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// rmongs pa rnams ni yongs spangs nas// mig la mngon par zhen mi 'gyur// des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi// brjod pa 'jig rten rjes
369a3(dkon brtsegs): su ni/ / btags pa yin pas de la ni// yang dag ci yang med par rtogs// des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi// brjod pa 'jig rten rjes su ni// btags pa yin pas de la ni//
369a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ci yang med par rtogs// des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang // mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang // ci yang med dang skye med nas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang // 'di la
369a5(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams/ / 'jig rten rjes su btags pas na// de la yang dag med par ni// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin// des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi// brjod
369a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las/ / byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na// de la zhen pa ci yang med// des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi// brjod pa rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las// byung ba nyid du rtogs pas
369a7(dkon brtsegs): na/ de la zhen pa ci yang med// des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang // mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang // ci yang med dang skye med nas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang // 'di la
369b1(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i dge ba rnams/ / rgyu dang rkyen ni 'dus pa las// 'byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na// de la zhen pa ci yang med// des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi// brjod pa rang bzhin bstan
369b2(dkon brtsegs): med par/ / rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// de la zhen pa ci yang med// des ni mig gi byi mtha' yi// brjod pa rang bzhin bstan med par// rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// de la
369b3(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa ci yang med/ / des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang // mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang // ci yang med dang skye med nas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang // 'di la sogs pa'i
369b4(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa rnams/ / rang bzhin gyis ni bstan med par// rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// de la zhen pa ci yang med// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung
369b5(dkon brtsegs): chen bzhi/ / 'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// des ni 'dod chags sangs rgyas lam// rang bzhin dbyer med min par ni// rab tu rtogs par
369b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas na/ / 'dod chags la ni zhen pa med// sangs rgyas lam no thams cad kun// nyon mongs las ni btsal bar bya// rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na// kun 'dzin sgor
369b7(dkon brtsegs): ni zhugs pa yin/ / 'dod chags kun 'dzin yin pa dang // kun 'dzin 'dod chags yin ston cing // rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na// kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin//
370a1(dkon brtsegs): / de bzhin 'dod chags gang mchod pa// de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin// sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// des ni zhe sngangs sa
370a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas lam/ / rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni// rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// zhe sdang la ni zhen pa med// zhe sdang kun 'dzin yin pa dang // kun 'dzin zhe sdang yin ston cing //
370a3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na// kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin// de bzhin zhe sdang gang mchod pa// de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin// sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin
370a4(dkon brtsegs): sgro ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ / des ni gti mug sangs rgyas lam// rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni// rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// gti mug la ni zhen pa med// ga la te gti mug
370a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi mtha'/ / yang dag ji bzhin rtogs gyur na// des ni sangs rgyas lam sgrub pas// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// gti mug kun 'dzin yin pa dang // kun 'dzin gti
370a6(dkon brtsegs): mug yin ston cing / / rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes nas// kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// de ba sangs rgyas mchod pa yin// sangs rgyas la ni mchod
370a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ / kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa'i// de ni chos la mchod pa yin// chos la mchod pa byas pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par
370b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// de ni dge 'dun mchod pa yin// dge 'dun la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod
370b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / de ni tshul khrims mchod pa yin// tshul khrims la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa yin//
370b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pa yin// bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pa'i
370b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ / kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// sangs rgyas chos la mchod pa yin// sangs rgyas chos la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo/
370b5(dkon brtsegs): ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// chos nyid la ni mchod pa yin// chos nyid la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed// de bzhin gti
370b6(dkon brtsegs): mug gang mchod pa/ / de bzhin nyid la mchod pa yin// de bzhin nyid la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// skye ba med la
370b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa yin/ / skye ba med la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// 'gag pa med la mchod pa yin// 'gag pa med la mchod
371a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ / kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// zag pa med la mchod pa yin// zag pa med la mchod pa'i phyir/
371a2(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// ci yang med la mchod pa yin// ci yang med la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur//
371a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// dpag tu med la mchod pa yin// dpag tu med la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//
371a4(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gsum la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// rab dben la ni mchod pa yin// rab dben la ni mchod pa'i phyir//
